GP12garup3_u:6: oṃ mallānāmaśanirnṛṇāṃ naravaraḥ strīṇāṃ smaro mūrtimān gopānāṃ svajano 'satāṃ kṣitibhṛtāṃ śāstā svapitroḥ śiśuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:7: mṛtyurbhojapatervidhātṛvihita stattvaṃ paraṃ yogināṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ ca patiḥ sadaiva śuśubhe raṅge 'cyutaḥ sāgrajaḥ // GarP_3,1.1 //
GP12garup3_u:13: yajantaḥ parayā bhaktyā viṣṇumādyaṃ jagadgurum // GarP_3,1.4 //
GP12garup3_u:21: teṣāṃ śiṣyapraśiṣyāṇāṃ saṃkhyā vaktuṃ na śaṅkyate // GarP_3,1.8 //
GP12garup3_u:25: kena sidhyettu sakalaṃ karma trividhamātmanaḥ // GarP_3,1.10 //
GP12garup3_u:27: sāṃja lirvākyamāha sma vinayāvanataḥ sudhīḥ // GarP_3,1.11 //
GP12garup3_u:30: sa etadakhilaṃ vetti vyāsaśiṣyo yatīśvaraḥ // GarP_3,1.12 //
GP12garup3_u:32: atha te ṛṣayo jagmuḥ puṇyaṃ siddhāśramaṃ tataḥ // GarP_3,1.13 //
GP12garup3_u:37: kena viṣṇuḥ prasannaḥ syātsa kathaṃ pūjyate naraiḥ // GarP_3,1.15 //
GP12garup3_u:41: natvā viṣṇuṃ śriyaṃ vāyuṃ bhāratīṃ śeṣasaṃjñakam /
GP12garup3_u:42: dvaipāyanaṃ guruṃ kṛṣṇaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāmati // GarP_3,1.17 //
GP12garup3_u:43: nāsti nārāyaṇasamaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup3_u:47: kartavyaṃ brūhi me brahmankṛpayā mama suvrata // GarP_3,1.19 //
GP12garup3_u:48: tataḥ śriyaṃ tato vāyuṃ bhāratīṃ ca tataḥ param /
GP12garup3_u:49: ante vyāsaṃ kimarthaṃ ca tvaṃ namaskṛtavānasi /
GP12garup3_u:50: sūtasūta mahābhāga brūhi kāraṇamatra ca // GarP_3,1.20 //
GP12garup3_u:52: ādau vandyaḥ sarvavedaikavedyo vede śāstre setihāse purāṇe /
GP12garup3_u:53: sattāṃ prāyo viṣṇurevaika eva prakāśate 'to namya eko harirhi //
GP12garup3_u:54: sarvatra mukhyastvadhikonyatopi sa eva namyo na ca śaṅkarādyāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:55: namanti ye 'vinayācchaṅkaraṃ tu vināyakaṃ caṇḍikāṃ reṇukāṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:56: tathā sūryaṃ bhairavaṃ mātāraśva tathā vāṇīṃ girijāṃ vai śriyaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:57: sarvepi te vaiṣṇavā naiva loke na tadbhaktā veti cāryā vadanti //
GP12garup3_u:58: na pārthikyānnamanaṃ kāryameva prīṇanti naitā devatāḥ pūjanena /
GP12garup3_u:59: pūjāṃ gṛhītvā devatāścaiva sarvāḥ kiñciddatvā phaladānena tāṃśca //
GP12garup3_u:60: saṃtarpya tuṣṭaiḥ svamanonu sārāttaiḥ kāritāṃ kāmyapūjāṃ tathaiva /
GP12garup3_u:61: nivedayitvā paradevatāyāṃ viṣṇau harau śrīpuruṣādivandye // GarP_3,1.25 //
GP12garup3_u:62: ihāparatrāpi sukhetarāṇi dāsyanti paścādadharaṃ vai tamaśca /
GP12garup3_u:63: ato hyete naiva pūjyā na namyā mokṣecchubhirbrāhmaṇādyairdvijendra //
GP12garup3_u:65: śrīkāmya yā ye tu bhajanti nityaṃ śrībrahmarudredrayamādidevān //
GP12garup3_u:66: iheva bhuñjanti mahacca duḥ khaṃ mahāpadaḥ kuṣṭhabhagandarādīn /
GP12garup3_u:68: abhiprāyaṃ tvatra vakṣye munīndrāḥ paraṃ gopyaṃ hṛdi dhāryaṃ hi taddhi /
GP12garup3_u:69: vāyoḥ pratīkaṃ pūjyameveha viprā na brahmarudrādipratīkameva //
GP12garup3_u:70: pūjākāle devadevasya viṣṇorvāyoḥ pratīkaṃ yogyabhāge nidhāya /
GP12garup3_u:71: antargataṃ tasya vāyorhariṃ ca lakṣmīpatiṃ pūjayitvā hi samyak //
GP12garup3_u:72: paścādvāyoḥ supratīkaṃ ca samyaṅ nirmālyaśeṣeṇa hareḥ samarcayet /
GP12garup3_u:73: pṛthakca sragdhūpavilepanādipūjāṃ prakurvanti ca ye vimūḍhaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:74: teṣāṃ duḥ khamiha loke paratra bhaviṣyate nātra vicāryamasti /
GP12garup3_u:75: prāyaścittaṃ svasti viprāḥ kathañcittatkurvantu smaraṇaṃ nāma viṣṇoḥ //
GP12garup3_u:77: namanti ye phalabuddhyā vibhūḍhāsteṣāṃ phalaṃ śāśvataṃ duḥ khameva //
GP12garup3_u:78: vāyoḥ pratīkaṃ yadi vipravaryaiḥ pratiṣṭhitaṃ cennamanaṃ hi kāryam /
GP12garup3_u:79: naivedyaśeṣeṇa hareśca viṣṇoḥ pūjā kṛtā cenna hi doṣaleśaḥ // GarP_3,1.34
GP12garup3_u:81: evaṃ viditvā paramaṃ hariṃ ca putraṃ punarmukhyadevasya vāyoḥ //
GP12garup3_u:82: namaskāro nānyathā vipravaryā ādhīyatāṃ hṛdi sarvai rahasyamam /
GP12garup3_u:83: ye vaiṣṇavā vaiṣṇa vadāsabhṛtyāḥ sarvepi te sarvadā viṣṇumeva //
GP12garup3_u:84: namanti ye vai pratipādayanti tathaiva puṇyāni ca sāttvikāni /
GP12garup3_u:85: namanti ye vāsudevaṃ hariṃ ca samyak svaśaktyā pratipādayanti //
GP12garup3_u:86: pravṛttimārgeṇa na pūjayanti hyāpatkāle paradaivaṃ tadanyam /
GP12garup3_u:87: te vaiṣṇavā vaiṣṇavadāsabhṛtyā anye ca sarve 'vaiṣṇavamātrakāḥ smṛtāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:89: tānevāhuḥ satpurāṇāni viprāḥ kalau yuge nābhyasūyanti sarve // GarP_3,1.39
GP12garup3_u:91: ato hyasūyanti sadā vimūḍhāḥ kalau hi viprāḥ pracurā hi tepi //
GP12garup3_u:92: na cāsti viṣṇoḥ sadṛśaṃ ca daivataṃ na cāsti vāyoḥ sadṛśo guruśca /
GP12garup3_u:93: na cāsti tīrthaṃ sadṛśaṃ viṣṇupadyāḥ na viṣṇubhaktena samosti bhaktaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:94: anyāni viṣṇoḥ pratipādakāni sarvāṇi te sāttvikānīti cāhuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:95: śrāvyāṇi tānyeva manuṣyaloke śrāvyāṇi nānyāni ca duḥ khadāni //
GP12garup3_u:96: kalau yuge sarva purāṇamadhye trīṇyeva mukhyāni haripriyāṇi /
GP12garup3_u:97: mukhyaṃ purāṇaṃ hi kalau nṛṇāṃ ca śreyaskaraṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇam //
GP12garup3_u:98: pūrvaṃ hi sṛṣṭiḥ pratipādyate tra yato hyato bhāgavataṃ paraṃ smṛtam /
GP12garup3_u:101: tenaiva siddhaṃ pravadanti sarvaṃ hyataḥ paraṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇam //
GP12garup3_u:102: tataḥ paraṃ viṣṇupurāṇamāhustataḥ paraṃ gāruḍasaṃjñakaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:103: trīṇyeva mukhyā ni kalau nṛṇāṃ tu tathā viśeṣo gāruḍe kiñcidasti //
GP12garup3_u:104: śṛṇudhvaṃ vai taṃ viśeṣaṃ ca viprāstryaṃśairyuktaṃ gāruḍākhyaṃ purāṇam /
GP12garup3_u:105: ādyāṃśaṃ vai karmakāṇḍaṃ vadanti dvitīyāṃśaṃ dharmakāṇḍaṃ tamāhuḥ //
GP12garup3_u:106: tṛtīyāṃśaṃ brahmakāṇḍaṃ vadanti teṣāṃ madhye tvantimoyaṃ variṣṭhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:108: tṛtīyāṃśe paṭhite vedatulyaṃ phalaṃ bhavennātra vicāryamasti /
GP12garup3_u:110: tṛtīyāṃśaśravaṇādarthataśca puṇyaṃ cāhuḥ paṭhato vai daśāṃśam /
GP12garup3_u:111: tato varaṃ matsyapurāṇamāhustato varaṃ kūrmapūrāṇamāhuḥ // GarP_3,1.50 //
GP12garup3_u:112: tathaiva vai vāyupurāṇamāhustrīṇyeva cāhuḥ sāttvikānīti loke /
GP12garup3_u:113: tatrāpi kiñcidveditavyaṃ bhavecca purāṇaṣaṭke sattvarūpe munīndrāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:114: sattvādhame mātsyakaurme tathāhurvāyu cāhuḥ sāttvikaṃ madhyamaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:115: viṣṇoḥ purāṇaṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ sattvottamaṃ gāruḍaṃ cāhurāryāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:116: skāndaṃ pādmaṃ vāmanaṃ vai varāhaṃ tathāgreyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ parvasṛṣṭau /
GP12garup3_u:118: rajaḥ prācuryādrājasānīti ca huḥ śrāvyāṇi naitāni mumukṣubhiḥ sadā /
GP12garup3_u:119: teṣāṃ madhye sāttvikāṃśāśca saṃti teṣāṃ śrutergāruḍīyaṃ phalaṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:120: brahmāṇḍalaiṅgye brahmavaivartakaṃ vai mārkaṃṇḍeyaṃ brāhmamādityakaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:121: etānyā hustāmasānīti viprāstatraikadeśaḥ sāttviko rājasaśca // GarP_3,1.55
GP12garup3_u:125: viṣṇudharmotaraṃ caiva tantraṃ bhāgavataṃ tathā // GarP_3,1.57 //
GP12garup3_u:127: tathā haṃsapurāṇaṃ ca ṣaḍetāni munīśvarāḥ // GarP_3,1.58 //
GP12garup3_u:135: purāṇaṃ bhāgavataṃ śaivaṃ nandiproktaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_3,1.62 //
GP12garup3_u:136: pāśupatyaṃ raiṇukaṃ ca bhairavaṃ ca tathaiva ca /
GP12garup3_u:139: sarveṣvapi purāṇeṣu śreṣṭhaṃ bhāgavataṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,1.64 //
GP12garup3_u:140: vedaistulya sama pāṭhe śravaṇe ca tadardhakam /
GP12garup3_u:141: arthataḥ śravaṇe cāsya puṇyaṃ daśaguṇaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,1.65 //
GP12garup3_u:147: daityāḥ sarva viprakuleṣu bhūtvā kṛte yuge bhārate ṣaṭsahasryām /
GP12garup3_u:148: niṣkāsya kāṃścinnavanirmitānāṃ niveśanaṃ tatra kurvanti nityam //
GP12garup3_u:149: matvā hariṃ bhagavānvyāsarūpī cakre tadā bhāgavataṃ purāṇam /
GP12garup3_u:150: tathā samākhyāya ca vaiṣṇavaṃ tattataḥ paraṃ gāruḍākhyaṃ sa cakre //
GP12garup3_u:151: ato hi gāruḍaṃ mukhyaṃ purāṇaṃ śāstrasaṃmatam /
GP12garup3_u:153: yathā surāṇāṃ pravaro janārdano yathāyudhānāṃ pravaraḥ sudarśanam /
GP12garup3_u:154: yathāśvamedhaḥ pravaraḥ kratūnāṃ chinneṣu bhakteṣu tathaiva rudraḥ //
GP12garup3_u:155: nadīṣu gaṅgā jalajeṣu padmamacchinnabhakteṣu tathaiva vāyuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:156: tathā purāṇeṣu ca gāruḍaṃ ca mukhyaṃ tadāhurharitattvadarśane //
GP12garup3_u:158: ato harirnamaskāryo gamyo yogyo hariḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,1.74 //
GP12garup3_u:160: paro narottamo vā sa sādhakeśopi ca smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,1.75 //
GP12garup3_u:167: vyāsasya namanaṃ hyante kathaṃ kāryaṃ mahātmanaḥ // GarP_3,1.78 //
GP12garup3_u:168: ante ca vandane tasya kāraṇaṃ brūhi suvrata /
GP12garup3_u:172: vyāso naiva samatvena prokto bhagavato hareḥ // GarP_3,1.80 //
GP12garup3_u:174: vyāsastu kaścana ṛṣiḥ purāṇe tāmase smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,1.81 //
GP12garup3_u:175: iti jñānā valaṃbena daityā daityānugaiḥ samāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:176: praviśanti hyandhatama iti tvante namaskṛtaḥ // GarP_3,1.82 //
GP12garup3_u:177: yadidaṃ paramaṃ gopyaṃ hṛdi dhāryaṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:178: parāṇāṃ namyamevoktaṃ pratipādyaṃ yatotra hi // GarP_3,1.83 //
GP12garup3_u:180: vāstavaṃ taṃ na jānīyurupajīvyo yato hariḥ // GarP_3,1.84 //
GP12garup3_u:186: bhūbhāraharaṇe viṣṇoḥ pradhānāṅgaṃ hi mārutiḥ // GarP_3,1.87 //
GP12garup3_u:187: vākyarūpā bhāratī tu dvitīyāṅgaṃ hi sā smṛtā /
GP12garup3_u:188: tṛtīyāṅga hareḥ śeṣo na namyāḥ sāmyato hareḥ // GarP_3,1.88 //
GP12garup3_u:190: avāntarāśca vāyvādyā na namyāstena te smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,1.89 //
GP12garup3_u:192: vācakāni yato nityaṃ tannamyāste munīśvarāḥ // GarP_3,1.90 //
GP12garup3_u:195: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe sūtaśaunakasaṃvāde uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe sāttvikādipurāṇavibhāganamyānamyadevavibhāgādiviṣayanirūpaṇaṃ nāma prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:199: sṛṣṭikramaṃ na jānāmi devānāṃ hyantaraṃ mune // GarP_3,2.1 //
GP12garup3_u:203: evameva kṛtaḥ praśro harau tu garuḍena vai /
GP12garup3_u:211: śṛkṛṣṇa uvāca mūlarūpe hyato jñeyo viṣṇutvādviṣṇuravyayaḥ // GarP_3,2.6 //
GP12garup3_u:213: aneko hyekatāṃ prāpya saṃśete pralayāya vai // GarP_3,2.7 //
GP12garup3_u:214: tatrāpi ca viśeṣosti jñātavyaṃ tatvameva saḥ // GarP_3,2.8 //
GP12garup3_u:217: tatraiva daśanādvāpi kṣiprameva tamo vrajet // GarP_3,2.9 //
GP12garup3_u:219: harirūpāstu te jñeyā ekībhūtā hi tena te // GarP_3,2.10 //
GP12garup3_u:220: praleya samanuprāpte jīvāḥ sa yānti māmakāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:221: virājṛpe hareḥ saṃti tadā te ca hyanekadhā // GarP_3,2.11 //
GP12garup3_u:223: biṃbena tu svayaṃ viṣṇurekībhāvaṃ vrajedyadi // GarP_3,2.12 //
GP12garup3_u:229: biṃbānāṃ mūlarūpasya bhedo nātra vivakṣitaḥ // GarP_3,2.15 //
GP12garup3_u:231: ekāṃśena tu biṃbaistu caikībhāvaṃ vrajanti te // GarP_3,2.16 //
GP12garup3_u:232: ekāṃśena tu jīvatve saṃsthitā nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:233: biṃbamūlaṃ na jānanti te janā hyasurāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,2.17 //
GP12garup3_u:234: eka eva hariḥ pūrvaṃ hyavidyāvaśataḥ svayam /
GP12garup3_u:236: evaṃ vadanti ye mūḍhā stepi yāntyadharaṃ tamaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:237: upādhirdvividhaḥ proktaḥ svarūpo bāhya eva ca // GarP_3,2.19 //
GP12garup3_u:239: sarvopādhivi nāśe hi pratibiṃbaḥ kathaṃ bhavet // GarP_3,2.20 //
GP12garup3_u:241: duḥ kharūpo hyupādhistu tamaso yedhikāriṇaḥ // GarP_3,2.21 //
GP12garup3_u:244: daityāḥ duḥ khāyate yasmāttasmāduḥ khī hariḥ svayam /
GP12garup3_u:247: parasparaṃ tathā bhedaṃ hyantaraṃ vā na cintayet // GarP_3,2.24 //
GP12garup3_u:249: anyonyaṃ nāṇumātraṃ ca bhedo bāhyāntarepi ca // GarP_3,2.25 //
GP12garup3_u:251: pratibiṃbasthito biṃbaḥ strīrūpo hyasti sarvadā // GarP_3,2.26 //
GP12garup3_u:253: ekībhāvaṃ nāpnuvanti viṃbena saha saṃsthitāḥ // GarP_3,2.27 //
GP12garup3_u:255: bhedastu nāṇumātraṃ ca śaṅkanīyaḥ kathañcana // GarP_3,2.28 //
GP12garup3_u:256: yadā hi śete pralayārṇave vibhurjīvāṃśca sarvānudare niveśya /
GP12garup3_u:260: evaṃ janāñjaṭhare saṃnidhāya samyakūśete hyaṃbhasi vai sa kalpe /
GP12garup3_u:261: lakṣmīstu sā sarvavedātmikā ca bhaktyā harau nityasaṃvardhitāpi //
GP12garup3_u:262: atyādaraṃ darśayatīva sā tu īḍe viṣṇuṃ bhaktisaṃvardhitāpi /
GP12garup3_u:263: ceṣṭādirūpeṇa tadā na kiñcidāsīdvinā viṣṇumatha śriyaṃ ca // GarP_3,2.32
GP12garup3_u:264: paryaṅkarūpeṇa vabhūva devī vāsasvarūpeṇa ramā vireje /
GP12garup3_u:265: sarvaṃ ramā saiva tadaiva cāsītsaikā devī bahurūpā babhāṣe // GarP_3,2.33
GP12garup3_u:267: tvaṃ brahma eko na caturmukhaśca nāhaṃ rudro na bṛhaspatiśca //
GP12garup3_u:268: viṣṇāveva brahmaśabdo hi mukhyo hyanyeṣvamukhyo brahmarudrādikeṣu /
GP12garup3_u:271: deśānantyaṃ guṇataḥ kālato vā nāstyānantyaṃ kvāpi deśe ca kāle //
GP12garup3_u:272: yadā nantyaṃ kimu vaktavyamatra guṇānantyaṃ nāsti brahmādikeṣu /
GP12garup3_u:273: yadyapyahaṃ deśataḥ kālataśca samastadā vāsudevena sārdham // GarP_3,2.37
GP12garup3_u:274: tathāpi me guṇato nāstyanantaṃ tato dharmā guṇatonantataśca /
GP12garup3_u:275: saṃti śrutāvaviruddhāśca deve cintyā hyacintyā bahudhā te hyanantāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:276: ato guṇāṃstava devasya viṣṇo stotuṃ sadā smo na hareḥ kadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:277: nāhaṃ na keśau na ca gīrna rudro na dakṣakanyā na ca menakāsutā //
GP12garup3_u:278: na vai biḍaujā na ca vā pulomajā na cedhmavāho na yamo na cānyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:279: na nārado nāpi bhṛgurvasiṣṭho na vighnapo nāpi balyādayaśca // GarP_3,2.40
GP12garup3_u:280: na vai virāṭo nāpi bhīmaḥ śaniśca na puṣkaro na kaśerustathaiva /
GP12garup3_u:281: na kinnarāḥ pitaro naiva devā gandharvamukhyā nāpi vā tuṣyasaṃjñāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:282: na vai kṣitīśā na ca mānuṣāśca viṣṇorna jānanti kimatra cānye /
GP12garup3_u:283: mattodhamaḥ kociguṇena brahmā samo hi tasya brahmaṇo mātariśva //
GP12garup3_u:285: buddhau samānau saṃsṛtau mokṣakāle parasparādhārasamanvitau ca //
GP12garup3_u:287: na śaktosau brahmadevo vivastuṃ vāyuṃ vinā saṃsṛtāveva nityam //
GP12garup3_u:288: na taṃ vinā mātariśvā ca vastumanyonyamāptiḥ kālato nyūnatā ca /
GP12garup3_u:290: tadā vāyurnāśakadvai mahātmā bāhye sṛṣṭau kālabhedena cāsti /
GP12garup3_u:291: sarasvatī bhāratī brahmaṇastu saṃvatsarānantaraṃ saṃbabhūva // GarP_3,2.46
GP12garup3_u:292: yadā daśābdāḥ samatītā mahātmā tadā vāyuḥ samabhūllokapūjyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:295: giraḥ sakāśātkālato nyūnatāsti vāyostadā hyadhamattve kṣatiḥ kā //
GP12garup3_u:298: śeṣastvindro rudra ete trayaśca samā hyete jñānabalādikeṣvapi tathāpi teṣāṃ kālato nyūnatāsti kālopi teṣāṃ dvivyesahasravarṣam // GarP_3,2.50 //
GP12garup3_u:299: anantarudro brahmavāyū yathā vā tathā jñeyo naiva hāniḥ svarūpe /
GP12garup3_u:300: sthūlasya sṛṣṭau bāhyasṛṣṭau mahātmankālānnyūnatvaṃ sa mayā naiva cintyaḥ // GarP_3,2.51
GP12garup3_u:301: teṣāṃ sakāśādvāruṇī pārvatī ca sauparṇīnāmnī tistra etā mahātman /
GP12garup3_u:303: indro varo rudrabhāryādikebhya evaṃ jñānaṃ sarvadā dehyamandam /
GP12garup3_u:304: evaṃ jñānaṃ yasya bhavecca loke sa vai jñānī vedavedyaḥ sa eva //
GP12garup3_u:305: na vai jñānītyantaraṃ yo na veda sa vedavādī na ca vedapāṭhakaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:307: tāvanti harināmāni priyāṇi ca hareḥsadā // GarP_3,2.55 //
GP12garup3_u:308: mama svāmī harirnityaṃ dāsohaṃ sarvadā hareḥ /
GP12garup3_u:309: brahmādyā devatāḥ sarvā guravo me yathākramam // GarP_3,2.56 //
GP12garup3_u:310: eteṣāṃ ca hariḥ svāmī vede sarvatra gīyate /
GP12garup3_u:311: evaṃ jānaṃstu yo vedānsaṃpaṭhetsa dvijottamaḥ // GarP_3,2.57 //
GP12garup3_u:314: jñānābhimānī vedamānī ubhau tu parasparaṃ hyūcatuḥ sarvadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:315: jalaṃ vedo yatra vāso murārerācāryāṇāṃ saṃgadoṣāddvijānām // GarP_3,2.59
GP12garup3_u:316: mahāparādhāḥ saṃti loke mahātmansahasraśaḥ śataśaḥ koṭiśaśca /
GP12garup3_u:317: hariśca tānkṣamate sarvadaiva nāmatrayasmaraṇādvai kupāluḥ // GarP_3,2.60
GP12garup3_u:319: dṛṣṭvāparādhaṃ tasya viṣṇurmahātmā hāhākāraṃ kurute krodhabuddhyā //
GP12garup3_u:320: uttiṣṭha govinda suvedavedya sovyātkṛtākhyo mayi samyak prasīda /
GP12garup3_u:321: bho keśavottiṣṭha sukhasvarūpa sṛṣṭau vyaye vartayituṃ samarthaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:322: sṛṣṭvā brahmāṇaṃ prerayetpūjyasṛṣṭau sṛṣṭvā rudraṃ prerayetsaṃhṛtau ca /
GP12garup3_u:324: hare murāre svāpahīnādya tiṣṭha kalpā dikānantarajñāna (raṃ buddhi) (jāna)
GP12garup3_u:326: samyag dṛṣṭvā karmadṛṣṭyā mahātmallaṃbdhaṃ tamo dāhi duḥ khasvarūpam //
GP12garup3_u:328: tasmādāhurduḥ svarūpī haristvaṃ duḥ khasvarūpāttvaṃ ca duḥ khī hare tvam
GP12garup3_u:329: uttiṣṭha nārāyaṇa vāsudeva hyuttiṣṭha kṛṣṇācyuta mādhaveti /
GP12garup3_u:330: uttiṣṭha vaikuṇṭha dayārdramūrte uttiṣṭha lakṣmīśa namonamaste //
GP12garup3_u:331: uttiṣṭha madhveśa sarasvatīśa uttiṣṭha rudreśa tathāṃbikeśa /
GP12garup3_u:332: uttiṣṭha candreśa tathā śacīśa vipreśa bhakteśa gaveśa nityam //
GP12garup3_u:333: śāstrapriyottiṣṭha ṛci priyastvaṃ yajuḥ priyottiṣṭha nidānamūrte /
GP12garup3_u:334: sāmapriyastvaṃ ca tathā murāre atharvavedapriya sarvadā tvam //
GP12garup3_u:337: evaṃ stuto viṣṇurajaḥ purāṇo hyatitvarāvānutthito nityabaddhaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:338: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe kṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe brahmāviṣṇumaheśvarādidevatātāramyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvitīyo
GP12garup3_u:342: babhūvecchā mama devasya viṣṇoḥ sraṣṭuṃ sṛjyānmokṣayogyāṃśca moktum /
GP12garup3_u:343: icchāśaktiḥ sarvadaivāsti viṣṇostathāpi tadvyāharaṇaṃ ca laukikam //
GP12garup3_u:344: tadā harirjagṛhe laukikaṃ ca tamaḥ pānaṃ tena rūpeṇa cakre /
GP12garup3_u:345: tadrūpamāhuḥ prākṛtaṃ vai tadajñā hyandhaṃ tamaḥ praviśantyeva sarve //
GP12garup3_u:347: pūrṇaṃ ca tatparaṃ rūpaṃ pūrṇātpūrṇāḥ samudgatāḥ // GarP_3,3.3 //
GP12garup3_u:350: pūrvarūpaṃ ca pūrṇaṃ ca pūrṇaṃ padavitāragam? /
GP12garup3_u:353: tasya dṛrṣṭi vinā nānyo layaḥ kṛṣṇādinā kvacit // GarP_3,3.6 //
GP12garup3_u:354: tattve pīḍā na kartavyā tayā duḥ khāni vindati /
GP12garup3_u:356: jñātavyāṃśe tu pīḍā tu kartavyā guruṇā saha /
GP12garup3_u:357: tamantevāsinaṃ cāhuḥ sa eva cu guruḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,3.8 //
GP12garup3_u:360: guruṇāpi samaṃ hāsyaṃ kartavyaṃ kuṭilaṃ vinā /
GP12garup3_u:363: sākṣāddhariḥ puruṣaḥ piṅgalākṣaḥ svamāyāyāṃ guṇamayyāṃ mahātmā /
GP12garup3_u:366: vīryasvarūpaṃ brūhi me vāsudeva vīrye tvadīye saṃśayo me vibhāti /
GP12garup3_u:367: kiṃ vīryamīśasya svarūpabhūtaṃ kiṃ vā vibhinnaṃ vada sādhu vetsi //
GP12garup3_u:371: bhinnaṃ tadāhuḥ prākṛtameva cāhuḥ svanābhipadmādikavacca bodhyam /
GP12garup3_u:372: naitāvatā jñānarūpasya viṣṇorna vīryahāniriti cintanīyam // GarP_3,3.14 //
GP12garup3_u:373: vīryasvarūpī bhagavānvā sudevaḥ sarvatra deśepi ca sarvakāle /
GP12garup3_u:374: sarvārthavānyadi na syātkhagendra tarhīśvaraḥ puruṣo naiva sa syāt //
GP12garup3_u:376: ubhe rūpe vīryavatī khagendra tayorabhedaścintanīyo hi samyakū //
GP12garup3_u:379: strīrūpavannaiva vicintanīyaṃ napuṃsakaṃ tbasya janyaṃ hi viddhi //
GP12garup3_u:380: napuṃsakaṃ navaiva svarūpabhūtamato harau nāsti vicintanīyam /
GP12garup3_u:384: strīrūpabhūte viṃbe tu strīrūpāḥ santi sarvadā // GarP_3,3.20 //
GP12garup3_u:385: sthitau tatra nimittaṃ ca brūhi kṛṣṇa mama prabho // GarP_3,3.21 //
GP12garup3_u:392: nārāyaṇo nāma hariḥ svatantraḥ śriyā vinā nāsti kadāpi tārkṣya /
GP12garup3_u:394: hariṃ vinā śrīrapi deśakāle nāstīti mokṣecchubhireva vedyam /
GP12garup3_u:395: yasyāmadhādvīryamanukṣaṇaṃ ca sā māmikā cendrajālā tmiketi // GarP_3,3.25
GP12garup3_u:396: vadanti ye asurā mūḍharūpā adhaṃmataḥ praviśantyeva sarve /
GP12garup3_u:397: māyā nāma prakṛtistvemāhuḥ susūkṣmarūpā na tu cendrajālikā // GarP_3,3.26
GP12garup3_u:398: tasyābhimānaḥ śrīriti veditavyo vīryādhānaṃ tatra teṣāṃ ca melaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:399: kāryonmukhaṃ melanaṃ cāhurāryā ito rūpaṃ nāhurāyyāśca viṣṇoḥ //
GP12garup3_u:400: sānādi nityā satyarūpā ca viṣṇormithyā rūpā sā kathaṃ syātkhagendra /
GP12garup3_u:403: anādinityā yadi na syātkhagendra suśūkṣmarūpeṇa na kāraṇaṃ syāt //
GP12garup3_u:404: sūkṣmeṇa rūpeṇa ca kāraṇaṃ syāt tarhi prapañcasya ca kāraṇaṃ vada /
GP12garup3_u:405: avidyāyā vaśato viṣṇureva nānārūpairdṛśyate viṣṇureva // GarP_3,3.30 //
GP12garup3_u:406: śāstrajñānānnāśameti hyavidyā na saṃśayo hariṇā caikyameti /
GP12garup3_u:407: evaṃ brūṣe yadi vādatkhagendra vakṣyehaṃ te tatra yuktiṃ śṛṇu tvam //
GP12garup3_u:408: sarvajñarūpasya hi me murāreḥ kathaṃ harerghaṭate hyajñatā ca /
GP12garup3_u:409: sūrye yathā tamo nāsti tathā nārāyaṇe harau /
GP12garup3_u:410: ajñānaṃ nāsti pakṣīdra kathaṃ tatvaṃ bravīṣyaho // GarP_3,3.32 //
GP12garup3_u:412: sarvajñosau kutra pakṣīndra viṣṇuralpajñajīvo jñānaśūnyaśca kutra //
GP12garup3_u:413: viruddhayoścānayoḥ sarvadaiva kathaṃ caikyaṃ saṃvādiṣyanti vedāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:414: deśe kāle sarvadā dduḥ khahīno jagatkartā pūrṇaśaktiḥ sadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:415: jīvaḥ sadā svalpakartāsti pūrṇaḥ saṃsārarūpe duḥ kharūpe ca nityam /
GP12garup3_u:417: ye vaiṣṇavā vaiṣṇavadāsavaśyāsteṣāṃ drohaṃ sarvadā saṃcaredyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:419: māyī sadā māyibhṛtyastathāpi bhedajñānānnindyate kāryate ca /
GP12garup3_u:420: tenāpi teṣāṃ duḥ khavṛddhirbhavecca hyadhaṃ tamaḥ punarāvṛttihīnam //
GP12garup3_u:421: khagendrātaḥ prakṛtiḥ sūkṣmarūpā sā nityā sā satyabhūtā sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:422: evaṃ svayaṃ kālavāyvādikānāṃ parā (ramā)ṇavaḥ satyarūpāśca santi //
GP12garup3_u:424: padārthānāṃ pārthivānāṃ khagendra viśeṣāṇāṃ caramākhyo viśeṣaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:425: sa evaḥ syātparamāṇurdvijendra yontyovi (va) śeṣovayavaśca sa smṛtaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:427: he kṛṣṇa he mādhava sāttvatāṃ pate padārthānāṃ caramāṃśaḥ parāṇu //
GP12garup3_u:428: iti proktaṃ tatra me saṃśayosti yontyo viśeṣaḥ sa tu nāṃśayuktaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:429: yo hyaṃśayukto na tu soṃtyo viśeṣa evaṃ mamābhāti vacastu tathyam //
GP12garup3_u:431: ya eva loke saṃsthitā mānuṣāstu viśeṣāṇāṃ darśane śaktiyuktāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:432: tathāpi te yasya cāṃśitvameva viśeṣaṃ vai naiva draṣṭuṃ samarthāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:434: ye kāṇādā gautamādyāḥ khagendra niraṃśakaṃ paramāṇuṃ vadanti //
GP12garup3_u:435: anantāṃśaiḥ saṃyutatvepi tāṃśca niraṃśino bhrāntidṛṣṭyā vadanti /
GP12garup3_u:437: parā (ramā) ṇūnāmekadeśe khagendra tanno saṃti prāṇināṃ rāśayaśca /
GP12garup3_u:438: pratyekaśa saṃti rūpā hareśca hyataśca tatparamāṇoraṇīyaḥ // GarP_3,3.46
GP12garup3_u:439: yo vā tvaṇīyānparamasya viṣṇoḥ sa eva rūpo mahato mahīyān /
GP12garup3_u:440: teṣāmanyonyaṃ na viśeṣosti kaścidacintyarūpe ca vicintanīyaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:444: ānantyaṃ trividhaṃ nityaṃ harernānyasya kasyacit // GarP_3,3.49 //
GP12garup3_u:450: vyāptatvaṃ deśato hyasti sarvabhūteṣu yadyāpi // GarP_3,3.52 //
GP12garup3_u:451: na ca bhedaḥ kvacittasya hyaṇumātrepi yujyate /
GP12garup3_u:454: yattasya vyāpakaṃ rūpaṃ paraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ viduḥ // GarP_3,3.54 //
GP12garup3_u:458: tathaiva jaḍajīvānāṃ nityaṃ bhedo jaḍeśayoḥ // GarP_3,3.56 //
GP12garup3_u:459: pañca bhedā ime nityaṃ sarvāvasthāsu sarvaśaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:460: etādṛśyāṃ tu māyāyāṃ vīryamādhatta vīryavān // GarP_3,3.57 //
GP12garup3_u:462: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhagavadvīryasvarūpatadādhānadvārakaguṇatraya sṛṣṭijaḍeśabhedādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:471: antaraṃ ye vijānanti te yāntyandhantamaḥ param /
GP12garup3_u:474: sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ ca rajasā brahmaṇi prāviśaddhariḥ // GarP_3,4.5 //
GP12garup3_u:475: ādyo brahmā sa vijñeyo na tu sākṣāddhariḥ svayam /
GP12garup3_u:476: tamasāpi samānhantuṃ rudre ca prāviśaddhariḥ // GarP_3,4.6 //
GP12garup3_u:477: rudre sthito rudrasaṃjño na rudrastu hariḥ svayam /
GP12garup3_u:478: viṣṇureva hariḥ sākṣāttāvubhauna harī smṛtau // GarP_3,4.7 //
GP12garup3_u:480: evaṃ jñātvā mokṣameti nānyathā tu kathañcana // GarP_3,4.8 //
GP12garup3_u:482: te yānti narakaṃ ghoraṃ punarāvṛttivarjitam // GarP_3,4.9 //
GP12garup3_u:484: kāryonmukhaṃ yathā bhūyātkṣobhayāmāsa vai tathā // GarP_3,4.10 //
GP12garup3_u:497: apikṣitaṃ ca tatrādau guṇasāmyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:499: rāśibhūtaṃ guṇānāṃ tu darśayiṣye sthitiṃ ca vai /
GP12garup3_u:504: mūlaprakṛtijā hyete na mūlā prakṛtiḥ smṛtā // GarP_3,4.19 //
GP12garup3_u:506: ataḥ prakṛtijā jñeyā na mūlāste khageśvara // GarP_3,4.20 //
GP12garup3_u:508: uktaṃ svarūpaṃ teṣāṃ tu tava samyak khageśvara // GarP_3,4.21 //
GP12garup3_u:510: rajastamobhyāṃ garuḍa hyavimiśraṃ hyatastu tat // GarP_3,4.22 //
GP12garup3_u:511: kevalaṃ sattvamityuktaṃ na tu śreṣṭhatvataḥ prabho /
GP12garup3_u:512: sṛṣṭikāle kevalaṃ syātpralaye miśritaṃ bhavet // GarP_3,4.23 //
GP12garup3_u:514: sarvadāpi vimiśraṃ ca sattvarāśiṃ dvijottama // GarP_3,4.24 //
GP12garup3_u:515: ye vijānanti te sarve viśanti hyadharaṃ tamaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:519: sattvaṃ ca miśritaṃ jñeyaṃ nānyathā pakṣisattama /
GP12garup3_u:520: rajasaḥ śatabhāgānāṃ madhye tu vinatāsuta // GarP_3,4.27 //
GP12garup3_u:524: rāśibhūtepi tamasi sattvaṃ ca vinatāsuta // GarP_3,4.29 //
GP12garup3_u:526: miśritaṃ bhavatītyevaṃ jñātavyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,4.30 //
GP12garup3_u:528: ya eko bhāga uddiṣṭastāvatparimitaṃ rajaḥ // GarP_3,4.31 //
GP12garup3_u:534: tatra me saṃśayo hyasti śṛṇu tvaṃ sāttvatāṃ pate /
GP12garup3_u:535: yadrāśyāṃ yadrā śibhāgā hyadhikāḥ saṃti yāvatā // GarP_3,4.34 //
GP12garup3_u:538: uvāca para maprītyā saṃstuvan garuḍaṃ hariḥ /
GP12garup3_u:541: miśritaṃ cāpi pakṣīndra na sattavamiti kīrtyate /
GP12garup3_u:544: evaṃ mayoktā garuḍa guṇānāṃ nijasaṃsthitiḥ // GarP_3,4.38 //
GP12garup3_u:546: rāśīkṛtācca rajasaḥ janyaṃ yacca kageśvara // GarP_3,4.39 //
GP12garup3_u:548: pralaye samanuprāpte mahattattve sthitaṃ rajaḥ // GarP_3,4.40 //
GP12garup3_u:549: dvādaśāṃśena tu hyaddhā vibhaktaṃ bhavatiṃ prabho /
GP12garup3_u:550: rāśībhūte hi sattve tu daśabhāgena miśritam // GarP_3,4.41 //
GP12garup3_u:552: tamorāśyā miśritaṃ ca bhavatyeva na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,4.42 //
GP12garup3_u:554: miśritaṃ bhavatītyevaṃ jñātavyaṃ nānyathā kvacit // GarP_3,4.43 //
GP12garup3_u:556: evaṃ layastu jñātavyo hṛdi tattvārthavodibhiḥ // GarP_3,4.44 //
GP12garup3_u:558: guṇasāmyamiti prāhurevaṃ jānīhi vai khaga // GarP_3,4.45 //
GP12garup3_u:559: anyathā ye vijānanti te yānti hyadharaṃ tamaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:563: kathaṃ brūhi mahābhāga etattattvaṃ samāsataḥ // GarP_3,4.47 //
GP12garup3_u:567: idānīṃ guṇavaiṣamyaṃ śṛṇu samyaṅ mama priya /
GP12garup3_u:568: sṛṣṭikāle tu saṃprāpte yatpūrvaṃ pralaye khaga // GarP_3,4.49 //
GP12garup3_u:569: daśabhāgaiśca sattve tu miśritaṃ yadra jastathā /
GP12garup3_u:572: evaṃ dvādaśabhāgaiśca praviṣṭaṃ sarvaśo rajaḥ // GarP_3,4.51 //
GP12garup3_u:575: miśritaṃ bhavati hyaddhā mahattattvaṃ tadā smṛtam /
GP12garup3_u:583: tatraikāṃśastamaḥ proktaḥ tribhāgo raja eva ca // GarP_3,4.56 //
GP12garup3_u:585: caturbhāgātmakaṃ proktaṃ mahattattvaṃ śrutaṃ mayā // GarP_3,4.57 //
GP12garup3_u:590: mūlasattve miśritaṃ ca daśabhāgena yadrajaḥ // GarP_3,4.59 //
GP12garup3_u:591: tatsarvaṃ ca militvaiva tveko bhāgastu kīrtitaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:592: mūle rajasi yaccokto rajobhāgaḥ khageśvara // GarP_3,4.60 //
GP12garup3_u:594: mūle tamasi yaccokto rajobhāgastathaiva ca // GarP_3,4.61 //
GP12garup3_u:596: tathā mūle ca tamasi hyeko bhāgastamaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,4.62 //
GP12garup3_u:605: evaṃ hi śrūyate kṛṣṇa saṃśayo metra bādhate // GarP_3,4.66 //
GP12garup3_u:608: tribhāgabhūte rajasi tathā dvādaśadhāpi ca // GarP_3,4.67 //
GP12garup3_u:610: praviṣṭamastīti khaga jñātavyaṃ tacchaṇu dvija // GarP_3,4.68 //
GP12garup3_u:612: praviṣṭamastīti khaga vaktavyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,4.69 //
GP12garup3_u:615: evaṃ ca militānbhāgānvakṣye śṛṇu mahāmate // GarP_3,4.70 //
GP12garup3_u:617: trayodaśāṃśā vijñeyā dvādaśāśaṃ rajaḥ smṛtam // GarP_3,4.71 //
GP12garup3_u:619: ādau tu dvādaśāṃśeṣu bhāgānvakṣyāmi tacchṛṇu // GarP_3,4.72 //
GP12garup3_u:623: ekāṃśastu rajo jñeyastamo hyekā daśādhikam // GarP_3,4.74 //
GP12garup3_u:625: sattvabhāga iti jñeyo mahattattve khageśvara // GarP_3,4.75 //
GP12garup3_u:629: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe kṛṣṇa garuḍasaṃvāde tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe guṇavaiṣamyabhedabrahmadehasvarūpaguṇasāmyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:631: etādṛśe mahattattve lakṣmyā saha hariḥ svayam /
GP12garup3_u:632: praviveśa mahābhāga kṣobhayāmāsa vai hariḥ // GarP_3,5.1 //
GP12garup3_u:638: sahasrābdācca paścāttau jātau khagaharau dvija // GarP_3,5.4 //
GP12garup3_u:640: kṣobhayāmāsa bhagavāllaṅkṣmyā saha hariḥ svayam // GarP_3,5.5 //
GP12garup3_u:642: tridhā babhūva rudropi yatasteṣāṃ niyāmakaḥ // GarP_3,5.6 //
GP12garup3_u:644: tāmase tu sthito rudrastāmaso hyabhidhīyate // GarP_3,5.7 //
GP12garup3_u:645: taijase tu sthito rudro loke vai taijasaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:646: taijase tu hyahantattve lakṣmyā saha hariḥ svayam // GarP_3,5.8 //
GP12garup3_u:648: śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇameva ca // GarP_3,5.9 //
GP12garup3_u:654: anantaraṃ ca sauparṇī gaurojāpi tathaiva ca // GarP_3,5.12 //
GP12garup3_u:656: utpattiriti vijñeyaṃ krameṇa tu khageśvara // GarP_3,5.13 //
GP12garup3_u:658: tārkṣya hyanantarau jñeyau muktau saṃsāra eva ca // GarP_3,5.14 //
GP12garup3_u:662: bṛhaspatistathā dakṣa ete pāṇyātmakāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,5.16 //
GP12garup3_u:680: pāyośca mānino vīndra jajñire tadanantaram // GarP_3,5.25 //
GP12garup3_u:686: vittapaḥ sapta vasava ukto hyāgnistathāṣṭamaḥ // GarP_3,5.28 //
GP12garup3_u:687: satyānāṃ śṛṇu nāmāni droṇaḥ prāṇo dhruvastathā /
GP12garup3_u:688: arke doṣastathā vaskaḥ saptamastu vibhāvasuḥ // GarP_3,5.29 //
GP12garup3_u:690: daśa rudrasya nāmāni śṛṇuṣva dvijasattama // GarP_3,5.30 //
GP12garup3_u:693: daśa rudrā iti proktāḥ ṣaḍādityāñchṛṇu dvija /
GP12garup3_u:698: savitā hyaryamā dhātā pūṣā tvaṣṭā tathā bhagaḥ // GarP_3,5.34 //
GP12garup3_u:702: śṛṇu nāmāni teṣāṃ tu purūravārdravasaṃjñakau // GarP_3,5.36 //
GP12garup3_u:707: dyāvā pṛthivyau vijñeyau ete ca ṣaḍaśītayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:716: rūpābhimānī saṃjajñe vyāno nāma mahānprabho // GarP_3,5.43 //
GP12garup3_u:718: apāṃ nāthāśca catvāro marutaḥ parikīrtitāḥ // GarP_3,5.44 //
GP12garup3_u:728: pitṝṇāṃ saptakaṃ caivetyādyāḥ saṃjajñire khaga // GarP_3,5.49 //
GP12garup3_u:730: varuṇasya patnī gaṅgā parjanyākhyo vibhāvasuḥ // GarP_3,5.50 //
GP12garup3_u:738: budhastu candraputro yaḥ svāhāyā adhamaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,5.54 //
GP12garup3_u:739: uṣā nāma tathā jajñe budhasyānantaraṃ khaga /
GP12garup3_u:740: uṣānāmā bhimānī tu hyaśvibhāryā prakīrtitā // GarP_3,5.55 //
GP12garup3_u:741: budhādhamā sā vijñeyā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup3_u:742: tataḥ śanaiścaro jajñe pṛthivyātmeti viśrutaḥ // GarP_3,5.56 //
GP12garup3_u:746: praviveśa sa deveśastattveṣu ramayā sahā // GarP_3,5.58 //
GP12garup3_u:747: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe tattvābhimāni devatotpattitattāratamyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:751: svesve hyāyatane svāṅge tadarthaṃ ca khageśvara // GarP_3,6.1 //
GP12garup3_u:753: cintyācintyaguṇe viṣṇau viruddhāḥ saṃti sadguṇāḥ // GarP_3,6.2 //
GP12garup3_u:755: kva śaktiriti buddhyā sā vrīḍayāvanatābravīt // GarP_3,6.3 //
GP12garup3_u:757: natāsmi te nātha padāravindaṃ na veda cānyaccaraṇādṛte tava /
GP12garup3_u:758: tvayīśvare saṃti guṇāḥ śrutāstu tathāśrutāḥ saṃti ca devadeva //
GP12garup3_u:759: samyak sṛṣṭaṃ svāyatanaṃ ca datvā govinda dāmodara māṃ ca pāhi /
GP12garup3_u:760: stutyā madīyaśca sukhakapūrṇaḥ priyo jano nāsti tathā tvadanyaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:762: lakṣmīpate sarvajagannivāsa tvaṃ jñānasiṃdhuḥ kva ca viśvamūrte /
GP12garup3_u:763: ahaṃ kva cājñastava vai śaktirasti hyajñohaṃ vai hyalpaśaktirmamāsti //
GP12garup3_u:765: tava prasādādasti jagannivāsa tatra svāmitvaṃ nāsti viṣṇo sadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:766: na dehi tvaṃ sarvadā me murāre ahaṃmamatvaṃ prāpyametāvadeva /
GP12garup3_u:767: gamyajñānaṃ yogyaguṇe rameśa pramādo vā nāstināstyadya nitya // GarP_3,6.8
GP12garup3_u:768: tanme hṛṣīkāṇi patantyasatpathe padāravinde tu patantu sarvadā /
GP12garup3_u:769: lakṣmyā hyahaṃ koṭiguṇena hīnaḥ stotuṃ sāmarthyaṃ nāsti me suprasīda //
GP12garup3_u:770: iti stavaṃ viṣṇuguṇānvidhātā tārkṣyasthitaḥ prāñjalistasya cāgre /
GP12garup3_u:771: tadā vāyurdevadevo mahātmā dṛṣṭvā viṣṇu bhaktisaṃvardhitātmā //
GP12garup3_u:774: ete hi devāstava bhṛtyabhūtāḥ padāravindaṃ paramaṃ sudurlabham //
GP12garup3_u:776: dṛṣṭvā hareḥ saiva māyaiva tāvatsukāraṇaṃ kiñcidanyanna cāsti //
GP12garup3_u:778: lokasya kṛṣṇādvimukhasya karmaṇā apuṇyaśīlasya suduḥ khitasya //
GP12garup3_u:780: gobhūsurāṇāṃ ca mahīruhāṇāṃ tathā surāṇāṃ pravarāvatāraiḥ // GarP_3,6.14
GP12garup3_u:781: kṣemopakārāṇi ca vāsudeva krīḍanvidhatte na ca kiñcidanyat /
GP12garup3_u:782: mano na tṛpyatyapi śaṃsatāṃ naḥ sukarmamauleścaritāmṛtāni // GarP_3,6.15
GP12garup3_u:783: acchinnabhaktasya hi me mukunda sadā bhaktiṃ dehi pādāravinde /
GP12garup3_u:784: sadā tadevāstu na kiñcidanyadyatra tvamāsīḥ puruṣe devadeva // GarP_3,6.16
GP12garup3_u:785: ahaṃ ca tatrāsmi tava prasādādyatrāsmyahaṃ tatra bhavānmahāprabho /
GP12garup3_u:786: vyaṃsirmameyaṃ ca śarīramadhye caturmukhaścaiva na caitatadanyaiḥ //
GP12garup3_u:787: madīyanidrā tava vandanaṃ prabho madīyayāmācaraṇaṃ pradakṣiṇam /
GP12garup3_u:788: madīyavyākhyāharaṇaṃ stutiḥ syādevaṃ viditvā ca samarpayāmi // GarP_3,6.18
GP12garup3_u:789: madbrṛddhiyogyaṃ ca padārthajātaṃ dṛṣṭvā hareḥ pratimā eva tacca /
GP12garup3_u:790: itthaṃ matvāhaṃ sarvadā devadeva tatrasthitānharirūpān bhajiṣye //
GP12garup3_u:791: yaccandanaṃ yattu puṣpaṃ ca dhūpaṃ vastraṃ ca yadbhakṣyabhojyādikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:794: viṣṇudruhāṃ chedayiṣye ca jihvāṃ tacchṛṇvatāṃ pūrayiṣye trapūlkāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:795: etādṛśī śaktirmamāsti deva tava prasādādbra linopi viṣṇo /
GP12garup3_u:796: athāpi nāhaṃ stavane samarthaḥ lakṣmyā hyahaṃ koṭiguṇairvihīnaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:797: etatstotraṃ hyarthayeccaiva yā naḥ tatra prītirhyakṣayā me sadā syāt /
GP12garup3_u:798: stotraṃ hyetatpāṭhayantīha loke te vaiṣṇavāste ca haripriyāśca //
GP12garup3_u:799: kurvanti ye paṭhanaṃ nityameva samarpayiṣyati sadā harau ca /
GP12garup3_u:800: teṣāṃ hariḥ prīyate keśavolaṃ harau prasanne kimalabhyamasti //
GP12garup3_u:801: evaṃ stutvā valadevo mahātmā tūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ prāñjaliragrato hareḥ /
GP12garup3_u:803: ko vā rasajño bhagavan murāre hare guṇastavanātkīrtanādvā // GarP_3,6.25
GP12garup3_u:805: yaḥ karṇanāḍīṃ puruṣasya yāto bhavapradāṃ deharatiṃ chinatti //
GP12garup3_u:807: paśvādirūpeṣu dhanādikeṣu anarghyaratneṣu priyaṃ chinātti // GarP_3,6.27
GP12garup3_u:808: anaṃ tavedapratipāditopi lakṣmīrna vai veda tava svarūpam /
GP12garup3_u:809: caturmukho naiva veda na vāyurasau na vettīti kimatra citram //
GP12garup3_u:810: etādṛśasya stavane kvāsti śaktirmama prabho brahmavāyvoḥ sakāśāt /
GP12garup3_u:811: śatairguṇaiḥ sarvadā nyūnatāsti ato hare dayayā māṃ ca pāhi // GarP_3,6.29
GP12garup3_u:812: evaṃ stutvā hariṃ sā tu tūṣṇīmāsa khagaśvara /
GP12garup3_u:813: bhāratī tu tadā stotuṃ hariṃ samupacakrame // GarP_3,6.30 //
GP12garup3_u:815: brahmeśa lakṣmīśa hare murāre guṇāṃstava śraddadhānasya nityam /
GP12garup3_u:816: tathā stuvantosya vivardhamānāṃ matiṃ ca nityaṃ viṣayeṣvasatsu //
GP12garup3_u:817: kurvanti vairāgyamamutra loke tataḥ paraṃ bhaktidṛḍhāṃ tathaiva /
GP12garup3_u:818: tataḥ paraṃ caiva hareḥ prasannatāṃ kurvanti nityaṃ tava devadeva //
GP12garup3_u:819: tenāparokṣaṃ ca bhavecca tasya ato guṇānāṃ stavane ca me ratiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:820: sā tu prajātā puruṣasya nityaṃ saṃsāraduḥ khaṃ tu tadācchinatti //
GP12garup3_u:822: harerguṇānastuvatāṃ ca pāpaṃ teṣāṃ hi puṇyaṃ ca tathā kṣiṇoti //
GP12garup3_u:823: evaṃ viditvā paramo gururmama vāyurdayālurmama vallabhaśca /
GP12garup3_u:825: uddhṛtya puṇyebhya ivārtabandhuḥ śivaśca no druhyati puṇyakīrtim /
GP12garup3_u:826: tava prasādācca śriyaḥ prasādādvāyoḥ prasādācca mamāsti nityam //
GP12garup3_u:828: vāyorvirodhaṃ na karoti devaḥ sa tadvirodhaṃ ca karoti nityam //
GP12garup3_u:829: harervirodhaṃ na karoti vāyurvāyorvirodhaṃ na karoti viṣṇuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:830: vāyoḥ prasādānmamanāsti kiñcidatānabhāvaśca tava prasādāt // GarP_3,6.38
GP12garup3_u:831: yathaiva mūlaṃ ca tathāvatāre duḥ khādikaṃ nāsti samīraṇasya /
GP12garup3_u:832: vāyustathānye ca ubhau mukundastathāvatāreṣu na duḥ kharūpau //
GP12garup3_u:834: narāvatāre tatra deve murāre hyaśaktatā neti vicaṃ tanīyam // GarP_3,6.40
GP12garup3_u:835: avatārarūpe yamaduḥ khādikaṃ ca na cintanīyaṃ jñānibhirdevadeva /
GP12garup3_u:837: naitāvatā mama vāyośca nityaṃ duḥ khātanaṃ naiva saṃcitanīyam /
GP12garup3_u:838: etādṛśohaṃ stavanenu kāsti śaktirguṇānāṃ madhusūdana prabho /
GP12garup3_u:839: vāyoḥ sakāśācca guṇena hīnā saṃsārarūpe muktarūpe ca deva // GarP_3,6.42
GP12garup3_u:840: evaṃ stutvā bhāratī tu tūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara /
GP12garup3_u:841: tadanantarajaḥ śeṣaḥ prāñjaliḥ prāha keśavam // GarP_3,6.43 //
GP12garup3_u:843: nāhaṃ ca jāne tava pādamūlaṃ rudro na vetti garuḍo na veda /
GP12garup3_u:844: ahaṃ vāṇyāḥ śataguṇāṃśahīno dattvā hyāyatanaṃ pāhi māṃ vāsudeva //
GP12garup3_u:848: tava padoḥ stutiṃ kiṃ karomyahaṃ mama padāṃbuje hyarpitaṃ manaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:849: kathamahaṃ mukhe pakṣiyonijaḥ kathamevaṅguṇā nīḍituṃ kṣamaḥ // GarP_3,6.46
GP12garup3_u:853: yā vai taveśa bhagavanna vidāma bhūman bhaktirmamāstu śivapādasarojamūle /
GP12garup3_u:854: channāpi sā nanu sadā na mamāsti deva tenādruhaṃ tava viruddhamataḥ karomi // GarP_3,6.48
GP12garup3_u:855: sarvānna buddhisahitasya hare murāre kā śaktirasti vacane mama mūḍhabuddheḥ /
GP12garup3_u:856: vāṇyā sadā śataguṇena vihīnamenaṃ māṃ pāhi ceśa mama cāyatanaṃ ca dattvā // GarP_3,6.49
GP12garup3_u:857: evaṃ stutvā sa rudrastu tūṣṇīmāsa dvijottamaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:860: lakṣmīpate brahmapate manoḥ pategiraḥ pate rudrapate nṛṇāṃ pate /
GP12garup3_u:861: guṇāṃstava stotumahaṃ samarthā na pārvatī nāpi suparṇapatnī // GarP_3,6.51
GP12garup3_u:862: śeṣādahaṃ daśaguṇairvihīnā māṃ pāhi nityaṃ jagatāmadhīśa // GarP_3,6.52 //
GP12garup3_u:863: evaṃ stutvā vāruṇī tu tūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara /
GP12garup3_u:866: stotuṃ guṇāṃstava hare jagadī śavācā śrotuṃ hare tava kathāṃ śravaṇe na śaktiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:867: yastattvanuṃ smarati deva tava svarūpaṃ ko vai nu veda bhuvi taṃ bhagavatpadārtham // GarP_3,6.54
GP12garup3_u:868: ato guṇastavane nāsti śaktirvīndrāhadaṃ daśaguṇairavarā ca nityam //
GP12garup3_u:869: evaṃ stutvā tu sauparṇī tūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara /
GP12garup3_u:871: pārvatyuvāca govinda nārāyaṇa vāsudeva tvayā hi me kiñcidapi prayojanam /
GP12garup3_u:872: nāstyeva svāminna ca nāma vācā saubhāgyarūpaḥ sarvadā eka eva //
GP12garup3_u:873: nārāyaṇeti tava nāma ca ekameva vairāgyabhaktivibhave paramaṃ samarthām /
GP12garup3_u:876: stavane nāsti me śaktī rudrāddaśaguṇairaham // GarP_3,6.59 //
GP12garup3_u:877: avarā ca sadāsmyeva nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup3_u:878: evaṃ stutvā sā girijā stūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara // GarP_3,6.60 //
GP12garup3_u:879: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde uttara- tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe tattvābhimānitattaddevatākṛtaviṣṇustutitattaddevatātāratamyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:884: tava svarūpaṃ hṛdi saṃvijānan samutsukaḥ syātstavane yastu mūḍhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:885: ajānataḥ stavanaṃ devadeva tadevāhurhelanaṃ cakrapāṇe // GarP_3,7.1 //
GP12garup3_u:886: tathāpi tadvai tava nāma pūrvaṃ bhavettadā puṇyakaraṃ bhavediti /
GP12garup3_u:887: rudrādi kānāṃ stavane nāsti śaktistadā vaktavyaṃ mama nāstīti kiṃ vā //
GP12garup3_u:888: guṇāṃśato daśabhī rudrato vai sadā nyūno matsamaḥ kāmadevaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:889: jñāne bale samatā sarvadāsti tathāḥ kāmaḥ kiṃ ca dūtaḥ sadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:890: evaṃ stutvā devadevo hariṃ ca tūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ prāñjalirnamrabhūrdhā /
GP12garup3_u:895: indrādahaṃ daśaguṇaiḥ sarvadā nyūna ukto na jani tvāṃ sarvadā hyaprameya /
GP12garup3_u:896: tathāpi māṃ pāhi jagadguro tvaṃ dattvā divyaṃ hyāyatanaṃ ca viṣṇo //
GP12garup3_u:897: āhaṅkārika evaṃ tu stutvā tūṣṇīṃbabhūva ha /
GP12garup3_u:901: vāgīśvarairapi sadā manasāpi dhartuṃ no śakyamīśa tava pādarajaḥ smarāmi
GP12garup3_u:903: nyūnabhūtāṃ ca māṃ pāhi kṛpālo bhaktavatsala // GarP_3,7.9 //
GP12garup3_u:904: evaṃ stutvā śacī devī tūṣṇīṃ bhagavatī hyabhūt /
GP12garup3_u:909: etādṛśaṃ tava mukhaṃ nuvituṃ na śaktiḥ śacyā samāpi bhagavanparipāhi nityam /
GP12garup3_u:910: kṛtvā stutiṃ ratiriyaṃ paramādareṇa tūṣṇīṃ sthitā bhagavataśca samīpa eva
GP12garup3_u:915: rudropi tenava vidhṛtena jaṭākalāpapūtena pādarajasā hyaśivaḥ śivobhūt /
GP12garup3_u:916: etādṛśaṃ te caraṇaṃ karuṇeśa viṣṇo stotuṃ śaktirmama nāsti kṛpāvatāra /
GP12garup3_u:917: ratyā samaḥ śrutigato na gatosmi mokṣametādṛśaṃ ca paripāhi nidānamūrte //
GP12garup3_u:918: evaṃ stutvā sa dakṣastu tūṣṇī meva babhūva ha /
GP12garup3_u:921: saṃcintayāmi satataṃ tava cānanābjaṃ tvaṃ dehi duṣṭaviṣayeṣu viraktimīśa // GarP_3,7.17
GP12garup3_u:922: eteṣu śaktiryadi vai sa jīvo kartā ca bhoktā ca sadā ca dātā /
GP12garup3_u:923: yoṣāṃ ca putrasuhṛdau ca paśūṃśca sarvamevaṃ vinaśyati yato hi tadāśu chindhi // GarP_3,7.18
GP12garup3_u:925: śaktirna cāsti navane mama devadeva satyā samaṃ ca satataṃ paripāhi nityam // GarP_3,7.19
GP12garup3_u:926: evaṃ śrutvā ca paramaṃ tūṣṇīmeva sthito muniḥ /
GP12garup3_u:929: evaṃ harestava kathāṃ rasikāṃ vihāya strīṇāṃ bhage ca vadane parimuhya nityam /
GP12garup3_u:930: viṣṭhāntrapūritabile rasiko hi nityaṃ sthāyī ca sūkaravadeva vimūḍhabuddhiḥ // GarP_3,7.21
GP12garup3_u:932: āsvādane mama ca pāpagatermurāre māyābalaṃ tava vibho paramaṃ nimittam //
GP12garup3_u:933: saṃsāracakre bhramataśca nityaṃ suduḥ kharūpe sukhaleśavarjite /
GP12garup3_u:934: malaṃ vamantaṃ navabhiśca dvāraiḥ śarīramāruhya sumūḍhabuddhiḥ //
GP12garup3_u:935: namāmi nityaṃ tava tatkathāmṛtaṃ vihāyadeva śrutimūlanāśanam /
GP12garup3_u:936: kuṭuṃbapoṣaṃ ca sadā ca kurvandānādyakurvannivasan gṛhe ca // GarP_3,7.24
GP12garup3_u:937: dūre ca saṃsāramalaṃ tvidaṃ kuru dehi hyado divyakathāmṛtaṃ sadā /
GP12garup3_u:938: etādṛśohaṃ tava sadguṇaughaṃ stotuṃ samartho nāsmi śacīsamaśca //
GP12garup3_u:942: stotuṃ hyanupraviśatopi na garbhaduḥ khaṃ tasmādahaṃ paramapūjyapadaṃ gataste // GarP_3,7.27
GP12garup3_u:945: parasparasamā hyete muktvā saṃsārameva ca // GarP_3,7.28 //
GP12garup3_u:949: tvadvicchayā racite dehagehe puttre kalatrepi dhane dravyajātau /
GP12garup3_u:950: mamāhamityalpadhiyā ca mūḍhā saṃsāraduḥ khe vinimajjanti sarve //
GP12garup3_u:951: ato hare tādṛśīṃ me kubuddhiṃ vināśya me dehi te pādadāsyam /
GP12garup3_u:952: ahaṃ manoḥ pādapādārdhabhūtaguṇena hīnaḥ sarvadā vai murāre // GarP_3,7.31
GP12garup3_u:953: evaṃ stutvā tu varuṇaḥ prāñjaliḥ samupasthitaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:957: punīhyataścaiva parovarāyānyajjihvāgre vartate nāma tasya // GarP_3,7.33
GP12garup3_u:958: yajjihvāgre harināmaiva nāsti sa brāhmaṇo naiva sa eva gokharaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:959: ahaṃ na jāne ca tava svarūpaṃ nyūno hyahaṃ varuṇātsarvadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:960: evaṃ stutvā nārado vai khagendrastūṣṇīmabhūddevadevasya cāgre /
GP12garup3_u:963: kimāsanaṃ te garuḍāsanāya kiṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ kaustubhabhūṣaṇāya /
GP12garup3_u:964: lakṣmīkalatrāya kimasti deyaṃ vāgīśa kiṃ te vacanīyamasti /
GP12garup3_u:965: ato na jāne tava sadguṇāṃśca hyahaṃ sadā varuṇā tpādahīnaḥ // GarP_3,7.36
GP12garup3_u:966: evaṃ stutvā hariṃ devaṃ bhṛgustūṣṇīṃ babhūva ha /
GP12garup3_u:969: yattejasāhaṃ susamiddhatejā havyaṃ vahāmyadhvare ājyasiktam // GarP_3,7.38
GP12garup3_u:970: yattejasāhaṃ jaṭhare saṃpraviśya pacannannaṃ sarvadā pūrṇaśaktiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:971: ato na jāne tava sadguṇāṃśca bhṛgorahaṃ sarvadaivaṃ samosmi // GarP_3,7.39
GP12garup3_u:974: yannāmārthavicāraṇepimunayo muhyati vai sarvadā tvadbhītā api devatā hyavirataṃ strībhiḥ sahaiva sthitāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:975: māndhātṛdhruvanāradāśca bhṛgavo vaivasvatādyākhilāḥ premṇā vai praṇamāmyahaṃ hitakṛte tasmai namo viṣṇave // GarP_3,7.41 //
GP12garup3_u:976: ato na jāne tava sadguṇānsadā evaṃ vidhā kā mama śaktirasti /
GP12garup3_u:979: tadbhāryā vai prasūtistu traya ete samāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,7.43 //
GP12garup3_u:985: namostu tasmai puruṣāya vedhase namonamo 'sadvṛjinacchide namaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:986: namonamo svāṅgabhavāya nityaṃ natosmi henātha tavāṅghripaṅkajam //
GP12garup3_u:987: māṃ pāhi nityaṃ bhagavanvāsudeva hyagnerahaṃ sarvadā nyūna eva /
GP12garup3_u:988: mitrādahaṃ sarvadā kiñcidūnaḥ stutvā deva sobhavattatra tūṣṇīm //
GP12garup3_u:990: harintuṣṭāva parayā bhaktyā nārāyaṇaṃ gurum // GarP_3,7.48 //
GP12garup3_u:993: kurve ca nityaṃ sukhaleśalavādinā tvaddaraṃ manastvaśubhakarma samācarīṣye
GP12garup3_u:994: etādṛśohaṃ bhagavānanantaḥ sadā vasiṣṭhasya samāna eva // GarP_3,7.50 //
GP12garup3_u:995: evaṃ stutvā marīcistu tūṣṇīmāsa tadā khaga /
GP12garup3_u:998: tattvārthamūlamavikāri tava svarūpaṃ hyānandasāramata eva vikāraśūnyam //
GP12garup3_u:999: traiguṇyaśūnyamakhileṣu ca saṃvibhaktaṃ tatra praviśya bhagavanna hi paśyatīva /
GP12garup3_u:1000: ato marārestava sadguṇāṃśca stotuṃ na śakromi marīcetulyaḥ // GarP_3,7.53
GP12garup3_u:1004: draṣṭuṃ na śakromi tava svarūpaṃ hyanantabāhūdaramastakaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:1006: etādṛśaṃ rūpamanantapāraṃ stotuṃ hyaśaktastu samosmi cātreḥ // GarP_3,7.55
GP12garup3_u:1010: yo vā haristu bhagavānsa (sva) upāsakānāṃ saṃdarśayedbhuvanamaṅgalamaṅgalaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:1011: (laśca) yasmai namo bhagavate purupāya tubhyaṃ yo vāvitā nirayabhāgagamaprasaṅge // GarP_3,7.57
GP12garup3_u:1012: etādṛśāṃstava guṇānnavituṃ na śaktaṃ māṃ pāhi bhagavansadṛśo hyaṅgirasā ca
GP12garup3_u:1013: evaṃ stutvā pulastyopi stūṣṇīmeva vabhūva ha /
GP12garup3_u:1017: ārādhanaṃ bhagavatastava satkriyāśca vyarthaṃ bhavediti vadanti mahānubhāvāḥ // GarP_3,7.60
GP12garup3_u:1018: tasmai sadā bhagavate praṇamāmi nityaṃ niṣkāmayā tava samarpaṇamātravuddhyā /
GP12garup3_u:1019: vaikuṇṭhanātha bhagavanstavane na śaktiḥ sohaṃ pulasatyasadṛśosmi na saṃśayotra // GarP_3,7.61
GP12garup3_u:1020: evaṃ stutvā tu pulahastūṣṇīmāsa tadā khaga /
GP12garup3_u:1024: yenaikajanmaśamalaṃ sahasaiva hitvā saṃyāti muktimamalāṃ tamahaṃ prapadye
GP12garup3_u:1026: tepi muktiṃ prayāntyāśu kimuta dhyāyinaḥ sadā // GarP_3,7.64 //
GP12garup3_u:1030: sohaṃ hi karmakaraṇe nirataḥ sadaiva strīṇāṃ bhoge ca nirataśca gude pramattaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1031: jihvendriye ca niratastava darśane ca samyagvirāgasahitaḥ paramo dareṇa //
GP12garup3_u:1032: māṃsāsthimajjarudhiraiḥ sahite ca dehe bhaktiṃ sadaiva bhagavannapi taskare ca /
GP12garup3_u:1033: gurvagnibāḍabagavādiṣu satsu duḥ khātsamyagviraktimupayāmi sahasva nityam
GP12garup3_u:1034: lokānuvādaśravaṇe paramā ca śaktirnārāyaṇasya namane na ca mesti śaktiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1035: lokānuyānakaraṇe paramā ca śaktiḥ kṣetrādimārgagamane paramā hyaśaktiḥ //
GP12garup3_u:1036: vaiśyādikeṣu dhanikeṣu parā ca śaktiḥ sadbrāhmaṇeṣvapi na śaktiraho murāre
GP12garup3_u:1040: na dhyāte caraṇāṃbuje bhagavato saṃdhyāpi nānuṣṭhitā jñānadvārakapāṭapāṭanapaṭurdharmopinopārjitaḥ
GP12garup3_u:1041: antarvyāphamalābhighātakaraṇe paṭvī śrutā te kathā no deva śravaṇena pāhi bhagavanmāmatritulyaṃ sadā // GarP_3,7.71 //
GP12garup3_u:1048: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe kṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde devādistutitattattāratamyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptamo
GP12garup3_u:1055: veda svayaṃ bhagavānvāsudevo nāhaṃ nāgnirna tridevā munīndrāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:1056: athāpare bhāgavatapradhānā yadā na jānīyurathāpare kutaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1057: māṃ pāhi nityaṃ paratopyadhīśa viśvāmitrānnyūna eveti nityam /
GP12garup3_u:1058: ahaṃ parjanyārdviguṇa eva nityamato mama stavane nāsti śaktiḥ //
GP12garup3_u:1059: evaṃ stutvā hariṃ mitrastūṣṇīmāsa tadā khaga /
GP12garup3_u:1061: tārovāca ananyena tu bhāvena bhaktiṃ kurvanti ye dṛḍhām /
GP12garup3_u:1063: tvadāśrayāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā (dṛṣṭvā) śṛṇvanti kathayanti ca /
GP12garup3_u:1065: tanmadhye patitāṃ pāhi sadā mitrasamāṃ prabho /
GP12garup3_u:1068: yogena tvayyarpitayā ca bhaktyā saṃyānti lokāḥ paramāṃ gatiṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:1071: ato māṃ pāhi dayayā sadā tārāsamaṃ prabho /
GP12garup3_u:1072: tadanantarajā stotuṃ prāvahī taṃ pracakrame // GarP_3,8.9 //
GP12garup3_u:1074: sutāḥ prasaṃgena bhavanti vīryāttava prasādātparamāḥ sampadaśca /
GP12garup3_u:1082: vāyuputro mahābhāgaḥ hariṃ stotuṃ pracakrame // GarP_3,8.13 //
GP12garup3_u:1089: saṃsmṛtiśca tadā nāśī bhūyādeva na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,8.16 //
GP12garup3_u:1090: evaṃ stuttvā mahābhāgo viṣvakse no mahāprabho /
GP12garup3_u:1092: mitrādahaṃ nyūna eva nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,8.17 //
GP12garup3_u:1093: iti śrīgā- ma- u- tṛ- dha- viṣṇustutirdevatāramyādi- aṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:1097: tadanyāṃśca krameṇeva vaktuṃ kṛṣṇa tvamarhasi // GarP_3,9.1 //
GP12garup3_u:1104: citrasenaśca gopālo balaḥ pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,9.4 //
GP12garup3_u:1106: ajānajasamā jñeyā muktau saṃsāra eva ca // GarP_3,9.5 //
GP12garup3_u:1108: ghṛtācī menakā raṃbhā urvaśī ca tilottamā // GarP_3,9.6 //
GP12garup3_u:1109: suketuḥ śabarī caiva mañjughoṣā ca piṅgalā /
GP12garup3_u:1118: uddālako hyṛ śṛṅgaḥ śaṅkhaḥ satyavratastathā // GarP_3,9.11 //
GP12garup3_u:1126: eteṣāṃ śravaṇādeva hariḥ prīṇāti sarvadā // GarP_3,9.15 //
GP12garup3_u:1127: bruve dvyaṣṭasahasraṃ ca śṛṇu tārkṣya mama striyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1129: ajānajasamā hyetā (te) nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,9.16 //
GP12garup3_u:1130: tvaṣṭuḥ putrī kaśerūśca tāsāṃ madhye guṇādhikā /
GP12garup3_u:1133: tathādhikā hi pitara iti vedavidāṃ matam // GarP_3,9.18 //
GP12garup3_u:1137: svamukeneva devaiśca ājñāpyāḥ sarvadā gaṇāḥ // GarP_3,9.20 //
GP12garup3_u:1139: tebhyastu kṣitipā jñeyā avarāśca śatairguṇaiḥ // GarP_3,9.21 //
GP12garup3_u:1142: evaṃ brahmādayo devā lakṣmyādyā api sarvaśaḥ // GarP_3,9.22 //
GP12garup3_u:1143: stutvā tūṣṇīṃ sthitāḥ sarve prāñjalīkṛtya bho dvija // GarP_3,9.23 //
GP12garup3_u:1148: idaṃ tu stavanaṃ viprā na paṭhantīha mānavāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1149: na śṛṇvanti ca ye nityaṃ te sarve caiva māyinaḥ // GarP_3,9.26 //
GP12garup3_u:1151: tairbhuktā satataṃ viṣṭhā sadā krimiśatairyutā // GarP_3,9.27 //
GP12garup3_u:1152: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe tṛtī- utta- brahmakāṇḍe devakṛtaviṣṇustutidevatātāratamyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma navamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:1156: kīdṛśaṃ hyāśrayaṃ dattvaiṣāṃ viveśa mahāprabhuḥ // GarP_3,10.1 //
GP12garup3_u:1158: samyag brūhi dayālo tvaṃ yadi macchrotramarhati // GarP_3,10.2 //
GP12garup3_u:1162: adau sasarja bhagavān brahmāṇḍaṃ kana kātmakam /
GP12garup3_u:1165: vartate tata ūrdhvaṃ tu pañcāśatkoṭibhūtalam // GarP_3,10.5 //
GP12garup3_u:1169: dvitīyā varaṇaṃ jñeyaṃ pāvakasya mahātmanaḥ // GarP_3,10.7 //
GP12garup3_u:1181: mahattattvānantaraṃ ca tamo hyāvaraṇaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,10.13 //
GP12garup3_u:1183: tasmācca dviguṇaṃ jñeyaṃrajo hyāvaraṇaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,10.14 //
GP12garup3_u:1191: evaṃ caturmukhenaiva tadā hṛṣyaṃ ti cāṇḍaja // GarP_3,10.18 //
GP12garup3_u:1192: te sarve virajānadyāṃ samyak snātvā visarjya ca /
GP12garup3_u:1193: liṅgadehaṃ tataḥ paścānmokṣaṃ vindanti te hareḥ // GarP_3,10.19 //
GP12garup3_u:1205: pralaye virajānadyā layo nāsti khageśvara // GarP_3,10.25 //
GP12garup3_u:1207: brahmatvayogyā ṛjavo nāma devāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_3,10.26 //
GP12garup3_u:1209: pṛthakpṛthak ca taiḥ sākaṃ mokṣayogyāḥ khageśvara // GarP_3,10.27 //
GP12garup3_u:1210: jīvāḥ saṃti hyaneke ca pratikalpe sṛjanti te /
GP12garup3_u:1217: ekena śatakalpena vāyutvaṃ yāti bho dvija // GarP_3,10.31 //
GP12garup3_u:1222: brahmaṇā saha mokṣaṃ ca yāti samyaṅ na cānyathā /
GP12garup3_u:1225: brahmaṇaiva sahāyāti hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ param // GarP_3,10.35 //
GP12garup3_u:1229: iti śrutaṃ mayā brahmanbrahmaṇoktaṃ hareḥ priyāt /
GP12garup3_u:1230: itthaṃ tvayoktaṃ śrīkṛṣṇa saṃśayobādhate mama // GarP_3,10.37 //
GP12garup3_u:1231: ato me saṃśayaṃ chindhi yathā na syāttathā punaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1232: iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā kṛṣṇo vacanamabravīt // GarP_3,10.38 //
GP12garup3_u:1240: pañcā śītibrahmakalpaṃ ye vijānanti bho dvija /
GP12garup3_u:1241: tendhaṃ tamaḥ praviśanti satyaṃsatyaṃ mayoditam // GarP_3,10.42 //
GP12garup3_u:1245: na dānaṃ jātiproktaṃ sarvadā nāsti saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,10.44 //
GP12garup3_u:1247: evaṃ mataṃ sa nirmāya bhagavānharikhyayaḥ // GarP_3,10.45 //
GP12garup3_u:1252: sṛṣṭiruktā tvayā pūrvaṃ śrutā samyaṅ mayā hare // GarP_3,10.48 //
GP12garup3_u:1253: kiṃ nāma prākṛtaṃ jñeyaṃ tathā kiṃ vaikṛtaṃ prabho /
GP12garup3_u:1254: etadvistīrya me brūhi śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // GarP_3,10.49 //
GP12garup3_u:1257: te sarve prākṛtāḥ proktāsteṣāṃ jñānādvimacyate // GarP_3,10.50 //
GP12garup3_u:1259: yā sṛṣṭirucyate sadbhiḥ saivoktā vikṛteti ca // GarP_3,10.51 //
GP12garup3_u:1263: jagatpravāhaḥ satyo 'yaṃ naiva mithyā kathañcana // GarP_3,10.53 //
GP12garup3_u:1267: vedācchāstraṃ paraṃ nāsti na devaḥ keśavātparaḥ // GarP_3,10.55 //
GP12garup3_u:1269: teṣāmandhaṃ tamo jñeyaṃ pitṝṇāṃ garuṇāmapi // GarP_3,10.56 //
GP12garup3_u:1271: samyagjānāti yo loke sa yāti paramaṃ padam // GarP_3,10.57 //
GP12garup3_u:1272: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe brahmāṇḍādivaikṛtaikadeśaprākṛtasṛṣṭinirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśamo
GP12garup3_u:1285: nārāyaṇa namaste 'stu śṛṇu vijñāpanaṃ mama // GarP_3,11.5 //
GP12garup3_u:1287: ajā tu prakṛtiḥ proktā cāparā prakṛtiḥ parā // GarP_3,11.6 //
GP12garup3_u:1289: umā śacyavarā tasyā avarāḥ saṃprakīrtitāḥ // GarP_3,11.7 //
GP12garup3_u:1290: etāsāṃ hananaṃ naiva prārthayāmaḥ sadā hare /
GP12garup3_u:1291: asti pratinṛṣu brahma prakṛtī dve vyavasthite // GarP_3,11.8 //
GP12garup3_u:1294: ata eva tvaje jyeṣṭhe iti loke prakīrtite /
GP12garup3_u:1295: sukhaduḥ khapradā caiva aparā duḥ khadaiva tu // GarP_3,11.10 //
GP12garup3_u:1297: teṣāmācchādikā hokā tamoṅgā sā prakīrtitā // GarP_3,11.11 //
GP12garup3_u:1299: sā parā prakṛtirjñeyā paramācchādikā smṛtā // GarP_3,11.12 //
GP12garup3_u:1300: evaṃ sā paramā duṣṭā hokā tamoṅgā tu prakīrtitā /
GP12garup3_u:1301: jīvavargeṣveva khaga brahmādernāsti sā kvacit // GarP_3,11.13 //
GP12garup3_u:1303: prerikā tu tayordevyo stvahamādyā sukhātmikā // GarP_3,11.14 //
GP12garup3_u:1309: kuru deva mahābhāga iti vijñāyatāṃ mama // GarP_3,11.17 //
GP12garup3_u:1310: evaṃ stuto hariḥ kṛṣṇo suprabuddho 'pi sarbadā /
GP12garup3_u:1313: tatprākṛtaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ bhūdevī tvabhimāninī // GarP_3,11.19 //
GP12garup3_u:1316: viṣṇoḥ svarūpabhūtaṃ ca ye vijānanti te narāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1317: te yānti hyadharaṃ lokaṃ tathā tatsaṃgisaṃginaḥ // GarP_3,11.21 //
GP12garup3_u:1319: kirīṭādyā api harerdvidhā saṃti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,11.22 //
GP12garup3_u:1321: gṛhītā iti vijñeyā na svarūpāḥ khageśvara // GarP_3,11.23 //
GP12garup3_u:1323: pralaye muktihīnaśca supta ityucyate budhaḥ // GarP_3,11.24 //
GP12garup3_u:1324: tasya samivastrivaṃ ca na jñātavyā khageśvara /
GP12garup3_u:1325: pralayopi mahābhāga brahmavāyvorna cāsti hi // GarP_3,11.25 //
GP12garup3_u:1326: vṛttirūpaṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ pādyārghyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1334: vāstavaṃ ye vijānanti teṣāṃ nityaṃ dhanaṃ tapaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1337: yadā hi kāraṇaṃ cāsti tadā kāryamiti prabho /
GP12garup3_u:1338: ityabhiprāyagarbheṇa tvaṃ samādhāsya te yadi // GarP_3,11.31 //
GP12garup3_u:1339: tarhi tasya mahābhāga kathaṃ brūhi bhayādikam /
GP12garup3_u:1340: bhayādikaṃ hyastu nāma kā vāsmākaṃ kṣatirbhavet // GarP_3,11.32 //
GP12garup3_u:1343: prīyate matvā brahma tasmātsuptiśca tatra hi /
GP12garup3_u:1344: ajñādikaṃ yadi brahma tasya na syātkathañcana // GarP_3,11.34 //
GP12garup3_u:1346: kathaṃ vā muktiparyantaṃ jñānavyaktirvadasva me // GarP_3,11.35 //
GP12garup3_u:1347: yadyajñānaṃ tasya satyaṃ na syāttarhi mahāprabho /
GP12garup3_u:1349: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā kṛṣṇo vacanamabravīt /
GP12garup3_u:1350: bhayaṃ ca vāstavaṃ tasya na jānīhi mahāmate // GarP_3,11.37 //
GP12garup3_u:1354: duḥ khājñānādikaṃ kiñcitkathaṃ tasmin bhaviṣyati // GarP_3,11.39 //
GP12garup3_u:1356: tena prīṇāti ca haristasya nāstyatra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,11.40 //
GP12garup3_u:1358: kadāciddṛśyate brahmā duḥ khī na ca khageśvara // GarP_3,11.41 //
GP12garup3_u:1360: duḥ khivaddṛśyate brahmā ājñānāṃ mohanāya ca // GarP_3,11.42 //
GP12garup3_u:1366: padmāddhiraṇma yājjāto brahmā tu caturānanaḥ // GarP_3,11.45 //
GP12garup3_u:1370: ko vā māṃ sṛṣṭavānatra iti hyālocya sa prabhuḥ // GarP_3,11.47 //
GP12garup3_u:1371: taṃ vicārayituṃ brahmā padmanāḍīṃ viveśa ha // GarP_3,11.48 //
GP12garup3_u:1372: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛthṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'jñānahetunirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:1375: nāḍīṃ samāviśya mahānubhāvaḥ śrīviṣṇubhakto tvatha puṣkarasthaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1376: vicārayāmāsa guruṃ svamūlaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ nirguṇamadvitīyam // GarP_3,12.1 //
GP12garup3_u:1378: vicārakāle ca vicintanīyo hyajñānaleśastu khageśvareśvara // GarP_3,12.2
GP12garup3_u:1379: yathāsti viṣṇormanaḥ saṅkalpa eva tathaiva sopi prakaroti nityam /
GP12garup3_u:1380: ālocane tasya sadāsti bhūmansvayogyatāmanatikramya caiva // GarP_3,12.3 //
GP12garup3_u:1381: hareḥ svarūpe ca tathā prapañcaḥ svasminsvarūpe ca khagasti jñānam /
GP12garup3_u:1382: yathāpi nityaṃ paricāravāri ca ajñātavaddṛśyate viṣṇunā ca // GarP_3,12.4
GP12garup3_u:1383: hareḥ prītyarthaṃ kurute sau kadāccittatrāpi kaścidviśeṣo 'sti vīndra /
GP12garup3_u:1384: śṛṇuṣva samyaṅnigṛhītacitto yathā provāca sa vijānāti devaḥ // GarP_3,12.5
GP12garup3_u:1385: sadā tvadoṣaṃ praviśeṣeśca muktavedāstathā vā pavijānanti nityam /
GP12garup3_u:1386: tasya svarūpaṃ na tathā hariṃ ca svayogyatāmanatikramya vedhāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:1387: hareḥ svarūpaṃ na vijānāti sarvaṃ svayo gyarūpaṃ sarvadā vetti viṣṇoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1388: tatrājñānaṃ nāsti kiñciddvijendra yāvatsvarūpaṃ ca tathaiva lakṣmyāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:1389: vedhā na jānāti kutastadanye tayoḥ svarūpaṃna vijānāti sarvam /
GP12garup3_u:1390: tathāpi vedānekadeśena veda jānāti lakṣmīrharirūpaṃ ca yāvat //
GP12garup3_u:1391: tāvanna jānāti vidhiḥ khagendra jñāne vidhātuśca svayogyabhūte /
GP12garup3_u:1392: ato viriñcasya na cintanīyo hyajñānaleśaḥ kvāpi deśe ca kāle //
GP12garup3_u:1393: nāḍīṃ samāviśya tadā viriñco na veda nārāyaṇamekavacca /
GP12garup3_u:1394: tadā śṛṇottaṃ kamalāsanaṃ prabhustapastapa dvyakṣaraṃ sādareṇa //
GP12garup3_u:1395: abhiprāyaṃ tasya samyagvidittvā tapaḥ kuru tvaṃ harituṣṭyarthameva /
GP12garup3_u:1397: tato hariḥ prādurāsītkhagendra varaṃ dātuṃ bhaktavarasya divyam /
GP12garup3_u:1398: sadā viṣṇuṃ devadevo dadarśa caturbhujaṃ taṃ jalajāyatākṣam //
GP12garup3_u:1400: dṛṣṭvā hariṃ brahma nārāyaṇaṃ ca puraḥ sthitaṃ bhaktavaśyaṃ dayālum //
GP12garup3_u:1401: samarcayāmāsa mahāvibhūtyā bhaktyā hareḥ pādatīrthaṃ dadhāra /
GP12garup3_u:1404: rameśa lokeśa jagannivāsa tava svarūpaṃ na vijānāti devī /
GP12garup3_u:1405: tava prasādātsuvijānāti devī guṇānvedoktānsarvadā vīndra sarvān //
GP12garup3_u:1406: tathāpi sā na vijānāti devī sākalyenāśeṣitaḥ sadguṇāṃśca /
GP12garup3_u:1407: yadyapyanuktaṃ pañcabhirnāsti vedaistathāpi deve 'tra viśeṣa āste //
GP12garup3_u:1408: tattvecchavaḥ pravijānanti nityaṃ vede sūktānkvāpyanuktāṃśca sarvān /
GP12garup3_u:1409: ādau jānantyatra vedā murāre ṛgādayaḥ suṣṭhu catvāra eva // GarP_3,12.17
GP12garup3_u:1410: vedā hyete vedayantīti deva tathā purāṇaṃ bhārataṃ pañcarātram /
GP12garup3_u:1411: kramādito vicintya sā viṣṇuguṇānsvayogyānsadā vijānāti ramāpi devī //
GP12garup3_u:1413: sāmānyataḥ pravijānāti devī harerguṇānna viśeṣācca nityam // GarP_3,12.19
GP12garup3_u:1414: ahaṃ vijānāmi ramāpra sādāttava prasādācca guṇānsadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:1416: tava prasādācca mama prasādātkālāntare tāṃśca jānāti śeṣaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1417: duṣkarmaleśānna tirohitān guṇānyāneva pūrvaṃ viditān svayogyān //
GP12garup3_u:1418: tāneva jñātvā punareva śeṣastiro hitāṃllabdhaguṇastataḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1419: sadā svayogyāṃśca harerguṇāṃśca umāpatiścāpi tava prasādāt // GarP_3,12.22
GP12garup3_u:1420: yadā vijānāti hare murāre aprāptalabdheti tadocyate haraḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1421: mamāpi lokaṃ ca yadā murāre tadā vijānāti tava svarūpam // GarP_3,12.23 //
GP12garup3_u:1422: govinda nityāvyaya citsupūrṇa tava prasādānnāsti śateṣu tanmamayeye hi devāśca śarīradhāriṇaste jñānahīnā viṣayeṣu niṣṭhāḥ // GarP_3,12.24 //
GP12garup3_u:1423: yeye devā viṣayeṣu niṣṭhāstete devā bahirarthabhāvāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1424: yeye devā bahirarthabhāvā mokṣā danye pralapantaḥ sadaiva // GarP_3,12.25
GP12garup3_u:1425: tava svarūpe ca jagatsvarūpe tavāsamānaṃ nāsti viṣṇo sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:1426: yatastava prākṛto nāsti deho yato jñānaṃ nāsti nāstye va nityam //
GP12garup3_u:1427: pūrṇānandajñānadeho 'pi nityaṃ sadā śarīrī bhāṣyate bhaktimadbhiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1428: yatastava prākṛto nāsti deho hyatopi nityamaśarīrīti ca smṛtaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:1430: atto 'pyahaṃ tvaśarīrī sadaiva tathaiva nityaṃ bahirarthaiśca śūnyaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:1432: ete hi sarve bahirarthasaṃjñakāḥ naisargakāmāḥ sarvadā me hi viṣṇo //
GP12garup3_u:1433: tathāpyahaṃ kāmahīno hi nityaṃ rudrādayaḥ kāmavanto yatotaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1434: śarīriṇaste bahirarthabhāvā ajñānavanto 'pi ca saṃsmṛtāḥ khaga //
GP12garup3_u:1435: svadārabhoge kevalāṃ prītimevaṃ harerevaṃ sarvadāhaṃ karoti /
GP12garup3_u:1436: stambāstrādīndhāriyiṣye sadaiva viṣṇoḥ prītyarthaṃ naiva gātrārthameva //
GP12garup3_u:1437: nityānandādanyakāmo na mesti ataḥ sadā bahirarthaiśca śūnyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1438: mamāpi bhāryā bahirarthaśūnyā amūḍhabhāvā mūḍhavatīva dṛśyate //
GP12garup3_u:1439: amūḍhabhūtā jñānināṃ sarvadaiva tathājñānāṃ jñānahīneti bhāti /
GP12garup3_u:1440: yāvajjñānaṃ cāsti me vāstudeva tāvajjñānaṃ vāsudevasya cāsti //
GP12garup3_u:1443: sauriprakāśe ca yathaiva darśanaṃ tathā mama jñānagato viśeṣaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1444: dīpaprakāśe ca yathaiva darśanaṃ tathā jñānaṃ vāsudevasya cāsti //
GP12garup3_u:1445: aspaṣṭaparūpā nyūnatā hyasti vāyau tathā jñānaṃ naiva saṃcintanīyam /
GP12garup3_u:1448: vāyormama pralaye sṛṣṭikāle tathā gāyatryā nāstināstyeva mohaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:1450: mamājñānaṃ dṛśyate yatra kutra daityādīnāṃ mohanārtha sadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:1453: sūryodaye nāsti yathā tamaśca tathājñānaṃ nāstināstyeva deva /
GP12garup3_u:1454: karomyahaṃ śravaṇaṃ sarvadaiva hariprītyarthaṃ niścatārthaṃ satāṃ hi //
GP12garup3_u:1460: śatajanmasu pūrvaṃ tu parokṣeṇa mama prabho // GarP_3,12.43 //
GP12garup3_u:1463: nājñānaṃ cintanīyaṃ hi brahmayvośca deva hi /
GP12garup3_u:1466: sarvadā jñānarūpā sā sarvaduḥ khavivarjitā // GarP_3,12.46 //
GP12garup3_u:1467: daityānāṃ mohanārthāya aṃśe duḥ khīva dṛśyate /
GP12garup3_u:1468: tasyā duḥ khādikaṃ kiñcinnāstināstyeva sarvathā // GarP_3,12.47 //
GP12garup3_u:1470: tāvanmātreṇa vājñānaṃ tasyāṃ naivāhitaṃ ca yat // GarP_3,12.48 //
GP12garup3_u:1472: bhāratyāstu yathā nāsti sarasvatyāstu kiṃ punaḥ // GarP_3,12.49 //
GP12garup3_u:1476: vāyoraṃśāvatārosti yathā mūle tathaiva ca // GarP_3,12.51 //
GP12garup3_u:1477: balajñānā dikaṃ sarvaṃ cintanīyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1482: tretāyugasvarūpe ca na darśayati tādṛśam // GarP_3,12.54 //
GP12garup3_u:1487: vāyuḥ kaliyuge rūpe taddarśayati tādṛśam // GarP_3,12.56 //
GP12garup3_u:1489: avatāreṣu vāyośca antaraṃ ye viduḥ prabho // GarP_3,12.57 //
GP12garup3_u:1490: te 'dhaṃ tamaḥ praviśante te daityā na ca te surāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1493: tadarthameva vāyośca avatāraḥ sadā bhuvi // GarP_3,12.59 //
GP12garup3_u:1505: rāmeṇa duḥ khayuktena liṅgasya sthāpanaṃ kṛtam // GarP_3,12.65 //
GP12garup3_u:1507: svayaṃ vyaktasthale cāpi cidā nandatvakalpanam // GarP_3,12.66 //
GP12garup3_u:1510: viṣṇoḥ sūryeṇa sākaṃ ca abhedā divicintanam /
GP12garup3_u:1511: sarvottamaḥ sūrya eva viṣṇvādyāstasya kiṅkarāḥ // GarP_3,12.68 //
GP12garup3_u:1515: te sarve harinindāyāmavikāriṇa eva hi // GarP_3,12.70 //
GP12garup3_u:1517: pārthakyanayanaṃ yeṣu kurvanti yarhi vā prabho // GarP_3,12.71 //
GP12garup3_u:1518: tarhi teṣāṃ hi kāleṣu duḥ khaṃ yāti na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1519: ataḥ prārthakyanayanaṃ ye kurvantyeṣu sarvadā // GarP_3,12.72 //
GP12garup3_u:1520: te sarve tvabudhā jñeyā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup3_u:1522: te sarve hyasurā jñeyā nānyathā tu kathañcana /
GP12garup3_u:1523: vihāya śūnyamaśvatthaṃ namanaṃ ye prakurvate // GarP_3,12.74 //
GP12garup3_u:1525: te sarve hyasurā jñeyā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,12.75 //
GP12garup3_u:1527: asmacchatāyuḥ paryantameka eva kaliḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,12.76 //
GP12garup3_u:1528: kalau saṃti kalpamānaṃ kalerante saṃti ca /
GP12garup3_u:1529: tasmindine brahmarūpe gacchanti ca tamontikam // GarP_3,12.77 //
GP12garup3_u:1530: tatra sthitvā lokamārgaṃ pratīkṣante na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1535: tamasyandhepi saṃsāre nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,12.80 //
GP12garup3_u:1537: dūṣako viṣṇubhaktānāṃ tatsamo nāsti sarvadā // GarP_3,12.81 //
GP12garup3_u:1539: mithyādāne jñānabuddhirduḥ khe ca sukhabuddhimān // GarP_3,12.82 //
GP12garup3_u:1541: duryodhanaḥ sa evokto duḥ khānantyasvarūpavān // GarP_3,12.83 //
GP12garup3_u:1543: alakṣmīriti vikhyātā sā loke mantharā smṛtā // GarP_3,12.84 //
GP12garup3_u:1545: jarāsaṃdhaḥ sa evoktaḥ kālanemistataḥ param // GarP_3,12.85 //
GP12garup3_u:1548: tāveva haṃsahiḍaṃbakau jñeyau tau ca janārdana /
GP12garup3_u:1549: vipracittisamo jñeyo bhaumo vai bhūtale smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,12.87 //
GP12garup3_u:1555: śaṃbarasya samo jñeyaḥ śālvo daityeṣu cādhamaḥ // GarP_3,12.90 //
GP12garup3_u:1557: bāṇastato 'dhamo jñeyaḥ sa tu kīcakanāmataḥ // GarP_3,12.91 //
GP12garup3_u:1567: vetaḥ sa eva vijñeyaḥ pūrvajanmani sattama // GarP_3,12.96 //
GP12garup3_u:1569: duḥ śāsanastu vijñeyo jarāsaṃdhasamaḥ prabho // GarP_3,12.97 //
GP12garup3_u:1587: kalpādyaiḥ preritāḥ sarve rudrādyā adhikāriṇaḥ // GarP_3,12.106 //
GP12garup3_u:1589: kadāpyahaṃ ca vāyuśca viruddhaṃ nācareva bhoḥ // GarP_3,12.107 //
GP12garup3_u:1593: etādṛśopyahaṃ deva na ca śaktistu nastave // GarP_3,12.109 //
GP12garup3_u:1595: iti stutvā hariṃ brahmā sthitaḥ prāñja liragrataḥ // GarP_3,12.110 //
GP12garup3_u:1596: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde brahmastutivarṇanaṃ nāma dvādaśo 'dyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:1599: iti stutaḥ sa bhagavān svapūtreṇa dayānidhiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1602: yathā vai prākkṣaṇetadvatsṛja sarvaṃ mahāprabho // GarP_3,13.2 //
GP12garup3_u:1603: nāsti prayojanaṃ tena tava matprītaye sṛja /
GP12garup3_u:1604: evamuktastu hāriṇā brahmā stutvā hariṃ param // GarP_3,13.3 //
GP12garup3_u:1605: sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ mano dadhre prīṇayanneva mādhavam /
GP12garup3_u:1607: ādau sasarja garuḍa puruṣātmā sa eva ca /
GP12garup3_u:1608: tato dakṣiṇahastāttu brahmāṇīṃ bhārantī tathā // GarP_3,13.6 // (13.5)
GP12garup3_u:1624: daśavarṣānantaraṃ ca pārvatīṃ ca tathaiva saḥ // GarP_3,13.13 //
GP12garup3_u:1632: ratiṃ sa janayāmāsa kāmabhāryāṃ mahāprabhuḥ // GarP_3,13.17 //
GP12garup3_u:1638: ahaṅkārādanu brahmā sajñānaṃ ca bṛhaspatim // GarP_3,13.20 //
GP12garup3_u:1640: pañcavarṣānantaraṃ tu tārāṃ bhāryāṃ vinirmame // GarP_3,13.21 //
GP12garup3_u:1642: svāyaṃbhuvaṃ manuṃ caiva nirmame manasā vibhuḥ // GarP_3,13.22 //
GP12garup3_u:1654: daśavarṣānantaraṃ tu pravāhīṃ nirmame prabhuḥ // GarP_3,13.28 //
GP12garup3_u:1658: tadbhāryāṃ śāmalāṃ devīṃ tasmādeva mahāprabhuḥ // GarP_3,13.30 //
GP12garup3_u:1680: kaśyapañjanayāmāsa manasā ca svayaṃ prabhuḥ // GarP_3,13.41 //
GP12garup3_u:1685: daśavarṣānantaraṃ tu teṣāṃ bhāryāḥ krameṇa tu /
GP12garup3_u:1694: dhanapo hyabhavattatra tadbhāryā vatsare pare // GarP_3,13.48 //
GP12garup3_u:1704: evaṃ jñātvā mokṣameti nānyathā tu kathañcana // GarP_3,13.53 //
GP12garup3_u:1705: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe devotpattinirūpaṇaṃ nāma trayodaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:1709: guṇānāmantara brūhi śiṣyasya mama savrata // GarP_3,14.1 //
GP12garup3_u:1711: yo mūlarūpī bhagavānananto brahmādibhiḥ purṇaguṇaḥ svatantraḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1712: purātanaḥ pūrṇatanurmadātmā na tādṛśāḥ saṃti kadāpi vīdra // GarP_3,14.2
GP12garup3_u:1713: pādaśca pūrṇaḥ pādatalaṃ ca pūrṇaṃ nakhāśca pūrṇāḥ kaṭikaṇṭhau ca pūrṇau /
GP12garup3_u:1714: ūrū ca pūrṇe udaraṃ ca pūrṇaṃ labdhvāpi pūrṇāñjagṛhe tathāpyuraḥ //
GP12garup3_u:1715: skandhaḥ supūrṇāḥ sakalāśca bāhavaḥ pūrṇāḥ keśāḥ śmaśrudantāśca pūrṇāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1716: lomāni pūrṇāni tathaiva romakūpāśca pūrṇāstu tathaiva śiśraḥ //
GP12garup3_u:1717: aṇḍaśca pūrṇo hyaṇḍaromāṇi kakṣāścakṣuśca śrotre sarva ete ca pūrṇāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1718: kiṃ varṇaye mūlarūpaṃ hareśca yāvadvalaṃ pūrṇaṃ samagradehe // GarP_3,14.5
GP12garup3_u:1719: tāvadbralaṃ hyekaromādikeṣu saṃtitvime hi yataḥ sa eva pūrṇaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1720: sa eva tu sarvasya kartā sa eva harthā sa tu sārāṃśabhoktā // GarP_3,14.6
GP12garup3_u:1721: asārāṃśaṃ naiva bhoktā haristu sārānvakṣye śṛṇu pakṣīndra samyak /
GP12garup3_u:1722: drākṣekṣusāraṃ nārikelasya sāraṃ cūtasya sāraṃ panasasyāpi sāram //
GP12garup3_u:1724: nārāyaṇo bījarūpasya sāraṃ gṛhṇāti nityaṃ bhaktavaryo dayāluḥ //
GP12garup3_u:1725: tāmbūlasāraṃ khadirasya sāraṃ puṣpasya sāraṃ candanasyāpi sāram /
GP12garup3_u:1726: godhūmasāraṃ yavānāṃ ca sāraṃ māṣasya sāraṃ hareṇośca sāram // GarP_3,14.9
GP12garup3_u:1727: śuddhaṃ tathā vrīhinīvārasāraṃ śyāmākasāraṃ śuddhadhānyasya sāram //
GP12garup3_u:1729: gṛhṇāti viṣṇuḥ paramādareṇa annasya sāraṃ bhakṣyabhojyasya sāram //
GP12garup3_u:1730: sūpasya sāraṃ paramānnasya sāraṃ dugdhasya sāraṃ dadhitakrasya sāram /
GP12garup3_u:1731: ghṛtasya sāraṃ rāmaṭhasyāpi sāraṃ gṛhṇāti viṣṇuḥ sarṣapasyāpi sāram //
GP12garup3_u:1732: marīcasāraṃ jīrakasyāpi sāraṃ tathā havirghṛtapakvasya sāram /
GP12garup3_u:1733: taileṣu pakvasya ca bharjitasya guḍasya sāraṃ navanītasya sāram //
GP12garup3_u:1735: lakṣmīpatiḥ sarvajagannivā sastasyājñayā vāsudevopi nityam // GarP_3,14.14
GP12garup3_u:1737: evaṃ vimūḍhā vāsudevasya bhaktāḥ kiṃ vaktavyaṃ viṣṇubhaktā hi loke //
GP12garup3_u:1738: kalyāṇāste sārabhoktāra eva naiṣāṃ bhavettena duḥ khābhivṛddhiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1739: bhuñjanti ye vaiśvadevaṃ vihāya duṣṭāṃstānvai bhukticinttāṃśca viddhi //
GP12garup3_u:1740: vakṣye viśeṣaṃ vaiśvadeve khagendra gopyaṃ no vadānyatra vidvān /
GP12garup3_u:1741: sūryādīnāṃ ye ca dāne ca dadyurvinā vāyorantarasthaṃ hariṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:1742: te vai sadā sārabhoktāra eva jñeyāstvato viṣṇureko mahātmā /
GP12garup3_u:1743: sārāṃśabhoktā na tu sarvasya bhoktā bhunakti sarvaṃ tvaviruddhaśaktiḥ //
GP12garup3_u:1744: vakṣye ha sārānpunaranyānkhagendra śṛṇuṣva guhyaṃ paramādareṇa /
GP12garup3_u:1745: drākṣādayaḥ sarva eva tvasārāḥ kālādiduṣṭā bhāvaduṣṭāḥ padārthāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:1747: asārāḥ kaluṣā jñeyāstathā jaṃbūphalaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,14.20 //
GP12garup3_u:1752: śuṣkabhūtaṃ nārikelaṃ khajūraṃ tu yathā tathā /
GP12garup3_u:1757: bhakṣyaṃ ca kvathitaṃ vīndra asāraṃ parikīrtitam // GarP_3,14.25 //
GP12garup3_u:1761: jaṃbīraṃ śṛṅgabere dhātrī karpūraṃ ca cūtakam // GarP_3,14.27 //
GP12garup3_u:1763: parpaṭaḥ pakṣamātreṇa niḥ sāraḥ parikīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,14.28 //
GP12garup3_u:1765: ārdrā vāpyathavā śuṣkā sārdrā sāravatī smṛtā // GarP_3,14.29 //
GP12garup3_u:1766: ekādaśyāṃ tu tulasī sārā grāhyā manīṣibhiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1767: tvacā nāseṃdriyeṇāpi na tu jihvendriyeṇa ca // GarP_3,14.30 //
GP12garup3_u:1770: ekavāre ca sāraṃ syāddvivāre ca tatodhikam /
GP12garup3_u:1773: ekādaśyāṃ hareḥ sāraṃ kṣīraṃ sarpirmadhūdakam // GarP_3,14.33 //
GP12garup3_u:1775: āṣāḍhamāse garuḍa śāko niḥ sāra ucyate // GarP_3,14.34 //
GP12garup3_u:1776: māsi bhādrapade vīndra hyasāraṃ dadhi cocyate /
GP12garup3_u:1777: kṣīraṃ tu hyāśvine māse niḥ sāraṃ parikīrtitam // GarP_3,14.35 //
GP12garup3_u:1781: harinaivedyahīnastu pāko niḥ sāra ucyate // GarP_3,14.37 //
GP12garup3_u:1783: praharaṃ mallikā sāraṃ jātī tu praharārdhakam // GarP_3,14.38 //
GP12garup3_u:1787: kastūrī daśavarṣaṃ tu karpūraṃ varṣamātrakam // GarP_3,14.40 //
GP12garup3_u:1789: śuddhanniḥ sārabhūtāṃśca vakṣye śṛṇu khageśvara // GarP_3,14.41 //
GP12garup3_u:1790: tuṣā medhyā āranālaṃ puṇyakaṃ bhiḥ saṭā tathā /
GP12garup3_u:1793: palāñjurlaśunaṃ vṛntaṃ kalañjaṃ ca tathā dvijā // GarP_3,14.43 //
GP12garup3_u:1794: etatsarvatra kāle ca niḥ sāramiti kīrtitam /
GP12garup3_u:1795: ekādaśyāṃ vaiśvadevaṃ śrāddhaṃ tarpaṇameva ca // GarP_3,14.44 //
GP12garup3_u:1797: havirnārāyaṇo devo etāṃśca hyaśubhānra sān // GarP_3,14.45 //
GP12garup3_u:1798: na gṛhṇāti na gṛhṇāti na gṛhṇāti hariḥ svayam /
GP12garup3_u:1799: tathāpi sarvaṃ jānāti jīvānāṃ pāpakarmaṇām // GarP_3,14.46 //
GP12garup3_u:1801: asārabhojanaṃ caiva jīvānāṃ karmajaṃ phalam // GarP_3,14.47 //
GP12garup3_u:1803: śubhāni ca pibedviṣṇuraśubhaṃ no pibedvibhuḥ // GarP_3,14.48 //
GP12garup3_u:1804: ko vadettasya ceṣṭāṃ tu pūrṇānando hariḥ svayam /
GP12garup3_u:1805: na tena sadṛśaḥ kopi deśe kāle ca vidyate /
GP12garup3_u:1807: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe vaiśvadevārthakasārāsāravastuviveko nāma caturdaśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:1810: athāvatā rānpuruṣākhyo hariśca gato dhyānaṃ kartumīśo mahātmā /
GP12garup3_u:1811: prādurbabhūvākhilasadguṇārṇavaḥ sa eva viṣṇuḥ sa ca bījabhūtaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:1812: yo bījabhūtaḥ puruṣākhya viṣṇuḥ sa evābhūdvāsudevo mahātmā /
GP12garup3_u:1813: sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ puruṣākhyasya vāyormāyākhyāyāṃ mūlarūpo yathā'sa //
GP12garup3_u:1814: yo vāsudevastu sa eva jātaḥ saṃkarṣaṇākhyo khilasadguṇātmā /
GP12garup3_u:1816: sa evaṃ saṃkarṣaṇanāmadheyaḥ pradyumnanāmā ca sa eva viśrutaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1817: sarasvatībhāratīsarjanārthaṃ sa eva devyā mūlarūpo babhūva // GarP_3,15.4
GP12garup3_u:1818: sṛṣṭvā yuktaṃ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kalābhirmahattattvaṃ sūkṣmarūpaṃ sa eva /
GP12garup3_u:1819: sāhaṅkāraṃ krīḍayāmāsa devaḥ śṛṇu tvaṃ vai ṣoḍaśākhyāḥ kalāśca //
GP12garup3_u:1821: tato babhūva hyaniruddhasaṃjñako jīvāṃśca saṃgṛhya supūrṇaśaktiḥ //
GP12garup3_u:1822: soyaṃ viriñcyādisamastadevān sthūlena dehena sasarja nāthaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1823: tathā sa viṣṇuḥ puruṣābhidhastu sanatkumāratvamavāpa vīndra // GarP_3,15.7
GP12garup3_u:1824: ananyasādhyaṃ brahmacaryaṃ ca kartuṃ daśendriyāṇāṃ śoṣaṇārthaṃ sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:1825: sanandanādau paṭhitaḥ kumārastasmānnānyo nātra vicāryamasti // GarP_3,15.8
GP12garup3_u:1826: sa eva viṣṇuḥ sūkaratvaṃ hyavāpa kṣopaṇīmuddhartuṃ daityavapurnihantum /
GP12garup3_u:1827: hiraṇyākṣaṃ sajjanānāṃ khagendra tathā bhūmeḥ sthāpanārthaṃ ca devaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:1829: tatrāvatāre pañcarātraṃ samagramupādeṣṭuṃ nāpa dānaṃ svatantraḥ //
GP12garup3_u:1830: sa eva viṣṇuḥ samabhūdbradaryāṃ nārāyaṇākhyaḥ śamalāpahaśca /
GP12garup3_u:1831: tapastaptuṃ śikṣayituṃ tvṛṣīṇāṃ tiraskartuṃ hyapsarasāṃ sahasram //
GP12garup3_u:1832: tato hariḥ kapilatvaṃ hyavāpya tirohitānkālabalena tattvān /
GP12garup3_u:1836: sa eva vaṃśepyabhavadraveśca ākūtyāṃ yaḥ saccidānandarūpaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1837: svāyaṃbhuvaṃ yattu manvantaraṃ ca devaiḥ sākaṃ pālayāmāsa vīndra //
GP12garup3_u:1838: sa eva viṣṇuḥ sa urukramobhūdāgnīdhraputryāṃ merudevyāṃ ca nābheḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1839: vidyāratānāṃ mānināṃ sarvadaivamatyāścaryaṃ darśayituṃ ca vīndra //
GP12garup3_u:1841: pṛṣṭhe dhartuṃ mandaraṃ parvataṃ ca brahmāṇḍaṃ vā dhartumīśo mahātmā //
GP12garup3_u:1844: tato harirjagṛhe śrīvapuśca yanmohinīti pravadanti loke /
GP12garup3_u:1845: udvṛttānāṃ ditijānāṃ mahātmā samyakteṣāṃ vañcayituṃ harirbalam //
GP12garup3_u:1849: indrāyedaṃ dātukāmaḥ khagendra tadarthaṃ vai pāvituṃ sovituṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:1850: tato harirjamadagneḥ sutobhūlloke sarve parśurāmaṃ vadanti /
GP12garup3_u:1851: brahmadviṣāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca vīndra bhūmiṃ niḥ kṣatrāṃ kartukāmo maheśaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:1854: tato harī raghuvaṃśevatīrṇaḥ kausalyāyāṃ rāghavaḥ sūryavaṃśe /
GP12garup3_u:1855: samudrādorvigrahaṃ kartumīśo haṃ tuṃ bhūmyāṃ rāvaṇādīṃśca vīndra //
GP12garup3_u:1856: tato harirvyāsarūpī babhūva aṣṭāviṃśe dvapare jñānarūpī /
GP12garup3_u:1857: parāśarātsatyavatyāṃ mahātmā svayaṃ vedān saṃvibhaktuṃ ca devaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:1858: tato hariḥ kṛṣṇarūpī babhūva devakyāṃ vai vasudevātsa viṣṇuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1859: kaṃsādīnvai nitarāṃ hantukāmaḥ samyakpātuṃ pāṇḍavāṃścāpi vīndra //
GP12garup3_u:1860: tataḥ kalau saṃpravṛtte haristu saṃmohanārthaṃ cāsurāṇāṃ khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:1861: nāmnā buddho kīkaṭeṣu prajāto vedapramāṇaṃ nirākartumeva // GarP_3,15.26
GP12garup3_u:1862: tato hariḥ kalkisaṃjñaśca vīndra utpatsyate yugayormadhyasaṃdhau /
GP12garup3_u:1865: viśvādaya sahasraṃ ca parādyā amitāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,15.28 //
GP12garup3_u:1867: svayaṃ nārāyaṇāste te nāṇumātraṃ vibhidyate // GarP_3,15.29 //
GP12garup3_u:1870: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe viṣṇoravatāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcadaśo
GP12garup3_u:1874: śṛṇu samyaṅ mahābhāga tajjñānasya vinirṇayam // GarP_3,16.1 //
GP12garup3_u:1875: īśādanyasya jagato hyātmo locana eva tu /
GP12garup3_u:1880: puṃso hibhāryā prakṛtiḥ prakṛteścā bhimāninī // GarP_3,16.4 //
GP12garup3_u:1881: sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ guṇānvīndra puruṣeṇa saha prabho /
GP12garup3_u:1882: tamaḥ pānaṃ tathā kartuṃ prakṛtyākhyā tadābhavat // GarP_3,16.5 //
GP12garup3_u:1883: vāsudevasya bhāryā tu māyā nāmnī prakīrtitā /
GP12garup3_u:1884: saṃkarṣaṇasya bhāryā tu jayeti parikīrtitā // GarP_3,16.6 //
GP12garup3_u:1885: aniruddhasya bhāryā tu śāntā nāmnīti kīrtitā /
GP12garup3_u:1886: kṛtiḥ pradyumnabhāryāpiṃ sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ babhūvaha // GarP_3,16.7 //
GP12garup3_u:1890: rajobhimānibhūdevī bhāryā sā sūkarasya ca // GarP_3,16.9 //
GP12garup3_u:1892: nārāyaṇasya bhāryā tu lakṣmīrūpā tvajā smṛtā // GarP_3,16.10 //
GP12garup3_u:1895: videhaputrī sītā tu rāmabhāryā prakīrtitā // GarP_3,16.12 //
GP12garup3_u:1900: atha brahmā ca vāyuśca śriyaḥ koṭiguṇādhamau /
GP12garup3_u:1901: vakṣye ca brahmaṇo rūpaṃ śṛṇu pakṣīndrasattama // GarP_3,16.15 //
GP12garup3_u:1903: sa eva puruṣonāma viriñca iti kīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,16.16 //
GP12garup3_u:1907: vidhisaṃjño viriñcaḥ sa jñātavyaḥ pakṣisattama // GarP_3,16.18 //
GP12garup3_u:1912: saṃkarṣaṇācca garuḍa jayāyāṃ yo vabhūva ha /
GP12garup3_u:1913: sa vāyuḥ prathamo jñeyo pradhāna iti kīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,16.21 //
GP12garup3_u:1915: badarīsthasya viṣṇośca dhairyeṇa stavanāya saḥ // GarP_3,16.22 //
GP12garup3_u:1918: yato hṛdi sthito vāyustato vai dhṛtisaṃjñakaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1919: sarveṣāṃ ca dṛdi sthitvā smarate sarvadā harim // GarP_3,16.24 //
GP12garup3_u:1922: sadā smarati vai vīndra atosau smṛtisaṃjñakaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1923: sarveṣāṃ ca hṛdisthitvā jñāto viṣṇorudīraṇāt // GarP_3,16.26 //
GP12garup3_u:1927: viṣṇau bhaktiṃ vardhyati bhaktānāṃ hṛdi saṃsthitaḥ // GarP_3,16.28 //
GP12garup3_u:1931: prabhuḥ prabhūṇāṃ garuḍa sodarāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // GarP_3,16.30 //
GP12garup3_u:1933: sarveṣāṃ ca hṛhi sthitvā balaṃ paśyati sattama // GarP_3,16.31 //
GP12garup3_u:1935: sarveṣāṃ ca hṛdi sthitvā putrapautrādikairjanaiḥ // GarP_3,16.32 //
GP12garup3_u:1938: vakratvaṃ nāsti yogasya ṛjuryogya iti smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1943: ato na ṛjavo jñeyā manuṣyāṇāṃ ca kā kathā // GarP_3,16.36 //
GP12garup3_u:1947: mokṣādhikāriṇaḥ sarve kurvate kasya pūjanam // GarP_3,16.38 //
GP12garup3_u:1951: jñānaṃ ca viparītaṃ syāttena yātyadharaṃ tamaḥ // GarP_3,16.40 //
GP12garup3_u:1955: śive sūrye paṇmukhe ca viṣṇubuddhiḥ khageśvara // GarP_3,16.42 //
GP12garup3_u:1957: śilādyeṣu ca sarveṣu aikyenava vicintanam // GarP_3,16.43 //
GP12garup3_u:1961: anyeṣāṃ sarvadā nāsti ato na ṛjavaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_3,16.45 //
GP12garup3_u:1963: mokṣādhikāriṇāṃ kāle ataḥ prajñeti kathyate // GarP_3,16.46 //
GP12garup3_u:1965: ato vāyuḥ sadā vīndra jñānamityeva kīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,16.47 //
GP12garup3_u:1967: tataśca gurusaṃjñāṃ cāpyavāpa sa ca mārutaḥ // GarP_3,16.48 //
GP12garup3_u:1968: yogināṃ hṛdaye sthitvā sadhyāyati hariṃ param /
GP12garup3_u:1969: pārthakyenāpi taṃ dhyāyanmahādhyāteti sa smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,16.49 //
GP12garup3_u:1972: ato vai vijñanāmāsau prokto hi khagasattama /
GP12garup3_u:1973: kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ tyāgādvirāga iti sa smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,16.51 //
GP12garup3_u:1974: athavāyogināṃ nityaṃ hṛdi sthitvā sa mārutaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1975: vairāgyaṃ saṃjanayati virāga iti sa smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,16.52 //
GP12garup3_u:1977: tatsukhaṃ tūttareṣāṃ ca vāyuparyantameva ca // GarP_3,16.53 //
GP12garup3_u:1978: devānāṃ ca ṛṣīṇāṃ ca uttamānāṃ nṛṇāṃ tathā /
GP12garup3_u:1980: bhunakti sarvadā vīdraṃ tatra mukhyastu mārutaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1981: duḥ khaśokādikaṃ kiñciddevānāṃ bhavati prabho // GarP_3,16.55 //
GP12garup3_u:1984: yataḥ kaliścādhikaḥ syādato duḥ khīti sa smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:1985: daityānāṃ puṇyapāpābhyāṃ duḥ kha mevottarottaram // GarP_3,16.57 //
GP12garup3_u:1987: bhunakti sarvadā vīndra tataḥ kaliriti smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,16.58 //
GP12garup3_u:1989: devāveśo bhavettasya nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,16.59 //
GP12garup3_u:1993: tamo nāstyeva devānāṃ duḥ khaṃ nāsti svarūpataḥ // GarP_3,16.61 //
GP12garup3_u:1994: viṣayotthaṃ mahāduḥ khaṃ devānāṃ nāsti sarvadā /
GP12garup3_u:1995: duḥ khaśokādikaṃ kiṃ cidasurāveśato bhavet // GarP_3,16.62 //
GP12garup3_u:1996: ataḥ kaliḥ sadā duḥ khī sukhī vāyustu sarvadā /
GP12garup3_u:1997: manuṣyāṇā mṛṣīṇāṃ ca sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ khageśvara // GarP_3,16.63 //
GP12garup3_u:1999: kaṣṭabhaṅgaḥ kalilayo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,16.64 //
GP12garup3_u:2001: praviṣṭāḥ saṃti lokeṣu pṛthaksaṃti khageśvara // GarP_3,16.65 //
GP12garup3_u:2006: ato rocananāmāsau marudaṃśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ rāmāvatāre hanumānrāmakāryārthasādhakaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2007: sa eva bhīmasenastu jāto bhūmyāṃ mahābalaḥ // GarP_3,16.68 //
GP12garup3_u:2010: sarveṣāṃ saṃkaraṃ yastu kariṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,16.70 //
GP12garup3_u:2013: tadā bhūmau vāsudevo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2014: yajñārthaiḥ sadṛśo yasya nāsti loke caturdaśe // GarP_3,16.72 //
GP12garup3_u:2015: ataḥ sa prajñayā pūrṇo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2020: nāsti nāstyeva vāyostu tathā vairocanādike // GarP_3,16.75 //
GP12garup3_u:2022: nāsti nāstyeva pakṣīndra yato nāstyaśubhaṃ tataḥ // GarP_3,16.76 //
GP12garup3_u:2023: pūrvaṃ garbhaṃ samāśoṣya samaye prabhavasya ca /
GP12garup3_u:2029: etasya śravaṇādeva mokṣaṃ yānti na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2032: striyau dve yamale caiva tayormadhye tu yadyikā // GarP_3,16.81 //
GP12garup3_u:2035: caturmukhasya bhāryā tu kīrtitā sā sarasvatī // GarP_3,16.82 //
GP12garup3_u:2045: mahāgurorhi vāyośca bhāryā vai parikīrtitā // GarP_3,16.87 //
GP12garup3_u:2047: dhṛtirūpasya vāyośca bhāryā sā parikīrtitā // GarP_3,16.88 //
GP12garup3_u:2049: mahāprabhośca vāyośca bhāryā vai sā prakīrtitā // GarP_3,16.89 //
GP12garup3_u:2051: atastu bhāratī jñeyā bhujināmnā prakīrtitā // GarP_3,16.90 //
