GP12garup3_u:2053: rocanendrasya bhāryā ca śraddhākhyā parikīrtitā // GarP_3,16.91 //

GP12garup3_u:2124: śivanāmno dvijasyaiva gṛhe sā tu kumārikā /

GP12garup3_u:2145: kṛṣṇavarṇā yatastasmātsā kṛṣṇā bhūtale smṛtā // GarP_3,17.33 //
GP12garup3_u:2149: abhimānastadaiva syāttasyā eva na cānyathā // GarP_3,17.35 //

GP12garup3_u:2158: suṃdareṇa ca rūpeṇa praviṣṭo nakule marut /

GP12garup3_u:2161: draupadīṃ ramate nityaṃ sahadevotpayuṣāṃ khaga // GarP_3,17.41 //

GP12garup3_u:2166: aparokṣavatīnāṃ tu tāsāṃ lepo na sarvathā /

GP12garup3_u:2173: na jānantyeva martyāṃstu teṣu deheṣu te punaḥ // GarP_3,17.47 //

GP12garup3_u:2175_1: tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhāratyā viśiṣṭadeha saṃprāptyai kāraṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ

GP12garup3_u:2184: hare sadā namāmi tvāṃ bahu janmani janmani /
GP12garup3_u:2185: evaṃ buddhā tu garuḍo hyabhūcca śayanaṃ hareḥ // GarP_3,18.4 //
GP12garup3_u:2187: kālanāmā ca garuḍo vāhanārthaṃ harerabhūt // GarP_3,18.5 //
GP12garup3_u:2189: ahaṃ kārātmako rudraḥ samabhūtsovituṃ harim // GarP_3,18.6 //

GP12garup3_u:2192: śeṣaḥ sa eva vijñeyo bhakto nārāyaṇasya ca /
GP12garup3_u:2196: rāmasya sevāṃ kartuṃ sā sītā bhūmyāṃ khagādhipa /
GP12garup3_u:2201: na vīndrāsyāvatārosti bhūmyāṃ cājñā tathā hareḥ // GarP_3,18.12 //
GP12garup3_u:2207: ataḥ sadāśaivo jñeyo na ca bhāgavataḥ śivaḥ // GarP_3,18.15 //
GP12garup3_u:2213: ataḥ sadāśivo jñeyo na ca bhāgavataḥ śivaḥ // GarP_3,18.18 //
GP12garup3_u:2215: ataḥ sadāśivo jñeyo na ca bhāgavataḥ śivaḥ // GarP_3,18.19 //
GP12garup3_u:2217: ato rudrastapaḥ saṃjñāmavāpa ca khagottama // GarP_3,18.20 //
GP12garup3_u:2221: durvāsāstu sa vijñeyo mānabhaṅgāya bhūbhṛtām // GarP_3,18.22 //
GP12garup3_u:2224: īśānakoṇe saṃsthito yastu rudro hyavāpa vai vāmadeveti saṃjñām /
GP12garup3_u:2225: svavāmabhāge saṃsthitaṃ caiva vāyustaṃ yogyabhaktaṃ sevate sarvadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:2226: ato rudro vāmadeveti saṃjñā mavāpa śiṣṭatvamathottamatvam /
GP12garup3_u:2227: kālātmakatvaṃ ca balātmakatvamavāpa rudro na tu suṃdaratvataḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2228: sadā rudro tripurasthāṃśca daityānviṣṇuduho hantu kāmo mahātmā /
GP12garup3_u:2229: aghorarūpaṃ dhṛpavānrudra eva tatastvaghoreti sa āpa saṃjñām //
GP12garup3_u:2230: sevāṃ kartuṃ tvicchato daityasaṃghānkiñcitkālaṃ tapasā kliśyamānān /
GP12garup3_u:2231: varāndātuṃ sadya evābhijātaḥ sadyojātetyeva saṃjñāmavāpa // GarP_3,18.27
GP12garup3_u:2232: uroḥ putrastu aurvaśca rudra eva prakīrtitaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2242: dṛṣṭvā svabiṃbaṃ suguṇaistu pūrṇaṃ saṃkarṣaṇākhyaṃ natapādapadm /
GP12garup3_u:2244: dṛṣṭvā hariṃ pulakāṅgastu rudraḥ sabhāṣpacakṣū ruddhakaṇṭhaśca hṛṣṭaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2245: anādyanantabrahmakalpeṣu naiva kṛtaṃ yayā smaraṇaṃ sarvadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:2246: pādāravinde sunakhairvibhūṣite dṛṣṭe mayā kena puṇyena deva /
GP12garup3_u:2247: dṛṣṭvādṛṣṭvā pādapadmaṃ murāreḥ punaḥ punā ruddhakaṇṭho babhūva //
GP12garup3_u:2248: ruroda rudro bhayakaṃpitāṅgaḥ kathaṃ punardarśanaṃ me prabhoḥ syāt /
GP12garup3_u:2249: mukunda nārāyaṇa viśvamūrte vāgindriyeṇa stavanaṃ me kathaṃ syāt //
GP12garup3_u:2250: maddarśanaṃ sarvadā pāpuyuktaṃ tathā madvāk sarvadā pāpayuktā /
GP12garup3_u:2251: maddarśanaṃ sarvadā strīṣu saktamabhūcca te darśanaṃ me hyasaktam //
GP12garup3_u:2252: āsaktatā putradārādikānāṃ samyak śaktistavane nāsti viṣṇoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2253: viṣṇustutau nāvakāśosti vāco dṛṣṭohaṃ tvaṃ kena puṇyena deva //
GP12garup3_u:2254: anantakarṇeśa sucandrasaṃjña śrotreṇa nityaṃ na kathā śrutā te /
GP12garup3_u:2255: śrutā mayā bahudhā lokavārtā dṛṣṭo mayā tvaṃ kena puṇyena deva //
GP12garup3_u:2256: dṛṣṭvādṛṣṭvā pādapīṭhaṃ hareśca punaḥ punā ruddhaṅkaṭho babhūva /

GP12garup3_u:2259: sadā na liptaṃ ca bhujairviliptaṃ tanmūtraviṣṭhādimakardamāmbubhiḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2261: anarpitairvastragandhādikaiśca dṛṣṭo mayā kena puṇyena deva //
GP12garup3_u:2262: spṛṣṭvāspṛṣṭvā harinirmālyagandhaṃ punaḥ punā ruddhakaṇṭho babhūva /
GP12garup3_u:2263: ruroda rudro bhayakaṃpitāṅgaḥ kathaṃ punaḥ sparśanaṃ syātsadā me //
GP12garup3_u:2264: nṛsiṃha nāsāsthita nāsikeśa mannāsayā kvāpi supadmasaurabham /
GP12garup3_u:2266: sunāsikaṃ suṣṭhudantaṃ murāre dṛṣṭaṃ mukhaṃ kena puṇyena deva /
GP12garup3_u:2267: ghrātvā ghrātvā viṣṇunirmālyagandhaṃ punaḥ punā ruddhakaṇṭho babhūva //
GP12garup3_u:2268: ruroda rudro bhayakaṃpitāṅgo jighrāmi nirmālyamidaṃ kathaṃ te /
GP12garup3_u:2269: jihvāsthito jihva saṃjño murāre jihvendriyeṇāpi tathārpitaṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:2271: yo snāti nityaṃ purato murāreḥ prāpnoti yajñāyutakoṭipuṇyam //
GP12garup3_u:2272: etādṛśaṃ tava naivedyaśeṣaṃ na bhuktaṃ vai sarvadādityarūpam /
GP12garup3_u:2273: anarpitaṃ tava devasya viṣṇorbhuktaṃ mayā bahuvāraṃ mukunda //
GP12garup3_u:2274: pādāravinde nārpitaṃ bhakṣyabhojyaṃ dṛṣṭo mayā kena puṇyena deva /
GP12garup3_u:2275: bhuktvābhuktvā harinairavedyajātaṃ sukhaṃ tvadīyaṃ ramayā lālitaṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:2276: dyubhvāśrayaṃ tava mūrdhānamāhuḥ kirīṭayuktaṃ kuṭilaiḥ kuntalaiśca /
GP12garup3_u:2279: evaṃ subhaktyā ca ruroda rudro dṛṣṭvā hariṃ survaguṇaiḥ saṃpūrṇam //
GP12garup3_u:2281: dṛṣṭaṃ mayā dayayā vāsudeva drakṣye kathaṃ punaritthaṃ ruroda //
GP12garup3_u:2282: dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tvarivale bhavināśiśaṅkhacakrādikaistrijagatāpi ca deva pūrṇam
GP12garup3_u:2283: etādṛśaṃ tvadudaraṃ ca kathaṃ rameśa drakṣye punaḥ punarahaṃ tviti saṃruroda // GarP_3,18.52
GP12garup3_u:2284: ānandapūrṇa nakhapūrṇa sukeśapūrṇa lomādipūrṇa guṇapūrṇa sughoṇapūrṇa /
GP12garup3_u:2285: vakṣaḥ sthalaṃ tava vibhostu viśālabhūtaṃ sadbhūṣaṇaṃ vimalakaustubhaśobhi lakṣmyā // GarP_3,18.53
GP12garup3_u:2286: sukomalaṃ śrītulasyāstathaiva supuṣpitaṃ canda naiścarcitaṃ ca /

GP12garup3_u:2294: kadā caitānheyabuddhyā vimuñce na jānehaṃ ceti samyag ruroda /
GP12garup3_u:2295: ete hi mūrkhā viṣayānarthalabdhyai kurvanti yatnaṃ paramādareṇa //
GP12garup3_u:2296: kadindriyārthaṃ hi dhanādikaṃ ca tyajanti ca sarve viṣayeṣu niṣṭhāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2298: smṛtvāsmṛtvā vāsudevasya māyāṃ ruroda caurvo bhayakaṃpitāṅgaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2299: atīva kaṣṭena ca lokavṛttyā śritā dainyaṃ svīyakāryaṃ vihāya //
GP12garup3_u:2300: atīva dainyena dhanādikaṃ ca saṃpādya sarve 'pi supāpaśīlāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2301: kaṣṭārjitaṃ dravyadhanādikaṃ ca tyajanti sarve paśavo vyarthameva //
GP12garup3_u:2302: satpātrabhūte viṣṇubuddhyā kadāpi tyajanti naite māyayā vai murāreḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2303: eṣāmāyurvyarthamāhurmahāntaḥ kathaṃ naṣṭā iti samyagruroda // GarP_3,18.62
GP12garup3_u:2304: eṣāmāyurvyarthamevaṃ gataṃ ca eṣāṃ dṛṣṭvā yauvanaṃ tu dhruvaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2305: skandhasthamṛtyurhasate kṛṣṇa viṣṇo taṃ vai na jānanti vimūḍhacetasaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2306: gṛhaṃ madīyaṃ śatavarṣaṃ ca jīvetputrā madīyā śavatavarṣaṃ tathaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2307: ahaṃ ca jīve śatavarṣaṃ sukhena madīyabhāryāpi sulakṣaṇā'ste //
GP12garup3_u:2308: gāvaśca me saṃti sadugdhapūrṇā mitrāṇi me saṃti mudā hi yuktāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2309: dāsye sutaṃ vāraṇārthaṃ tu vadhvai putrīṃ vivāhārthamahaṃ dadāmi //
GP12garup3_u:2310: dāsye cāhaṃ satsu putrīṃ dhanaṃ vā dāsye cāhaṃ dhanikeṣveva nityam /
GP12garup3_u:2312: nāhaṃ kariṣye śravaṇaṃ kathāyā madbhāgyanā śaśca bhaviṣyatīti /
GP12garup3_u:2313: nāhaṃ hariṃ pūjayiṣye sadaiva putrādināśaśca bhaviṣyatīti // GarP_3,18.67
GP12garup3_u:2316: atastvaurvo rudrarūpī khagendra jānīhi nityaṃ kṛṣṇasuśikṣitārthaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2317: yadā satī dakṣaputrī khagendra dakṣādhvare svaśarīraṃ visṛjya //
GP12garup3_u:2319: ūrdhvaretā bhavetyuktvā ūrdhvaretā babhūva ha // GarP_3,18.70 //

GP12garup3_u:2348: nirṇayaṃ brṛhi govinda sarvajñosi na saṃśayaḥ /

GP12garup3_u:2357: sarve guṇaiḥ śataguṇāḥ krameṇoktā nu te 'khilāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2358: bhāratyāśca śataṃ jñānaṃ sukhaṃ bhaktibalādhike // GarP_3,19.9 //
GP12garup3_u:2360: evaṃ jñānaṃ śataṃ jñeyaṃ mārute nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,19.10 //
GP12garup3_u:2361: bhāratyāśca śataṃ jñānaṃ balaṃ ca samudāhṛtam /
GP12garup3_u:2362: evameva ca vāyośca jñānaṃ caivamiti sphuṭam // GarP_3,19.11 //
GP12garup3_u:2366: ānandatāratamyaṃ ca yathoktaṃ tu mayā tava // GarP_3,19.13 //
GP12garup3_u:2367: tathaiva jānīhi khaga nānyathā tu kathañcana /
GP12garup3_u:2368: ahaṃ vijānāmi mayi sthitān guṇānsarvairviśeṣaiśca khagendra saṃyutān //
GP12garup3_u:2369: susūkṣmarūpāṃśca sadā khagendra mayāpyadṛṣṭo nāsti nāstyeva kaścit //
GP12garup3_u:2370: sarvāvatāreṣvapi vidyamānaṃ hariṃ vijānāti ramāpi devī // GarP_3,19.16 //
GP12garup3_u:2372: susūkṣmarūpānsā vijānāti devī brahmādibhyo matprasādādhikaṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:2373: svātmasvarūpaṃ pravijānāti devī susūkṣmarūpaṃ suviśeṣaiśca yuktam /
GP12garup3_u:2374: svānyaṃ prapañcaṃ pravijānāti lakṣmīstathāpyaśeṣaiḥ suviśeṣaiśca yuktam //
GP12garup3_u:2376: śrotraṃ na jānāti harerguṇāṃśca susūkṣmarūpāṃśca viśeṣasaṃyutān //
GP12garup3_u:2377: spaṣṭasvarūpeṇa yathā viduḥ surā muktvā brahmāṇaṃ na tathā tepyamuktāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2378: svātmānamanyacca sadā viśeṣaryuktaṃ vijānāti vidhiśca mārutaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2379: vāṇī vijānāti harerguṇāṃśca svayaṃbhuvo naiva tāvadviśeṣān /
GP12garup3_u:2381: śeṣo rudro vīndra etaiśca sarve tamo mātre pravijānanti saṃstham /
GP12garup3_u:2382: vāṇīdṛṣṭānsaviśeṣān guṇāṃste jānanti no satyamevoktamaṅga // GarP_3,19.22
GP12garup3_u:2383: umā suparṇā vāruṇī ceti tisraḥ sahaiva taḥ pravijānanti sustham /
GP12garup3_u:2384: harerviśeṣānarudra dṛṣṭānkhagendra jānanti naitāḥ kvāpi deśe ca kāle //
GP12garup3_u:2385: indrādayaḥ pravijānanti vīndra ahaṅkāre vyāptarūpaṃ hariṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2386: dakṣādyā vai buddhitattve sthitaṃ taṃ jānanti te somasūryādayaśca //
GP12garup3_u:2387: viṣṇuṃ hariṃ bhūtatattve sthitaṃ ca ye cānye ca pravijānanti nityam /
GP12garup3_u:2388: anye ca paśyanti yathā svayogyamaṇḍāntarasthaṃ harirūpaṃ khagendra //
GP12garup3_u:2389: kecitprapaśyanti hareśca rūpaṃ tvadīyahṛtsthaṃ hṛdi kecitsadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2390: evaṃprakāraṃ pravijānīhi vīndra hyatho śṛṇu tvaṃmama bhāryāḥ ṣaḍetāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2391: rukmiṇyādyāḥ ṣaṇmahiṣyo mamaśrīrnīlā ca yā mama bhāryā khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:2392: sarge pūrvasminhavyavāhasya putrī tāstā bhaje sadya evā viśeṣāt //
GP12garup3_u:2393: kanyaiva sā kṛṣṇapatnī ca kāmāṃstāṃstān bhajenmanasā cintitāṃśca /
GP12garup3_u:2394: atīva yatnaṃ kavyavāhaṃ khagendra pitṛṣvekaḥ sarvadā vai cakāra //
GP12garup3_u:2395: tathaiva sā naiva bhartāramāpa yatastu sā kṛṣṇaniṣṭhaikacittā //
GP12garup3_u:2396: tadābravītkavyavāhaśca putrariṃ patiṃ kimarthaṃ necchasi mūḍhabuddhe /
GP12garup3_u:2397: tadābravītkavyavāhaṃ ca puttrī hariṃ vinā sarvaguṇopapanne /
GP12garup3_u:2398: janmanyasmin bhartṛtā nāsti deva yato bhartā hariravaika eva //
GP12garup3_u:2399: yato loke sustriyaḥ sarva eva saṃdā jñeyā vidhavāste hi nityam /
GP12garup3_u:2400: anādi nityaṃ bhuvanaikasāraṃ susuṃdaraṃ mokṣadaṃ kāmadaṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:2401: etādṛśaṃ na vijānanti yāstu sarvāstā vai vidhavāḥ sarvadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2402: nimittabhūtaṃ bhartṛrūpaṃ ca jīvaṃ daivopetaṃ haribhaktyā vihīnam //
GP12garup3_u:2403: sukaśmalaṃ navarandhraiḥ stravantaṃ durgandhayuktaṃ sarvadā kutsitaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2404: etāḥ dṛśe bhartṛjīve nu tāta prayojanaṃ nāsti kṛṣṇaṃ vihāya //
GP12garup3_u:2405: devastriyo nijabhartṝnvihāyu tatra sthitaṃ prīṇayantyeva nityam /
GP12garup3_u:2406: ataśca tāḥ sadhavāḥ sarvadaiva lokairvandyā nātra vicāryamasti //
GP12garup3_u:2407: bhartāste haribhaktā yadi syurāsāṃ strīṇāṃ janmasāphalyameva /
GP12garup3_u:2409: yadbhartāro haribhaktā na saṃti tābhistyājyaṃ svīyagātraṃ bhṛśaṃ hi /
GP12garup3_u:2410: svabhartṛtaṃ kṛṣṇarūpaṃ hariṃ ca smṛtvā samyag yadi gātraṃ tyajeyuḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2411: tadā naiva hyātmahatyādidoṣāḥ strīṇāmevaṃ nirṇayoyaṃ hi śāstre /
GP12garup3_u:2412: yadbhartāro na vijānanti viṣṇuṃ tāsāṃ saṃgo naiva kāryaḥ kadāpi //
GP12garup3_u:2414: kalau yuge durlabhā viṣṇubhaktā harebhaktirdurlabhā sarvadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:2415: hareḥ kathā durlabhā martyaloke harerdīkṣā durlabhā durlabhā ca /
GP12garup3_u:2416: harestattve nirṇayo durlabho hi harerdāsaiḥ saṃgamo durlabhaśca //
GP12garup3_u:2417: pradakṣiṇaṃ durlabhaṃ vai murārernamaskāro durlabho vai kalau ca /
GP12garup3_u:2418: tadbhaktānāṃ pālanaṃ durlabhaṃ ca sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ durlabhaṃ hyannadānam //
GP12garup3_u:2419: tantroktapūjā durlabhā vai murārernāmagraho durlabhaścava viṣṇoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2420: suvaiṣṇavānāṃ pujanaṃ durlabhaṃ hi sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ bhāṣaṇaṃ durlabhaṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:2421: śālagrāmasparśanaṃ durlabhaṃ ca sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ darśanaṃ durlabhaṃ hi /
GP12garup3_u:2422: gosparśanaṃ durlabhaṃ martyaloke sadgāyanaṃ durlabhaṃ sadguruñca //
GP12garup3_u:2423: sadbhāryāḥ satputrakā durlabhā hi śeṣācalasthasya hareśca darśanam /
GP12garup3_u:2424: sudurlabhaṃ raṅganāthasya tīre kāveryā vai darśanaṃ viṣṇupadyāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2425: kāñcīkṣetre varadarājasya sevā sudurlabhā darśanaṃ caiva loke /
GP12garup3_u:2426: sudurlabhaṃ darśanaṃ rāmasetoḥ sudurlabhā madhvaśāstre ca śaktiḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2427: bhīmātīre saṃsthitasyāpi viṣṇoḥ sudurlabhaṃ darśanaṃ cāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2429: tathā badrau saṃsthita syāpi viṣṇoḥ sudurlabhaṃ martyaloke sthitānām /
GP12garup3_u:2430: śeṣācale śrīnivāsāśrame ca tapasvino durlabhā martyaloke // GarP_3,19.46
GP12garup3_u:2431: prayāgākhye mādhavasyāpi nityaṃ sudarśanaṃ durlabhaṃ vai nṛṇāṃ hi //
GP12garup3_u:2433: evamuktvā sā pitaraṃ yayau śeṣācalaṃ prati // GarP_3,19.48 //
GP12garup3_u:2435: tatrasthaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā natvā mahāsatī // GarP_3,19.49 //
GP12garup3_u:2439: gartabhūte ca ekānte cacāra tapa uttamam // GarP_3,19.51 //
GP12garup3_u:2443: tvameva mātā ca pitā tvameva bhartā ca sakhātvameva /
GP12garup3_u:2444: tvameva putraśca gururgarīyānmitraṃ svasā tvaṃ mama vallabhaśca //
GP12garup3_u:2445: anādyananteṣvapi janmasu prabho vicāryamāṇā na vijānepyahaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2446: etai hi sarve ca nimittamātrataḥ pitrādayastvaṃ hyanimittamātrataḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2447: ato murāreśca tavaiva bhāryā bhūyāsamityeva tadā vrataṃ me /
GP12garup3_u:2448: duḥ saṃgamātrādisamāgamaṃ na saṃsiddhirityeva vadānyamūrte // GarP_3,19.55
GP12garup3_u:2449: tvaddūṣakāṇāṃ tava dāsavarya vidūṣakāṇāṃ darśanaṃ chindhi deva /
GP12garup3_u:2450: gurudruhāṃ darśanaṃ chindhi viṣṇo bhaktadruhāṃ mitratāṃ chindhi kṛṣṇa //
GP12garup3_u:2451: tava dhrugbhirbhāṣaṇaṃ chindhi deva tvaṃ saṃgamaṃ dehi padāravinde /
GP12garup3_u:2452: śrīśailavāsāya namonamaste namonamaḥ śrīnivāsāya tubhyam // GarP_3,19.57
GP12garup3_u:2453: svāmin parāvara rameśa nidānamūrte kālo mahānapi gataśca nidarśanante /
GP12garup3_u:2455: kathaṃ mama syāttava darśanaṃ prabho sarvaiśca doṣaiśca susaṃgatāyāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2456: dāsyāspadāyāstava dāsadāsyāḥ prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa // GarP_3,19.59 //
GP12garup3_u:2460: hariṇodīritaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā prāha smitānanā // GarP_3,19.61 //
GP12garup3_u:2462: ahaṃ hi bhāryā bhūyāsaṃ tava mādhava suṃdara // GarP_3,19.62 //
GP12garup3_u:2465: ahaṃ kumāri subhage kṛṣṇajanmani bhūtale // GarP_3,19.63 //
GP12garup3_u:2466: bhavāmi tava bhartāhaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup3_u:2467: evamuktā sutā kanyā puraṇyarāśiṃ hariṃ param // GarP_3,19.64 //
GP12garup3_u:2477: dehaṃ tatraiva saṃtyajya kumārī caiva putrikā // GarP_3,19.68 //
GP12garup3_u:2478: kumbha kasya gṛhe jātā nīlā nāmnā tu sā smṛtā /
GP12garup3_u:2480: kalpavāhaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ pitṝṇāṃ prathamaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2484: tato nāgnijito rājño gṛhe jātā kumārikā // GarP_3,19.71 //
GP12garup3_u:2488: baddhvā vṛṣānnṛpāñjitvā prāptā nīlā mahākhaga // GarP_3,19.73 //
GP12garup3_u:2489: kuṃbhakasya sutā nīlā dehasthāḥ prāviśan bhṛśam /
GP12garup3_u:2491: bhūmau dvidhā saṃprajātā kumāryeva na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2493: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe nīlāvivāhanirṇayo nāmaikonaviṃśo
GP12garup3_u:2496: yā pūrvasarge nalasaṃjñasya vīndra putrī bhūtvā viṣṇupatnī sakāmā /
GP12garup3_u:2497: pradakṣiṇaṃ bhramaṇaṃ vai cakāra guṇena bhadrā bhadrasaṃjñā babhūva //
GP12garup3_u:2498: kanyābhāve saṃsthitāṃ bhadrasaṃjñāṃ pitā nalastvabravīttāṃ sa paśyan /
GP12garup3_u:2499: bhadre kimarthaṃ gātrapīḍāṃ karoṣi phalaṃ hi tannandini me vadasva //
GP12garup3_u:2501: śṛṇutvaṃ me tāta namaskriyādeḥ phalaṃ vaktuṃ kā samarthā bhavecca //
GP12garup3_u:2502: tathāpyahaṃ tava vakṣyāmi tāta yathāśaktyā śṛṇu samyagghitāya /
GP12garup3_u:2503: sadā harimarma nātho dayālurahaṃ harestava dāsānudāsī /
GP12garup3_u:2504: māṃ pāhi viṣṇostava vande pade ityuktvā praṇāmaṃ cākaroddaṇḍarūpam //
GP12garup3_u:2505: hareḥ praṇāmaṃ tviti kartavyaśūnyaṃ vyarthaṃ tamāhurjñāninastacchṛṇu tvam
GP12garup3_u:2507: yathā prasanno vandanāddevaddeva stathā na tuṣṭaḥ pūjanātkarmataśca /
GP12garup3_u:2508: yathā nāmasmaraṇādvandanādvā pāpānniyacchetu tathā na cānyaiḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2509: dehaṃ tu ye poṣayantyeva tāta hareḥ praṇāmaiḥ śūnyabhūtaṃ ca puṣṭam /
GP12garup3_u:2510: tadevamāhurvyarthameveti tāta tatpoṣakāṇāṃ narake duḥ khamāhuḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2511: yamo 'pi taṃ tatra ulūkhale tu nidhāya piṣṭaṃ sukhalaiḥ karoti /
GP12garup3_u:2512: yo vā paraṃ na karotyeva tāta pradakṣiṇaṃ devadevasya viṣṇoḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2513: tasyaiva pādau talayantre nidhāya yamaśca nityaṃ prakaroti piṣṭam /
GP12garup3_u:2514: eṣāṃ jihvā harikṛṣṇeti nāma na vakti nityaṃ vyarthabhūtāṃ vadanti //
GP12garup3_u:2515: teṣāṃ jihvā yamaloke yamastu niṣkāsya piṣṭaṃ prakaroti nityam /
GP12garup3_u:2516: kāśīnivāsena ca kiṃ prayojanaṃ kiṃ vā prayāge maraṇena tāta //
GP12garup3_u:2517: kiṃ vāraṇāgre maraṇena saukhyaṃ kiṃ vā makhādeḥ samanuṣṭhitena /
GP12garup3_u:2519: yeṣāṃ jihvāgre harināmaiva nāsti yeṣāṃ gātrairnamanaṃ nāpi viṣṇoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2520: yeṣāṃ padbhyāṃ nāsti hareḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ teṣāṃ sarvaṃ vyarthamāhurmahāntaḥ // GarP_3,20.12
GP12garup3_u:2522: ato viṣṇornamanaṃ kāryameva harernāmasmaraṇaṃ tāta kāryam // GarP_3,20.13
GP12garup3_u:2523: janma hyetaddurlabhaṃ naśvaraṃ tu yathā jalasthaṃ tattathaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2524: no visvāsaṃ kuru gātre tvadīye jīveṣvapi svaḥ paraśceti tāta //
GP12garup3_u:2525: sadyaḥ kṛtaṃ namanaṃ na tvadīyaṃ sadyaḥ kṛtaṃ smaraṇaṃ na tvadīyam /
GP12garup3_u:2526: kadā prāpsye maraṇaṃ tanna jāne na viśvāsaṃ kuru gātre mahātman //
GP12garup3_u:2529: sāpi pradakṣiṇaṃ cakre namaskāraṃ sadā hareḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2530: evaṃ bahudinaṃ kṛtvā dhyātvā nārāyaṇaṃ param // GarP_3,20.17 //
GP12garup3_u:2538: sāvadhānamanā bhūtvā śṛṇu pakṣīndra sattama // GarP_3,20.21 //
GP12garup3_u:2541: mitraṃ hariṃ prāptukāmā sadaika tatropāyaṃ cintayāmāsadevī // GarP_3,20.22
GP12garup3_u:2542: hariprāptau sādhanāḥ saṃti teṣu mukhyaṃ kaciccintayāmāsa devī /
GP12garup3_u:2543: teṣāṃ madhye śravaṇaṃ śreṣṭhamāhuḥ purāṇānāṃ sāttvikānāṃ sadāpi //
GP12garup3_u:2544: viṣṇorutkarṣo vartate yatra vāyostathotkarṣaḥ sajjanānāṃ purāṇe /
GP12garup3_u:2545: śrāddhaṃ sadā viṣṇubuddhyā sadaiva nānyacchrāvyaṃ sādhanaṃ tatra caiva //
GP12garup3_u:2546: yasmindine śravaṇaṃ nāsti viṣṇosteṣāṃ janma vyarthamāhuḥ kathāyām /
GP12garup3_u:2547: snāna japaḥ pañcayajñaṃ vrataṃ ca iṣṭāpūrte kṛcchracāndro ca dattam //
GP12garup3_u:2548: sarvaṃ vyarthaṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca dīkṣā kathāṃ vinā samyaganuṣṭhitāṃ vai /
GP12garup3_u:2549: yairna śrutaṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ sasaṃpradāyairgurubhiḥ saṃyutaiśca //
GP12garup3_u:2550: yairna śrutaṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ yairna śrutaṃ brahmakāṇḍaṃ purāṇam /
GP12garup3_u:2552: na yatra govindakathāmahānadī na yatra nārāyaṇapādasaṃśrayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2553: na yatra viṣṇoḥ satataṃ vacosti na saṃvasettatkṣaṇamātraṃ kathañcit //
GP12garup3_u:2554: yasmin grāme bhāgavataṃ na śāstraṃ na vartate bhāgavatā rasajñāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2555: yasmin gṛhe nāsti gītārthasāraḥ yasmin grāme nāma sahasrakaṃ vā //
GP12garup3_u:2556: tayo rasajñā yatra na santi tatra na saṃvasetkṣaṇamātraṃ kathañcit /
GP12garup3_u:2557: yasmin dine divyakathā ca viṣṇorna vāsti jantostasya cāyurvṛthaiva //
GP12garup3_u:2558: garbhe gate nātra vicāryamasti tanmanyate durlabhaṃ martyaloke /
GP12garup3_u:2559: karṇaṃ kalpairbhūṣitaṃ suṃdaraṃ ca na suṃdaraṃ cāhurāryā rasajñāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2560: viṣṇoḥ kathākhyābharaṇaiśca yuktaṃ tadeva karṇaṃ suṃdaraṃ cāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2561: tasmātsadā bhāgavatārthasāraṃ śṛṇvanti ye satataṃ vācayanti //
GP12garup3_u:2562: teṣāṃ janma svasthamāhurmahānto mahatphalaṃ cāsti tathaiva teṣām /
GP12garup3_u:2563: soṣṇīṣakañcukayutāśca hareḥ kathāṃ vai śṛṇvanti yepi ca paṭhanti sadaiva martyāḥ // GarP_3,20.33
GP12garup3_u:2564: sarvepi te pūjanīyā hi loke na vai śiśre codare caiva saktāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2566: pracchādayante tattvagopyāni ye tu teṣāṃ gatiḥ sūryasūnuḥ sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2567: ye dharmakāṇḍe karmakāṇḍe sadaiva utpādayante suruciṃ tatra nityam //
GP12garup3_u:2568: maulyena ye kathayeyuḥ purāṇaṃ teṣāṃ gatiḥ sūrya sunaḥ sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2569: maulyena ye bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ śṛṇvanti vai hariśāstrārthatattvam //
GP12garup3_u:2570: maulyena vedādhyayanaṃ prakurvate teṣāṃ gatiḥ sūryasūnuḥ sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2571: yadṛcchayā prāptadhanena ye tu saṃtuṣṭāste hyatra yogyāḥ sadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:2572: dhanārjane ye tvatitṛṣṇābhiyuktāsteṣāṃ na vai bhāgavatedhikāraḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2573: matvā loke harirevati nityamantaryāmī nāsti tadanya īśaḥ // GarP_3,20.38
GP12garup3_u:2574: evaṃ sadā ye pravicintayanti yogakṣemaṃ bibhṛyādviṣṇureṣām /
GP12garup3_u:2577: atastadarthaṃ naiva yatnaṃ ca kuryāddhanārthaṃ vai haritattve ca kuryāt //
GP12garup3_u:2578: ataḥ snātvā divyamantraṃ japitvā visarjayitvā viṣṇunirmālyagandham /
GP12garup3_u:2580: karmānusāreṇa dhanārjanaṃ ca vedārjanaṃ śāstrasamārjanaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2581: bhaviṣyati śravaṇaṃ cāpi viṣṇoratyādarācchravaṇaṃ durghaṭaṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:2584: śrutvā tattvā nāṃ nirṇayaṃ dhāraṇaṃ ca sudurghaṭaṃ cāhurāryāḥ samastam /
GP12garup3_u:2585: śrutvā tattvānāṃ dhāraṇānantaraṃ ca kāmakrudhorjāraṇaṃ durghaṭaṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:2586: śrutvā tattvānāṃ dhāraṇānaṃ taraṃ ta tathā yoge durghaṭaṃ saṃgataṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:2587: śrutvā tattvānāṃ dhāraṇānantaraṃ ca kāmakrudhorjāraṇaṃ durghaṭaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2588: ete doṣā jñānapūtānapīha kurvanti saṃdehayutānsadaiva // GarP_3,20.46 //
GP12garup3_u:2589: ato hyahaṃ śravaṇaṃ satkathāyāḥ sadā kariṣye nātra vicāryamasti /
GP12garup3_u:2590: tenāpyahaṃ harināmābhivāñchā niścitya cittaṃ śravaṇe vai cakāra /
GP12garup3_u:2591: ādehamevaṃ śravaṇaṃ ca kṛtvā tyaktvā dehaṃ bhūtale saṃprajātā //
GP12garup3_u:2593: sumitrā saṃjñakāyāṃ ca jātā vai mitravindikā // GarP_3,20.48 //
GP12garup3_u:2594: śravaṇena hariṃ mitraṃ prāptā sā mitravindikā /
GP12garup3_u:2595: ataḥ sā mitravindeti saṃjñayā saṃbabhūva ha // GarP_3,20.49 //
GP12garup3_u:2596: svayaṃvare mitravindā rājñāṃ madhye tu bhāminī /
GP12garup3_u:2599: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhadrākṛtabhagavatpatitvaprāpakatapaścaryādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma viṃśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:2606: tapa ālocanaṃ proktaṃ tattvānāṃ ca vinirṇayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2608: prāyo nāma tapaḥ proktaṃ cittanigraha ucyate /
GP12garup3_u:2609: prāyaścittamiti proktaṃ na tu kṣauraṃ khageśvara // GarP_3,21.4 //
GP12garup3_u:2611: pūrvaṃ na japtaṃ divyamantraṃ mukunda taptaṃ sadā kleśadāvānalena //
GP12garup3_u:2612: na vai smṛtaṃ harināmāmṛtaṃ ca sadā smṛtaṃ haridoṣādikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2613: na tu smṛtaṃ haritattvāmṛtaṃ ca samyak śrutaṃ lolavārtādikaṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:2615: na vanditaṃ haripādāravindaṃ suvandito mitrapādaḥ sughoraḥ // GarP_3,21.7
GP12garup3_u:2616: na dṛṣṭaṃ vai dhūpadhūmrairupetaṃ harervakraṃ kuntalaiḥ saṃvṛtaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2617: putrādikaṃ lālitaṃ vai mukunda na lālitaṃ tava vakraṃ murāre //
GP12garup3_u:2618: sulālitaṃ bhūṣaṇaiḥ putramitraṃ na lālitaṃ sarvapāpāpahāri /
GP12garup3_u:2619: na bhuktaṃ vai harinairavedyaśeṣaṃ mitrālaye ṣaḍrasānnaṃ ca bhuktam //
GP12garup3_u:2620: supuṣpagandhā nārpitā te murāre samarpitāḥ putramitrādikebhyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2621: santaptohaṃ putramitrādikeṣu kadā drakṣye tava vaktraṃ mukunda //
GP12garup3_u:2623: tathāpyabhakṣyai rasanā ca dagdhā kadā drakṣye tava vaktraṃ mukunda //
GP12garup3_u:2625: na pāvitaṃ maccharīraṃ murāre kadā drakṣye tava va ktraṃ mukunda //
GP12garup3_u:2627: avaiṣṇavānāṃ digdhagandhādidoṣairgātraṃ dagdhaṃ kadā hyuddhariṣye mukunda
GP12garup3_u:2628: dagdhau ca pādau mama vāsudeva na gacchantau kṣetrapathaṃ hareśca /
GP12garup3_u:2629: netre ca dagdhe mama sarvadāpi nālokitaṃ tava deva pratīkam //
GP12garup3_u:2630: dagdhau ca hastau mama vāsudeva na pūjitaṃ tava viṣṇoḥ pratīkam /
GP12garup3_u:2631: mayā kṛtaṃ pāpajātaṃ murāre kadā drakṣye tava vakraṃ mukunda //
GP12garup3_u:2632: madīyadoṣāngaṇayanna pūrṇa dayāṃ kuru tvaṃ suddhadāsyānmukunda /
GP12garup3_u:2633: yāvanti lomāni madīyagātre saṃti prabho sarvadorṣarvidūra // GarP_3,21.16
GP12garup3_u:2634: tāvanti pāpāni madīyagātre kadā drakṣye tava vaktraṃ mukunda /
GP12garup3_u:2636: sukhaṃ nāptaṃ hyapumātraṃ mukunda sevā muktā tava devasya viṣṇoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2637: itaḥ paraṃ putramitrādikaṃ ca yāsye nāhaṃ tava dāsī bhavāmi //
GP12garup3_u:2638: yeye brūyuḥ putramitrādikaiśca samyak sukhaṃ jāyate martyaloke /
GP12garup3_u:2639: teṣāmāsye mūtraviṣṭhādikaṃ ca samyak sadā patitaṃ ceti jāne //
GP12garup3_u:2640: mitrādīnāṃ yatkṛtaṃ dravyajātaṃ vṛthā gataṃ malarūpaṃ ca jātam /
GP12garup3_u:2641: sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ yatkṛtaṃ dravyajātaṃ hariprāpteḥ kāraṇaṃ syātsadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:2642: etādṛśaṃ tattu jātaṃ mukunda alaṃ hyalaṃ tena duḥkhaṃ ca bhuktam /
GP12garup3_u:2643: saṃgaṃ dattātsajjanānāṃ sadā tvaṃ vinā ca tvaṃ durjanānāṃ ca saṃgāt //
GP12garup3_u:2644: saṃgaiḥ sadā durjanānāṃ murāre gātraṃ dagdhaṃ na virāgeṇa yuktam /
GP12garup3_u:2645: etādṛśāhaṃ kāṃ gātiṃ vā mukunda yāsye na jāne dayayā māṃ ca pāhi //
GP12garup3_u:2646: etādṛśo hyanutāpaḥ khagendra prāyaścittaṃ na ca kṣaurādikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2647: bhānoḥ kanyā hyanutāpaṃ ca kṛtvā vicārayāmāsa hareḥ sutattvam //
GP12garup3_u:2648: sarvottamo harirekaḥ sadaiva yataḥ pūrṇaḥ sarvaguṇaistataśca /
GP12garup3_u:2649: sṛṣṭau yasmājjayate viśvajātamato hariḥ sarvaguṇaiśca pūrṇaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2650: yo devānāmādya akāra eva yato brahmādyā naiva pūrṇāḥ samastāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2652: na lakṣmīvadguṇapūrṇo viriñco na viṣṇuvadguṇapūrṇā ramāpi /
GP12garup3_u:2653: na vāyuvadbhāratī cāpi pūrṇā na śeṣavadvāruṇī cāpi pūrṇā // GarP_3,21.26
GP12garup3_u:2654: na vai rudravatpārvatī pūrṇarūpā hyanyepyevaṃ naiva pūrṇāḥ sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2655: ālocanāmevameṣā hi kṛtvā tapaścakre yamunāyāśca tīre // GarP_3,21.27 //
GP12garup3_u:2656: tadācāhaṃ yamunāyāśca tīraṃ pārthena sākaṃ mṛgayāṃ gataḥ khaga /
GP12garup3_u:2657: dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ tatra tapaścarantīṃ tadābruvaṃ matsakhāyaṃ ca pārtham //
GP12garup3_u:2658: he pārtha śīghraṃ vraja kanyāsamīpaṃ tvaṃ pṛccha kasmādatra tapaḥ karoṣi /
GP12garup3_u:2659: evaṃ proktastatsamīpaṃ sa gatvā pṛṣṭvā caitatkāraṇaṃ śīghrameva //
GP12garup3_u:2660: āgatya māmavadatphālgunoyaṃ sarvaṃ vṛttāṃntaṃ tvasau matsamīpe /
GP12garup3_u:2661: tatastvahaṃ sumuhūrte ca tasyāḥ pāṇigrahaṃ kṛtavāṃstatra samyak //
GP12garup3_u:2663: pūrṇānande ramamāṇāsya nityaṃ tayā ca me kiṃ sukhaṃsyātkhagendra //
GP12garup3_u:2664: mayā vivāhonugrahārthaṃ hi tasyā aṅgīkṛto na tu saukhyāya vīndra /
GP12garup3_u:2665: tathā vakṣye lakṣmaṇāyāśca rūpaṃ pāṇigrāhe kāraṇaṃ cāpi vīndrā //
GP12garup3_u:2666: śṛṇuṣva tattava vakṣyāmi gopyaṃ sacchiṣyake nāsti gopyaṃ gurośca //
GP12garup3_u:2667: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhagavataḥ kālindyā vivāhe hetunirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:2670: yā lakṣmaṇā pūrvasarge khagendra putrī hyabhūdvahnivedasya vettuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2671: sulakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutatvādyataḥ sā sulakṣmaṇeti prathitā khagendra //
GP12garup3_u:2672: yathā lakṣmīrlakṣaṇaiḥ sā supūrṇā yathā harirlakṣaṇairvai supūrṇaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2673: yathā vāyurlakṣaṇaiḥ pūrṇa eva yathā gāyatrī lakṣaṇaiḥ sā supūrṇā //
GP12garup3_u:2674: yathā rudrādyā lakṣaṇairvai prapūrṇā rudrādillakṣmaṇā caiva pūrṇā /
GP12garup3_u:2675: guṇenaivaṃ dharmataḥ kiñcideva tathānusaṃdhānādvriyate nāma cāpi //
GP12garup3_u:2676: tasmā dāhurlakṣmaṇetyeva sarve tallakṣaṇaṃ śṛṇu cādau khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:2677: nārāyaṇe pūrṇaguṇe rameśe dvātriṃśatsaṃkhyāni sulakṣaṇāni // GarP_3,22.4
GP12garup3_u:2678: saṃtyeva pakṣīndra vadāmyanu kramānmattaḥ śrutvā mokṣamāpnoti nityam /
GP12garup3_u:2680: ya etatsarvaṃ militaṃ caikameva harerviṣṇorlakṣaṇaṃ cāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2681: mukhaṃ strigdhaṃ vartulaṃ puṣṭirūpaṃ dvitīyaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ cāhurāryāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2683: yaddantā vai tīkṣṇasūkṣmāśca saṃti tallakṣaṇaṃ cāhurāryāścaturtham //
GP12garup3_u:2684: yasyādhare raktimā tvasti vīndra tallakṣaṇaṃ pañcamaṃ cāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2685: yasya hastā atiraktāḥ khagendra tallakṣaṇaṃ prāhurāryāśca paṣṭham //
GP12garup3_u:2686: yasminnakhāḥ saṃti raktāḥ suśobhāstallakṣaṇaṃ saptamaṃ cāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2687: yasminkapole raktimā tvasti vīndra tallakṣaṇaṃ hyaṣṭamaṃ prāhurāryā //
GP12garup3_u:2689: yasyo daraṃ tanturūpaṃ supuṣṭaṃ valitrayairaṅkitaṃ suṃdaraṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:2690: tallakṣaṇaṃ daśamaṃ prāhurāryā ekādaśaṃ nimnanābhiṃ tadāhuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2691: ūrudvayaṃ yasya ca māṃsalaṃ vai tallakṣaṇaṃ dvādaśaṃ prāhurāryāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2692: kaṭirhi dīrghā pṛthulāsti yasya trayodaśaṃ lakṣma tadāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2693: yasyāsti muṣko supariṣṭhito vai caturdaśaṃ lakṣma tadāhurāryāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2694: samunnataṃ śiśramatho hi lakṣma yasyāsti tat pañcadaśaṃ vadanti /
GP12garup3_u:2695: sutāmrakaṃ pādatalaṃ khagendra tallakṣaṇaṃ ṣoḍaśaṃ prāhurāryāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2696: nimnau ca gulphau saptadaśaṃ tadāhurgrī vārūpaṃ prāhuraṣṭādaśaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2697: ekonaviṃśaṃ tvakṣipadmaṃ suraktaṃ prāhurbāhuṃ jānu viṃśaṃ tathaiva //
GP12garup3_u:2699: trayoviṃśaṃ sūkṣmamāsyaṃ tadāhuścaturviśaṃ suprasanne ca dṛṣṭī //
GP12garup3_u:2700: hrasvaṃ liṅgaṃ mārdavaṃ cāpi vīndra tallakṣaṇaṃ pañcaviṃśaṃ vadanti /
GP12garup3_u:2701: samau ca pādau kaṭijānu corū ṣaḍviṃśamāhuśca same ca jaṅghe //
GP12garup3_u:2702: samānahastau samakarṇau militvā dvātriṃśatkaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ prāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2703: dvātriṃśatkaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vai mukunde dvātriṃśatkaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vai ramāyām //
GP12garup3_u:2704: dvātriṃśatkaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇopi tadbhāratyāḥ pravadantyeva satyam /
GP12garup3_u:2705: tathā ca śaṅkā samameva cakriṇetyevaṃ sadāmā kuru nirṇayaṃ bruve //
GP12garup3_u:2706: ekasya vai lakṣaṇasyāpi viṣṇorlakṣmīrantaṃ naiva samyak prapede /
GP12garup3_u:2707: atonantairlakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutaṃ ca hariṃ cāhurlakṣaṇajñāḥ sadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:2708: jānāti lakṣmīrlakṣaṇaṃ vāyurūpe svāpekṣayā hyatiriktaṃ khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:2709: svalakṣaṇāpekṣayā bhāratī tu śatairguṇairadhikā vedhasopi // GarP_3,22.20
GP12garup3_u:2710: khagendra tasmāllakṣaṇe sāmyacittaṃ viśvādīnāṃ sarvadā mā kuruṣva /
GP12garup3_u:2712: alakṣaṇaṃ manyate yaddhi tasya durlakṣaṇaṃ naiva taccintanīyam /
GP12garup3_u:2713: aṣṭāviṃśatiṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vai harasya na bhāratīvaccintanīyaṃ khagendra //
GP12garup3_u:2714: ato haraḥ krodharūpī sadaiva tayorabhāvātsatyamuktaṃ tathaitat /
GP12garup3_u:2715: ato dvayaṃ nāsti rudre khagendra śiśrodare kiñcidādhikyamasti //
GP12garup3_u:2717: ṣaḍvaviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiścāpi yuktā vāruṇyādyā pañcaviṃśaiśca candraḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2718: arthaścaturviṃśatibhiścaiva yukto nāsāvāyordvyadhikā viṃśatiśca lakṣaṇaiścaikaviṃśatyā śacī yuktā na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,22.25 //
GP12garup3_u:2728: caturbhaiḥ kṣitipāḥ proktāstribhiranye ca saṃyutāḥ // GarP_3,22.30 //
GP12garup3_u:2729: udare kiñcidādhikye hrasve pāde ca karṇayoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2730: śikhādhikyaṃ vinā vipra bhāryāyāṃ ca śivasya ca // GarP_3,22.31 //
GP12garup3_u:2733: jaṅghādhikye sahaivāṣṭau doṣāḥ śacyāḥ sadā smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2743: lalāṭe pāṇḍutā nityaṃ vāmaskandhe kare khaga /
GP12garup3_u:2746: ūrau navāñjikāromaḥ tathā pṛṣṭhe ca mastake // GarP_3,22.39 //
GP12garup3_u:2747: lalāṭe trīṇi dīrghe tu same dvau saṃprakīrtitau /
GP12garup3_u:2748: sarpākārastu yo matsyastasya śiśre prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,22.40 //
GP12garup3_u:2750: śiśrākāraśca yo matsyo gude tasya praśasyate // GarP_3,22.41 //
GP12garup3_u:2752: śvākāraścāpi matsyo vai mukhe tasya prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,22.42 //
GP12garup3_u:2753: haste tu bahurekhāḥ syurloma nāsāpuṭe smṛtam /
GP12garup3_u:2754: atidīrghaṃ tu cāṅguṣṭhaṃ kaniṣṭhaṃ cātidīrghakam // GarP_3,22.43 //
GP12garup3_u:2758: sahābhiprāya garbheṇa brahmaṇoktaṃ tava prabho // GarP_3,22.45 //
GP12garup3_u:2760: mayoktasyaiva sa vyāsaḥ kaṃbugrīvaḥ pradarśyate // GarP_3,22.46 //
GP12garup3_u:2762: ato virodho nāstyeva tathā jñānātpratīyate // GarP_3,22.47 //
GP12garup3_u:2764: bhage netre ca haste ca stane kukṣau tathaiva ca /
GP12garup3_u:2767: ṣaḍviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiścāpi yuktā vāruṇyāḥ ṣaḍlakṣaṇaiścaiva hīnā //
GP12garup3_u:2768: karṇe kukṣau nāsikākeśapāśe gulphe bhage kiñcidādhikyamasti /
GP12garup3_u:2769: indro yuktaḥ pañcaviṃśatyā khagendra sadā hīno lakṣaṇaiḥ saptasaṃkhyaiḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2770: haste pāde udare karṇayośca śiśre gulphe tvadharoṣṭhedhikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2772: nābhyāṃ gulphe hanurarṅghyośca skandhe dvije netre tvadharoṣṭhedhikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2773: trayoviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiścāpi yuktā śacī tathā navadoṣaiśca yuktā //
GP12garup3_u:2774: bhage keśe hyadharoṣṭhe ca karṇe jaṅghe gaṇḍe vakṣasi gulphayośca /
GP12garup3_u:2776: dvāviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutastu daśabhirdeṣaiḥ pravaho nāma vāyuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2778: tadviṃśatyā lakṣaṇaiḥ saṃyutastu tadā doṣerdvādaśabhiśca yuktaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2783: taiśca ṣoḍaśabhiryukto dhanapo nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,22.58 //
GP12garup3_u:2789: taistrayodaśabhiścaiva saṃyuto budha eva tu // GarP_3,22.61 //
GP12garup3_u:2800: ṣadguṇaiḥ kṣitipā yuktā ṣaḍviṃśatyā ca doṣataḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2802: tribhiḥ keccittato hīnā na saṃti khagasattama /
GP12garup3_u:2803: yasminnare kṣitipe vā khagendra ādhikyaṃ yaddṛśyate lakṣaṇasya //
GP12garup3_u:2804: na te narā naiva te vai kṣitīśāḥ sarve naiva hyuttamāḥ sarvadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2805: ye devā ye ca daityāśca sarvepyevaṃ khagādhipa // GarP_3,22.69 //
GP12garup3_u:2809: piturgṛhe vardhamānā sadāpi svakuṭuṃbaṃ śreṣṭhayituṃ khagendra //
GP12garup3_u:2811: sadāpi ye tvanusaṃdhānena yuktā antargate tatratatra sthite ca //
GP12garup3_u:2812: ajñātatve cānnapānādikaṃ ca dattaṃ saṃto vyarthamevaṃ vadanti /
GP12garup3_u:2813: hariṃ vakṣye tatratatra sthitaṃ caṃ taṃ vai śṛṇu tvādareṇādya nityam //
GP12garup3_u:2814: bālo harirbālarūpeṇa kṛṣṇaḥ kṣīrādikaṃ navanītaṃ ghṛtaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2815: gṛhṇāti nityaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ vastrajātamevaṃ dadyātsarvadā viṣṇutuṣṭyai //
GP12garup3_u:2816: mitrairhariḥ keśavākhyo mukundo bhuṅkte dattaṃ tvannaprānādikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2817: pūrvaṃ dadyātsarvadā vai gṛhastho dhanyo bhavedanyathā vyarthameva //
GP12garup3_u:2818: gṛhṇāti nityaṃ mādhavākhyo hariścetyevaṃ jñātvā deyamannādikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2819: evaṃ jñātvā dīyamānena nityaṃ prīṇāti viṣṇurnānyathā vyarthameva //
GP12garup3_u:2820: gṛhe nityaṃ vāsudevo haristu prīṇāti nityaṃ tatra tiṣṭhansuparṇa /
GP12garup3_u:2821: evaṃ jñātvā svagṛhaṃ sarvadaiva alaṅkuryāddhāturūpaiḥ sadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:2823: mitre mukundaḥ śālake cānirūddho nārāyaṇo dvijavarye sadāsti //
GP12garup3_u:2824: goṣṭhe ca nityaṃ viṣṇurūpī haristu aśve sadā tiṣṭhati vāmanākhyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2825: saṃkarṣaṇaḥ śūdravarṇe sadāsti vaiśye pradyumnastiṣṭhati sarvadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:2826: janārdanaḥ kṣattrajātau sadāsti dāśeṣu nityaṃ mahidāso haristu /
GP12garup3_u:2827: mahyāṃ nityaṃ tiṣṭhati sarvadaiva hyupendrākhyo harirekaḥ suparṇa //
GP12garup3_u:2828: gaje sadā tiṣṭhati cakrapāṇiḥ sadāntare tiṣṭhati viśvarūpaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2829: nityaṃ śuni tiṣṭhati bhūtabhāvanaḥ pipīlakāyāmapi sarvadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:2831: harerna varṇosti na gotramasti na jātirīśe sarvarūpe vicitre //
GP12garup3_u:2832: evaṃ jñātvā sarvadā lakṣmaṇā tu hariṃ sadā prīṇayāmāsa devī /
GP12garup3_u:2833: saparyayā vai kriyamāṇayā hariḥ patirmamasya diti cintayānā //
GP12garup3_u:2834: tatyāja dehaṃ viṣṇupatitvakāmā madreṣu vai vīndra putrī prajātā /
GP12garup3_u:2835: svayaṃvare lakṣmaṇāyā ahaṃ ca bhittvā lakṣyaṃ bhūpatīndrāvayitvā //
GP12garup3_u:2836: pāṇigrahaṃ lakṣmaṇāyāśca kṛtvā gatvā purīṃ ramayāmāsa devī /
GP12garup3_u:2837: tathaivāhaṃ jāṃbavatyā vivāhaṃ matpatnītve kāraṇaṃ tvāṃ bravīmi //
GP12garup3_u:2838: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe lakṣmaṇāvivāhahetunirūpaṇaṃ nāma
GP12garup3_u:2841: somasya putrī pūrvasarge babhūva bhāryā madīyā jāmbavatī mama priyā /
GP12garup3_u:2842: tāsāṃ madhye hyadhikā vīndra kiñcidrudrādibhyaḥ pañcaguṇairvihīnā //
GP12garup3_u:2844: yadāveśāddhrāsamupaiti kāle tadā tāsāṃ sāmyamāhurmahāntaḥ // GarP_3,23.2
GP12garup3_u:2847: tāsāṃ madhye jāmbavantī tu kṛṣṇa ārādhanaṃ kīdṛśaṃ sā cakāra /
GP12garup3_u:2848: tanme brūhi kṛpayā viśvamūrte ādhikye vai kāraṇaṃ tābhya eva //
GP12garup3_u:2852: yā pūrvasarge somaputrī babhūva piturgṛhe vartamānāpi sādhvī /
GP12garup3_u:2853: janma svakīyaṃ sārthakaṃ vai cakāra pitrā sākaṃ viṣṇuśuśrūṣaṇe na ca //
GP12garup3_u:2854: śuśrāva nityaṃ satpurāṇāni caivaṃ cakre sadā viṣṇupādapraṇāmam /
GP12garup3_u:2855: cakre sadā tārakasyāpi viṣṇoḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ smaraṇaṃ kurvatī sā //
GP12garup3_u:2856: pitrā sākaṃ sā tu kanyā khagendra vairāgyayuktā śravaṇātsaṃbabhūva /
GP12garup3_u:2857: keśaṃ ca mitraṃ dviradādikaṃ ca anarghyaratnāni gṛhādikaṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:2858: sarvaṃ hyetannaśvaraṃ caiva mene mamādhīnaṃ hariṇā vai kṛtaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2859: yenaiva dattaṃ putramitrādikaṃ ca tenā hṛtaṃ vedanāṃ naiva cakre //
GP12garup3_u:2860: adyaiva viṣṇuḥ paramo dayāluḥ dayāṃ mayi kṛtavāṃste na suṣṭhu /
GP12garup3_u:2861: pitrā sākaṃ kanyakā sā tu vīndra sadātmani hyamale vāsudeve //
GP12garup3_u:2862: ekāntatvaṃ suṣṭhu bhaktyā gatā sā yadṛcchayā sopapannena devī /
GP12garup3_u:2863: akalpayantyātmano vīndra vṛttiṃ cakāra yatsāvadhirādhaṃ prathaiva //
GP12garup3_u:2864: sā vai vittaṃ viṣṇupādāravinde duḥ khārṇavāttarāke saṃcakāra /
GP12garup3_u:2865: vāgīndridriyaṃ khaga samyak cakāra harerguṇānāṃ varṇane vā sadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:2866: hastau ca viṣṇorgṛhasaṃmārjanādau cakāra devī gātramalāpahāram /
GP12garup3_u:2867: śrotraṃ ca cakre harisatkathodaye mokṣādimārge hyamṛtopame ca //
GP12garup3_u:2869: sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ sparśane caiva saṃge nirmālyagandhānuvilepane tvak //
GP12garup3_u:2870: ghrārṇedriyaṃ sā haripādasāre cakāra saṃsāravimuktide ca /
GP12garup3_u:2874: niṣkāmarūpe ca matiṃ cakāra vāgindriyaṃ stavanaṃ svīcakāra /
GP12garup3_u:2875: evaṃ sadā kāryasamūhamātmanā samarpayitvā parameśapādayoḥ // GarP_3,23.17
GP12garup3_u:2876: tīrthāṭanārthaṃ tu jagāma pitrā sākaṃ hareḥ prīṇanādyarthameva /
GP12garup3_u:2879: yāvatkālaṃ tīrthayātrā mukunda tāvatkālaṃ tūrdhvaretā bhavāmi //
GP12garup3_u:2880: yāvatkālaṃ tīrthayātrāṃ kariṣye tāvaddattādvaiṣṇavānāṃ ca saṃgam /
GP12garup3_u:2882: suhṛjjanaiḥ putramitrādikaiśca dīrthāṭanaṃ naiva kuryāṃ mukunda /
GP12garup3_u:2883: kurvanti ye kāmyayā tīrthayātrāṃ teṣāṃ saṃgaṃ kuru dūre mukunda //
GP12garup3_u:2884: śālagrāmaṃ ye vihāyaiva yātrāṃ kurvanti teṣāṃ kiṃ phalaṃ prāhurāryāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2885: yadā tīrthānāṃ darśanaṃ syāttadaiva śālagrāmaṃ purataḥ sthāpayitvā //
GP12garup3_u:2886: tīrthāṭanaṃ pādacairaiḥ kṛtaṃ cetpūrṇaṃ phalaṃ prāhurāryāḥ khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:2887: pādatrāṇaṃ pādarakṣāṃ ca kṛtvā tīrthāṭanaṃ pādahīnaṃ tadāhuḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2888: yo vāhane turage copaviṣṭastīrthāṭanaṃ kurute cārdhahīnam /
GP12garup3_u:2889: vṛṣādīnāṃ vāhane pādamāhuḥ parānnānāṃ bhojane vyarthamāhuḥ // GarP_3,23.24
GP12garup3_u:2890: mahātmanāṃ vedavidāṃ yatīnāṃ parānnānāṃ bhojane naiva doṣaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2891: saṃkalpayitvā paramādareṇa jagāma sā tīrthayātrārthameva // GarP_3,23.25
GP12garup3_u:2892: ādau snātvā harinirmātyagandhaṃ visarjayitvā śravaṇaṃ vai cakāra /
GP12garup3_u:2893: pitrā sākaṃ bhojanaṃ cāpi kṛtvā agre dine krośamekaṃ jagāma //
GP12garup3_u:2894: tatra dvijānpūjayitvānnapāna rātrau tattvaṃ śrāvayāmāsa devī /
GP12garup3_u:2895: evaṃ yātrāṃ ye prakurvanti nityaṃ teṣāṃ yātrāṃ saphalāṃ prāhurāryāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2896: vinā dayāṃ tīrthayātrā khagendravyarthetyevaṃ vīndra cāhurmahāntaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2897: divā rātrau ye na śṛṇvanti divyāṃ hareḥ kathāṃ tīrthamārge khagendra //
GP12garup3_u:2898: vyarthaṃvyarthaṃ tasya cāhurgataṃ vai aśvādīnāṃ vāhanānāṃ ca viddhi /
GP12garup3_u:2903: anusaṃdhānādrahitaṃ sarvameva kṛtaṃ vyarthameveti cāhuḥ // GarP_3,23.31 //
GP12garup3_u:2904: ato hareḥ pāpavināśinīṃ kathāṃ śrutvā viṣṇorbhaktimānsyātvagandra /
GP12garup3_u:2906: pitrā sākaṃ kanyakā sāpi vīndra śeṣācalasthaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ ca draṣṭum /
GP12garup3_u:2907: jagāma sā mārgamadhye hariṃ ca sā cintayāmāsa ramāpatiṃ ca // GarP_3,23.33
GP12garup3_u:2908: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya vakṣaḥ śrīvatsaratnairbhūṣitaṃ vistṛtaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:2909: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya tundaṃ valitrayeṇāṅkitaṃ suṃdaraṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:2910: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya kaṇṭhaṃ maharlokasyāśrayaṃ kaṃbutulyam /
GP12garup3_u:2911: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya nābhiṃ sadāntarikṣasyāśrayaṃ vai supūrṇam //
GP12garup3_u:2912: kadā drakṣye vadanaṃ vai murārerjanalokasyāśrayaṃ sarvadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:2913: śiraḥ kadā śrīnivāsasya drakṣye satyasya lokasyāśrayaṃ sarvadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2914: kaṭiṃ kadā śrīnivāsasya drakṣye bhūrlokasyāśrayaṃ sarvadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:2915: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya coru talātalasyāśrayaṃ sarvadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2916: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya jānu sukomalaṃ sutalasyāśrayaṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:2917: kadā drakṣye śrīnivāsasya jaṅghe rasātalasyāśrayeḥ sarvadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:2918: kadā drakṣye pādatalaṃ hareśca pātālalokasyāśrayaṃ sarvadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:2919: itthaṃ mārge cintayantī ca devī śeṣācale śeṣadevaṃ dadarśa /
GP12garup3_u:2923: mukhaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā namanaṃ ca kāryaṃ pṛṣṭhādibhāge namanaṃ na kāryam /
GP12garup3_u:2924: sāpi dviṣaṭkaṃ namanaṃ ca cakre śālagrāmaṃ sthāpayitvā puro 'sya //
GP12garup3_u:2925: itthaṃ kāryaṃ vaiṣṇavaiḥ parvatasya tvaṃ vaiṣṇavairviparītaṃ ca kāryam /
GP12garup3_u:2926: madhvāntaḥsthaḥ parvatāgresti nityaṃ ramābrahmādyaiḥ pūjitaḥ śrīnivāsaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2928: ityevamuktvā kapilākhyatīrthe sthānaṃ cakre sā svapitrā sahaiva //
GP12garup3_u:2929: atraivāste śrīnivāso haristu dravyeṇa rūpeṇa na cānyatheti /
GP12garup3_u:2930: ādausnātvā muṇḍanaṃ tatra kṛtvā tīrthaśrāddhaṃ kārayitvā sutīrthe //
GP12garup3_u:2932: śālagrāmaṃ sthāpayitvā sa cāgre punaḥ praṇāmaṃ sāpi cakre subhaktyā //
GP12garup3_u:2933: sopānānāṃ śataparyantamevamāruhya sā hyupaviṣṭā tu tatra /
GP12garup3_u:2934: śuśrāva sā bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ śuśrāva vaiveṅkaṭādreḥ praśaṃsām //
GP12garup3_u:2936: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe veṅkaṭeśagiriyātrākramanirūpaṇaṃ nāma trayoviṃśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:2939: kanye śṛṇu tvaṃ veṅkaṭākhyācalasya smerānanāṃ puṇyamāṃrohaṇe 'sya /
GP12garup3_u:2940: śrīgītāyāḥ paṭhanaṃ caiva kurvannārohaṇaṃ kurute sarvalokaḥ // GarP_3,24.1
GP12garup3_u:2941: padepade śrīnivāsaśca devastvalaṃ hyalaṃ prīyate bhaktavargaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2942: taṃ prīṇayanmokṣamāyānti sarve harau tuṣṭe kimalabhyaṃ ca kanye //
GP12garup3_u:2943: sopānadeśe yaḥ purāṇaṃ śṛṇoti tadā kṛtā sarvatīrthādiyātrā /
GP12garup3_u:2944: tadā divā prastuvantīha mārge sadā hariṃ śrīnivāsaṃ guruṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:2945: sopānānāṃ mahimānaṃ ca śrutvā śālagrāmaṃ sthāpayitvā ca tatra /
GP12garup3_u:2946: namaskṛtvā punarevāpi sā tu sopānāni tvārurohātha sādhvī // GarP_3,24.4 //
GP12garup3_u:2947: sopānānāṃ vīndra cārohaṇena tvavaiṣṇavānāṃ haritoṣo na caiva /
GP12garup3_u:2948: tenaiva teṣāṃ sādhanaṃ bhūya eva tamasyandhe pātayituṃ khagendra //
GP12garup3_u:2949: sthalesthale evamevāpi kāryaṃ jaigīṣavyaṃ punarevāha devī /
GP12garup3_u:2951: jaigīṣavyaḥ śrīnivāso haristu brahmādīnāṃ dṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2952: jaigīṣavya kṛpayā tvaṃ vadasva jaigīṣavyo hyevamukto hariṃ tu /
GP12garup3_u:2953: uvāca kanyāṃ somaputrīṃ satīṃ ca brahmādīnāṃ dṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2957: ṛṣyādīnāṃ dṛśyate candravacca sanmānuṣāṇāmaparokṣo haristu // GarP_3,24.9
GP12garup3_u:2959: sa sūryavaddṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ saṃsāriṇāṃ veṅkaṭeśaḥ khagendra //
GP12garup3_u:2960: saṃdohavaddṛśyate vai prakāśo mithyāvatāṃ dṛśyate śrīnivāsaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2961: pāṣāṇavannailyarūpaprakāśaḥ śilāmātre dṛṣyate vai kalau ca // GarP_3,24.11
GP12garup3_u:2962: nṛṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ śrīnivāso haristu kalau svarūpaṃ śrīnivāsasya devī /
GP12garup3_u:2963: na mānuṣāḥ pravijānanti sarve yataḥ kalau tāmasā rājasāstu // GarP_3,24.12
GP12garup3_u:2964: tatsaṃginaḥ sāttvikāḥ kecideva hyato bhaktā durlabhā vai kalau ca /
GP12garup3_u:2965: ye dṛśyante bhaktavatte na bhaktāḥ śiśrodarayorbharaṇe caiva saktāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2966: kurvanti yātrāṃ ca tadarthameva bhaktijñānaṃ durlabhaṃ vai kalau ca /
GP12garup3_u:2967: bhaktā ye vai na viraktāḥ sadaiva teṣāṃ harerdarśanaṃ durlabhaṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:2968: bhaktasvarūpaṃ tava vakṣye khagendra yo jñānapūrṇaḥ parame snigdha eva /
GP12garup3_u:2969: na ca dveṣairbandhuro bhaktiyuktastava dveṣāñchṛṇu vakṣye ca samyak //
GP12garup3_u:2971: jñānānandaiḥ paripūrṇe harau ca guṇairapūrṇo harirityeva cintā //
GP12garup3_u:2972: śrībrahmarudrādidivaukasāṃ sadā tathā dvijānāṃ saṃmānāyāśca cintā /
GP12garup3_u:2975: avatārāṇā chedabhedādikaṃ ca tathocyate maraṇasyāpi cintā // GarP_3,24.18
GP12garup3_u:2976: tadbhaktānāṃ dveṣaṇaṃ cāhurāryāstadvākyānāṃ dūṣaṇaṃ dveṣa eva /
GP12garup3_u:2977: naca dveṣaiḥ saṃyutā ye ca loke kanye dṛśyante na tu bhaktāḥ kadācit //
GP12garup3_u:2979: jaigīṣavya brūhi me ke ca bhaktā bhaktiṃ kathaṃ darśayāmāsurete /
GP12garup3_u:2980: teṣāṃ hariḥ śrīnivāso mahātmā trātā sadā bhaktavarge dayāluḥ //
GP12garup3_u:2981: jaigīṣavyastvevamukto mahātmā uvāca kanyāṃ saṃsmaran bhaktavaryaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:2983: prahādādyā śrīnivāsasya bhaktāḥ kṛtvā nṛsiṃhe cottamāṃ bhaktimeva //
GP12garup3_u:2984: avāpa sāmrājyamanuttamaṃ ca jñānaṃ nṛsiṃhātsamavāpa paścāt /
GP12garup3_u:2985: parāśaraḥ śrīnibāsasya bhakto bhaktiṃ kṛtvā vyāsarūpaṃ hariṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:2986: stutvā tena jñānatattvaṃ hyavāpya jagāma mokṣaṃ bhaktisaṃvardhitātmā /
GP12garup3_u:2987: yo nāradaḥ śrīnivāsasya bhakto bhaktiṃ kṛtvā garbhavāse harau ca //
GP12garup3_u:2988: tayā bhaktyā brahmaputratvamāpa jñānaprāptyā tena muktiṃ jagāma /
GP12garup3_u:2989: yo hyaṃbarīṣaḥ śrīnivāsasya bhaktaḥ kṛtvā bhaktiṃ paradeva harau ca //
GP12garup3_u:2990: japtvā jñānaṃ prāpya durvāsakaścāpyavāpa mokṣaṃ tena saṃvardhitātmā /
GP12garup3_u:2991: mucukundo vai śrīnivāsasya bhakto vairāgyato bhaktidārḍhyaṃ ca kṛtvā //
GP12garup3_u:2992: tattvajñānaṃ prāpya viṣṇormahātmā hyavāpa mokṣaṃ tena saṃvardhitātmā /
GP12garup3_u:2993: sa puṇḍarīkaḥ śrīnivāsasya bhaktaḥ pitrādiṣṭo viṣṇubhaktiṃ ca kṛtvā //
GP12garup3_u:2995: brahmā ca vāyuśca sarasvatī ca jñātavyāḥ sarve ṛjuyoginaśca //
GP12garup3_u:2996: acchinnabhaktāśca sadā murārerna kāmyaraktāḥ śuddharūpā hi te ca /
GP12garup3_u:2999: parjanyamitrādaya eva sarve sadā hyete śrīnivāsasya bhaktāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3000: viśvāmitro bhṛguraurvaśca kutso marīciratriḥ pulahaḥ kratuśca /
GP12garup3_u:3001: śaktirvasiṣṭho sautamīyo pulastyo bhāradvājaḥ śrīnivāsasya bhaktāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3002: māndhātā nahuṣoṃbarīṣasagarau rājā pṛthurhaihayo ikṣvākurbharato yayātisutalau dharmo vikukṣistathā
GP12garup3_u:3003: uttānaśca bibhīṣaṇo daśaratho hyete mahājñāninaḥ śrīmadveṅkaṭanāyakasya ca gurorbhaktāḥ sadā saṃsmṛtāḥ // GarP_3,24.31 //
GP12garup3_u:3005: godāvarī narmadā ca kṛṣṇā bhīmarathī tathā // GarP_3,24.32 //
GP12garup3_u:3007: ityetāśca harerbhaktāḥ saṃti cātraiva bhāmini // GarP_3,24.33 //
GP12garup3_u:3008: abhiprāyaṃ tatra vakṣye śṛṇu kanye mayā sati /
GP12garup3_u:3009: yatra pravartate mārge kathā viṣṇormahātmanaḥ // GarP_3,24.34 //
GP12garup3_u:3011: tatraiva bhaktāḥ sarvepi saṃti viṣṇostathaiva ca // GarP_3,24.35 //
GP12garup3_u:3012: ye devayātrāṃ paramātmacintayā kurvanti te haribhaktāśca nānye /
GP12garup3_u:3013: yato harau parame vaiṣṇavānāṃ sarvaṃ niṣṭhāmeti kṛtyaṃ khagendra //
GP12garup3_u:3015: yo na dadyādabhaktaḥ sa tataḥ ko nu paraḥ paśuḥ // GarP_3,24.37 //
GP12garup3_u:3016: bhaktā hareḥ śrīnivāsācale ca gaṅgādirūpeṇa ca tatratatra /
GP12garup3_u:3017: tiṣṭhanti sevārthamurukramasya teṣāṃ pūjā naiva kāryā ca devi //
GP12garup3_u:3018: abhiprāyaṃ tatra vakṣye śṛṇu tvaṃ tatra sthale vastragandhādidhūpaiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3019: purāṇoktā api bhedena pūjyā dṛṣṭvā ca tānvandayetprājña eva //
GP12garup3_u:3020: sadbrāhmaṇānvandayetpādamūle hastau ca dvau saṃpuṭīkṛtya devi /
GP12garup3_u:3021: sāṣṭāṅgarupaṃ vandanaṃ caiva viṣṇoḥ kuryāttathā gurave viṣṇubuddhyā //
GP12garup3_u:3022: gaṅgādīnāṃ vandanaṃ kāryameva sāṣṭāṅgaṃ vai tulasīnāṃ tathaiva /
GP12garup3_u:3023: aśvatthānāṃ namanaṃ kāryameva gavādīnāṃ namanaṃ mānasena // GarP_3,24.41
GP12garup3_u:3024: pūjā sadā devadevasya viṣṇoḥ kāryā bhaktyā vaiṣṇavaireva nānyaiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3025: ye nāmakā jñānavantaḥ subhaktāḥ sadaiva kāryā viṣṇupūjā ca kanye //
GP12garup3_u:3026: ye nāmakā jñānavantaḥ subhaktāḥ sadaivaṃ kāryā viṣṇupūjā ca kanye /
GP12garup3_u:3027: yenāmakā viṣṇubhaktāḥ sadaiva pūjā viṣṇornaiva kāryātra devi //
GP12garup3_u:3028: mohādyo vai pūjayeddevadevaṃ mahādharmādyāti cāndhaṃ tamo vai /
GP12garup3_u:3029: brahmādināmāni harerhi devīṃ viṣṇoḥ svanāmāni dadau divaukasām //
GP12garup3_u:3030: nādāddhīraḥ keśavādīni kanye svakaṃ puraṃ pravihāyaiva rājā /
GP12garup3_u:3031: evaṃ mayoktaṃ kanyake sarvametadetatparaṃ samyagārohaṇīyam // GarP_3,24.45
GP12garup3_u:3032: govinda nārāyaṇa mādhaveti yūyaṃ mayā sarvamārādhitavyam /
GP12garup3_u:3033: sarve militvā punarevaṃ khagendra samāruhanvaiṅkaṭādriṃ gṛṇantaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3035: draṣṭuṃ sarve śrīnivāsaṃ tathaiva kurvantaste talaśabdaṃ nadantaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3036: iti kṛṣṇavacaḥ śrutvā tārkṣyaḥ kṛṣṇamuvācaha kathamāsvādanaṃ cakruretadvistīryame vada /
GP12garup3_u:3038: bho śrīnivāsa tava nāmaiva caitannāma svāmī nanu nāmaiva svāmī /
GP12garup3_u:3039: yāṃ brahmādyā āśrayantītti yasmāttasmādramā śrīriti nāma cāpa //
GP12garup3_u:3042: adyaiva paśyāma harestavāsyaṃ kadā vayaṃ kṛta kṛtyā bhavāmaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3043: bhoḥ keśavādyaiva padāravindaṃ saṃdarśayitvā sudayāṃ kuruṣva //
GP12garup3_u:3046: ato hariḥ keśavanāmadheyo bhoḥ keśaveti ca nartayantaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3047: ānandavāpīṃ saṃstravantobhi jagmurnārāyaṇeti pravadanto hi jagmuḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3050: nārāḥ proktā āśrayatvācca teṣāmatopi nārāyaṇa eva vīndra /
GP12garup3_u:3051: muktāśca ye tu prapadaṃnu jagmuraṇḍodakaṃ yasya kaṭākṣamātrāt //
GP12garup3_u:3052: yadutpannaṃ tena nārāḥ khagendra teṣāṃ sadāpyāśrayatvācca vīndra /
GP12garup3_u:3054: evaṃ nanṛtuḥ pariśaṃsayanto govinda nānyo hi na caiva darśanam /
GP12garup3_u:3055: gośabdavācyāstu samastavāco gobhiśca sarvaiḥ pratipādyate yataḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3056: ato hi govinda iti smṛtaḥ sadā bho vedavedyeti tathā na nanṛtuḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3057: ānandabāṣpaiśca samanvitā hi hare murāre tava darśanaṃ hi // GarP_3,24.57
GP12garup3_u:3058: dehi prabho vai tavadāsadāsāścaturdaśe bhuvane sarvadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:3059: yatastvamevaṃ vasatīti vāsuścātraiva nityaṃ krīḍate sarvadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:3061: bho vāsudeveti nanṛtuḥ sarvadaiva bho mādhaveti nanṛtuścaiva sarve //
GP12garup3_u:3062: lakṣmīpate ceti vadanti sarve dhanīti śabdaḥ svābhivācī yato hi /
GP12garup3_u:3063: atopyāryā mādhaveti bruvanti lakṣmīpate pāhi tathaiva bhaktān //
GP12garup3_u:3064: te vai bruvanto nanṛtuśca jagmurviṣṇo sadāsmānparipāhi nityam /
GP12garup3_u:3066: jagmuśca sarve dadṛśuśca tīrthaṃ bhaktyopetāḥ śrīnivāsaṃ smarantaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3068: kiṃ nāmakaṃ tīrthamidaṃ munīndra kiṃ kāryamatra pravadāsmānkṛtīśa /
GP12garup3_u:3072: niṣkāmabuddhyā tu yadā jagāma śeṣācalasthaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ ca draṣṭum //
GP12garup3_u:3074: nṛsiṃharūpaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ bhajasva sudurlabhaṃ mānuṣaṃ janma kanye //
GP12garup3_u:3075: tatrāpi viṣṇornṛhare sutattvaṃ sudurlabhaṃ suṣṭhu yātrā tathaiva /
GP12garup3_u:3076: yasyāṃ yātrāyāṃ yatra kutrāpi deśe hareḥ kathā vartate daityavaryāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3077: tatra sthale harirāste sadaiva yato vyāptaḥ sarvato vai nṛsiṃhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3079: vyāpto hariścetkathamatra vai sakhe na dṛśyate jalarūpī nṛsiṃhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3080: sa evamukto dānavānāṃ sutaiśca tuṣṭāva viṣṇuṃ paramādareṇa // GarP_3,24.67
GP12garup3_u:3081: tava svarūpaṃ mama darśayasva svayogyarūpaṃ dānavānāṃ sutānām /
GP12garup3_u:3082: iti stutaḥ śrīnivāso haristu tasminnantarjalarūpaṃ samāyāt // GarP_3,24.68
GP12garup3_u:3083: asminsnānaṃ ye prakurvanti tīrthe teṣāṃ jñānaṃ paramaṃ dṛḍhaṃ syāt /
GP12garup3_u:3084: atra snāne mānuṣāṇāṃ ca tāta buddhirna hi syātkalikāle viśeṣāt //
GP12garup3_u:3085: dattvāṃ varaṃ daityavarāya viṣṇurantardadhe jalapūrṇe sukuṇḍe /
GP12garup3_u:3086: adyāpyāste jalamadhye nṛsiṃhaḥ prahlādopi daityakumārakaiḥ saha //
GP12garup3_u:3087: tasmin sutīrthe paritastatratatra jayeti śabdaḥ śrūyate cāparāhne /
GP12garup3_u:3088: idaṃ tīrthaṃ nārasiṃhābhidhaṃ ca kanyesnānaṃ hyatra kāryaṃ manuṣyaiḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3089: snānaṃ kṛtvā tatra tīrthe ca samyagdīpaṃ dattvā dvijavaryāya mukhyam /
GP12garup3_u:3090: draṣṭuṃ punaḥ śrīnivāsaṃ prajagmurgovindagovinda iti bruvantaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3092: jaigīṣavyaḥ śrīnivāsasya viṣṇoḥ kathaṃ kāryaṃ darśanaṃ tadvadasva //
GP12garup3_u:3093: jaigīṣavyaḥ prāha saṃhṛṣṭacitto bravīmi tantraṃ śṛṇu kanyake tvam /
GP12garup3_u:3094: śrutvā mattaḥ kuru sarvaṃ mayoktamādyaṃ dvāraṃ śrīnivāsasya dṛṣṭvā //
GP12garup3_u:3096: tāni sarvāṇi me deva kṣamasva puruṣottama // GarP_3,24.75 //
GP12garup3_u:3099: ādyadvāraṃ śrīnivāsasya devi samyak smaredvijayaṃ vai jayaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3100: dakṣādhvare śrīnivāsasya devi caṇḍaṃ pracaṇḍaṃ saṃsmaretsamyageva //
GP12garup3_u:3101: pāścātyabhāge śrīnivāsasya devi nandaṃ sunandaṃ saṃsmaredeva bhaktyā /
GP12garup3_u:3103: yaścaiva dehaṃ praviśedbhaktipūrvaṃ kadā drakṣye sādareṇaiva devi /
GP12garup3_u:3104: pradakṣiṇadvādaśakaṃ ca kṛtvā pade pade saṃsmarecchrīnivāsam //
GP12garup3_u:3105: śrīsvāmitīrthe samyagācamya natvā snātvā natvā bhūvarāhaṃ ca devi /
GP12garup3_u:3109: madhye pīṭhaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ ca devī nārāyaṇaṃ praṇametpūrṇameva /
GP12garup3_u:3110: devasya savye pīṭhabhāgādvahiśca namaskāryaṃ gurudevāya caiva //
GP12garup3_u:3112: nairṛtyabhāge vyāsadevāya devi namaskāryo vaiṣṇavaḥ sarvadāpi //
GP12garup3_u:3114: pīṭhasyordhvaṃ hyagnikoṇeṣu devī dharmādhibhūtāya namo yamāya //
GP12garup3_u:3116: pīṭhasyordhvaṃ vāyukoṇe ca subhrūrvairāgyānāmadhipaṃ caiva rudram //
GP12garup3_u:3117: pīṭhasyordhvaṃ tvīśakoṇe ca devi aiśvaryāṇāmadhipaṃ cendradevam /
GP12garup3_u:3118: pīṭhasya pūrve praṇamennairṛtiṃ ca aryāmṇānāmadhipaṃ cātra devi //
GP12garup3_u:3119: devasya pīṭhasya ca dakṣiṇe ca durgāṃ namedugrarūpābhidhāṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3120: pīṭhasya kanye praṇametpaścime vai ārogyāṇā madhipaṃ kāmadevam //
GP12garup3_u:3122: pīṭhasya madhye praṇamedvai varāhaṃ sadā kanye paramaṃ pūruṣākhyam //
GP12garup3_u:3129: pīṭhasya madhye yamasaṃjñāṃ ca lakṣmīṃ samarcayedyamamadhye ca devīm /
GP12garup3_u:3130: yamasya devasya ca dakṣiṇe ca sūryaṃ nameddīparūpaṃ ca bhadre //
GP12garup3_u:3131: yamasya devasya ca vāmabhāge śriyaṃ nameddīparūpāṃ ca devīm /
GP12garup3_u:3132: yamasya devasya tu cāgrabhāge hutāśanaṃ dīparūpaṃ namecca // GarP_3,24.93
GP12garup3_u:3133: devasyāgre bhūmināmnīṃ namecca tattvābhimānāṃ saṃsmareccaiva nityam /
GP12garup3_u:3137: padmasya pūrvasthadale ca devi strīrūpākhyaṃ vimalākhyāmimāṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3139: utkarṣanāmnīṃ paramāṃ ca devīṃ namedramāṃ brahmavāyū ca śeṣam /
GP12garup3_u:3141: strīrūpebhyo namanaṃ kāryameva kanye mayā paścimasthe dale ca /
GP12garup3_u:3143: strīrūpebhyo namanaṃ kāryameva īśāna koṇasthadaleṣu caiva /
GP12garup3_u:3145: strīrūpebhyo namanaṃ kāryameva tathaiva padmasya ca madhyabhāge /
GP12garup3_u:3147: strīrūpāṇāṃ namanaṃ kāryameva suyogapīṭhasya svarūpa bhūtam /
GP12garup3_u:3148: sadā namecchrīmadanantasaṃjñamevaṃ na mecchrīnivāsaṃ ca devam //
GP12garup3_u:3149: śrīnivāsasya vāme tu lakṣmīṃ ca praṇamedvudhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3150: śrīnivāsasya savye tu dharāyai praṇamecchubhe // GarP_3,24.102 //
GP12garup3_u:3152: maholkaṃ dakṣiṇe caiva vīrolkaṃ paścime namet // GarP_3,24.103 //
GP12garup3_u:3153: uttare ca namaḥ kuryādyulkāya ca mahātmane /
GP12garup3_u:3154: caturṣvapi ca koṇeṣu sahasrolkaṃ nametsudhīḥ // GarP_3,24.104 //
GP12garup3_u:3156: saṃkarṣaṇāya devāya pradyumnāya ca paścime // GarP_3,24.105 //
GP12garup3_u:3158: āgneye ca namaskuryātkanye māyāṃ sadā śubhe // GarP_3,24.106 //
GP12garup3_u:3161: keśavāya namaḥ pūrve tathā nārāyaṇāya ca /
GP12garup3_u:3163: āgneye kanyake nityaṃ bhaktyā tu prayataḥ śubhe /
GP12garup3_u:3166: paścime trivikramāya vāmanāya tathaiva ca // GarP_3,24.110 //
GP12garup3_u:3168: uttare tu mahākanye hṛṣīkeśāya vai namaḥ // GarP_3,24.111 //
GP12garup3_u:3175: paścime mādhavāyātha tathā kṛṣṇāya vai namaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3176: buddhāya ca namaskuryādvāyavye kanyake śubhe // GarP_3,24.115 //
GP12garup3_u:3179: āgneye vāruṇīṃ caiva gāyatrīṃ caiva nairṛte /
GP12garup3_u:3180: vāyavye bhāratīṃ caiva īśānye girijāṃ namet // GarP_3,24.117 //
GP12garup3_u:3181: girijāṃ vāmabhāge tu sauparṇai caiva saṃnamet /
GP12garup3_u:3185: dakṣiṇe tu yamāyaiva nairṛtyāṃ nirṛtiṃ yajet /
GP12garup3_u:3186: paścime varuṇāyaiva vāyavye vāyave namaḥ // GarP_3,24.120 //
GP12garup3_u:3187: uttare ca kuberāya īśānye ca śivāya ca /
GP12garup3_u:3190: evaṃ kṛtvā namaskāraṃ praṇamecca punaḥ punaḥ // GarP_3,24.122 //
GP12garup3_u:3192: itaḥ parantu gantavyaṃ darśanārthaṃ ramāpate // GarP_3,24.123 //
GP12garup3_u:3193: evamuktvā tu sā devī taiḥ sārdhaṃ tu yayau mudā /
GP12garup3_u:3196: samāgamo durghaṭa eva vīndra satāṃ ca sattattvavibodhakānām /
GP12garup3_u:3198: payo vikāraṃ ca nijaṃ jahāti śeṣasya śeṣaṃ nalinasya ṣaṅkajam /
GP12garup3_u:3200: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe śrīveṅkaṭeśagiryārohaṇakramatadbhaktatatparvatanāmādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturviśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:3202: sā dvāradeśe śrīnivāsasya devī svāmipuṣkariṇīṃ dadṛśe kaiśca sārdham /
GP12garup3_u:3203: svāminhare śrīnivāseti sā taṃ brahmādīnāṃ tārakaṃ sampradadhyau //
GP12garup3_u:3204: devaiḥ sārdhaṃ pālanārthaṃ ca viṣṇurastyeva nityaṃ puṣkariṇyāṃ jaleṣu /
GP12garup3_u:3205: ataḥ svāmipuṣkariṇīti cāhustatra snānaṃ kanyakānyāśca cakruḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3206: śucirbhūtvā śrīnivāsaṃ ca devāstuptuṃ viviśuḥ śuddhabhaktyā khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:3207: yathopadiṣṭaṃ guruṇā tathaiva cakre kanyāśca sarvaṃ khagendra //
GP12garup3_u:3208: tadā hariṃ darśayāmāsa tasyai svakaṃ rūpaṃ supratīke supūrṇam /
GP12garup3_u:3209: sā kanyakā śrīnivāsasya rūpaṃ dadarśa bhaktyā svamanobhirāmam //
GP12garup3_u:3210: suvarṇacitraṃ vasanaṃ vasānaṃ soṣṇīṣakaṃ kañcukaṃ saṃdadhānam //
GP12garup3_u:3215: dṛṣṭvā ca kanyā mumude romāñcitasugātrakā // GarP_3,25.8 //
GP12garup3_u:3217: nanarta devī puratastasya viṣṇoḥ sā dhvastadoṣā paramādareṇa /
GP12garup3_u:3218: ānanda māṃ pāhi sukhaṃ ca dattvā mukundā māṃ pāhi vimuktidānāt //
GP12garup3_u:3219: māṃ pāhi nityaṃ hyaravindanetra prasannadṛṣṭyā karuṇāsudhārdra /
GP12garup3_u:3220: govinda govinda suduḥ khitāṃ māṃ jñānādidānena hi pāhi nityam //
GP12garup3_u:3222: hare hare māṃ satataṃ pāhi daityānsamāhṛtya prabalānvighnarūpān //
GP12garup3_u:3223: rameśa māṃ pāhi caturmukheśa viśveśa māṃ pāhi sarasvatīśa /
GP12garup3_u:3224: rameśa māṃ pāhi nidānamūrte vṛndāravṛndairvanditapādapadma // GarP_3,25.12
GP12garup3_u:3225: evaṃ tu natvā paramādareṇa tuṣṭāva viṣṇuṃ paramaṃ purāṇam /
GP12garup3_u:3226: lakṣmyā sadā ye 'viditā guṇāśca asaṃkhyātāḥ saṃti viṣṇau ca vīśa //
GP12garup3_u:3227: teṣāṃ sakāśādatibāhulyasaṃkhyā guṇā harau te 'viditā vai ramāyāḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3228: ato hare stavane kvāsti śaktistathāpi yatnaṃ stavane te kariṣye //
GP12garup3_u:3230: rudraprasādātstavanaṃ te kariṣye tathāpi viṣṇo mayi śāntiṃ kuruṣva //
GP12garup3_u:3231: yadi prasannosi mayi tvamīśa tvatpādamūle dehi bhaktiṃ sadaiva /
GP12garup3_u:3232: tvaddarśanāddeva śubhāśubhaṃ ca naṣṭaṃ madīyaṃ hyaśubhaṃ ca nityam //
GP12garup3_u:3233: tvanmāyayā naṣṭamimaṃ ca lokaṃ madena mattaṃ badhiraṃ cāndhabhūtam /
GP12garup3_u:3234: aiśvaryayogena ca yo hi mūko jātaḥ sadā dīnāgurvādikeṣu // GarP_3,25.17 //
GP12garup3_u:3236: tvaṃ deva me dehi satāṃ ca saṃgaṃ tava svarūpapratipādakānām //
GP12garup3_u:3237: putrādīnāmaihikaṃ vāsudeva dagdhvā ca me dehi pādāravinde /
GP12garup3_u:3238: sadvaṣṇave kriyamāṇaṃ ca kopaṃ dagdhvā ca me dehi pādaravinde //
GP12garup3_u:3239: dravyādike kriyamāṇaṃ ca lobhaṃ dagdhvā vai me dehi pādābjamūle /
GP12garup3_u:3240: putrādike kriyamāṇaṃ ca mohaṃ dagdhvā ca me dehi pādābjamūle //
GP12garup3_u:3241: vidyāṃ putraṃ dravyajātaṃ madaṃ ca dagdhvā ca me dehi pādābjamūle /
GP12garup3_u:3242: sadvaiṣṇavāsahamānasvarūpaṃ dagdhvā mātsaryaṃ pāhi māṃ veṅkaṭeśa //
GP12garup3_u:3243: mantraṃ ca me dehi nidānamūrte yenaiva me syāttava saṃgaśca bhūyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3244: nānyaṃ vṛṇe tava pādābjasaṃgāttadeva me dehi mama prasannaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3245: itīritaḥ śrīnivāsaḥ prasanna uvāca devo hyamṛtastravaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3246: atraiva kanye prajapasva mantraṃ sugopyarūpaṃ paramādareṇa // GarP_3,25.23
GP12garup3_u:3247: vakṣyāmi mantraṃ paramādareṇa śṛṇvadya bhaktyā paramādareṇa /
GP12garup3_u:3248: antaḥ sthamantyaṃ hyādyasaṃyuktameva sabindu tadvatsparśakādyena yuktam //
GP12garup3_u:3249: ekārayuktaṃ prathamāntaḥ sthayuktaṃ samatrikoṇe coṣmaṇā saṃyutaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3251: anena mantreṇa tavepsitaṃ ca bhaveddhi kanye nāntra vicāryamasti /
GP12garup3_u:3252: evaṃ sa uktvā śrīnivāso haristu pratīkavaddarśayāmāsa rūpam //
GP12garup3_u:3253: natvā tu sā śrīnivāsaṃ ca devī uvāsa ha svāmisaraḥ samīpe /
GP12garup3_u:3256: sākaṃ bhaktyā saṃpraṇamyātha devī pradakṣiṇaṃ śrīnivāsasya suṣṭhu //
GP12garup3_u:3257: nanarta devī supratīkasya cāgre lajjāṃ tyaktvā jaya deveti coktvā /
GP12garup3_u:3258: ānṛttakāle ca hareśca vaktraṃ dṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭyā tu paraṃ nanarta //
GP12garup3_u:3259: mamādya gātraṃ pāvitaṃ śrīnivāsa mamādya netraṃ saphalaṃ saṃbabhūva /
GP12garup3_u:3260: mamādya pādau sārthakau caiva jātau pradakṣiṇaṃ śrīnivāseśa kṛtvā //
GP12garup3_u:3261: hastau ca me sārthakāvadya jātau agre kṛtvā hastaśabdaṃ murāreḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3262: evaṃ vadantī prīṇayantī ca devaṃ jagāmasā stotravacaḥ kadambaiḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3263: devāstadā dunduṃbhayo vinedire tanmastake puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ ca cakruḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3265: tathaiva tāstalaśabdaṃ ca kṛtvā tadā sarvā namanaṃ cāpi cakruḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3266: ānandaśaile sarvadā tvitthameva sā sarvadā nartayantī ca vīndra //
GP12garup3_u:3267: ānandamagnā sāpi devī jagāma svamāśramaṃ jaigiṣavyeṇa sārdham /
GP12garup3_u:3268: yātrāmevaṃ ye na kurvanti vīndra teṣāṃ ca sarvaṃ niṣphalaṃ cāhurāryāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3269: gatvāśramaṃ jaigiṣavyeṇa sārdhaṃ guruṃ tvapṛcchadveṅkaṭeśasya mantram /
GP12garup3_u:3270: mantrasyārthaṃ brūhi me jaigiṣavya mantrāvṛttiṃ kurvatāṃ vai phalāya //
GP12garup3_u:3272: śṛṇuṣva bhadre veṅkaṭe śasya nāmnastvarthaṃ śrutvā hṛdaye saṃnidhatsva //
GP12garup3_u:3277: vya (ve) mindriyādikaṃ proktaṃ vyaṅgabhūtaṃ harau yataḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3282: muktānāṃ ca samūhastu vyaṅkaṭeti prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,25.41 //
GP12garup3_u:3291: atastu vyaṅkaṭeśākhya evaṃ jñātvā japaṃ kuru // GarP_3,25.45 //
GP12garup3_u:3293: nidrāṃ cakāra tatraiva rātrau pitrā sahaiva ca /
GP12garup3_u:3294: brāhme muhūrte cotthayi hṛdi sasmāra kanyakā // GarP_3,25.46 //
GP12garup3_u:3297: śrīraṅgaśāyī ca anantaśāyī kurvantu sarve mama suprabhātam // GarP_3,25.47
GP12garup3_u:3299: nārāyaṇaḥ śrībadarīnivāsaḥ kurvantu sarve mama suprabhātam // GarP_3,25.48
GP12garup3_u:3306: dvārāvatī kāśikāvantikā ca prayāgakāñcyau mathurāpurī ca /
GP12garup3_u:3307: māyāvatī hastimatī purī ca kurvantu sa dṛ // GarP_3,25.52 //
GP12garup3_u:3308: bhāgīrathī caiva sarasvatī ca godāvarī siṃdhukṛṣṇa ca veṇī /
GP12garup3_u:3309: kalindakanyā yamunā ca narmadā kurva dṛ // GarP_3,25.53 //
GP12garup3_u:3311: sutāmraparṇī ca pinākinī ca ku dṛ // GarP_3,25.54 //
GP12garup3_u:3314: gururvasiṣṭhaḥ kraturaṅgirāśca manuḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaśca gautamaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3315: raibhyo marīciścyavanaśca dakṣaḥ kurvantu sarve mama suprabhātam //
GP12garup3_u:3316: saptārṇavāḥ sapta kulācalāśca dvīpāśca saptopavanāni sapta /
GP12garup3_u:3317: bhūrādikāni bhuvanāni sapta kurvantu sa dṛ // GarP_3,25.57 //
GP12garup3_u:3318: māndhātrā nahuṣoṃbarīṣasagarau rājā nalo dharmarāṭ prahlādaḥ kraturāḍ vibhīṣaṇagayau vyāso hanūmānapi /
GP12garup3_u:3319: aśvatthāma kṛpāvumā drupadajā śrījānakī tārakā mandodaryakhilāḥ prabhātasumahaṃ kurvantu nityaṃ hare // GarP_3,25.58 //
GP12garup3_u:3320: aśvatthasya vanāni kiṃ ca tulasīdhātrīvanāni prabho punnāgasya vanāni caṃpakavanānyanyāni puṣpāṇi ca /
GP12garup3_u:3321: mandārasya vanāni yāni ca hareḥ saugandhikānyapyaho nityaṃ tāni diśantu matpramuditaṃ śrīveṅkaṭeśa prabho // GarP_3,25.59 //
GP12garup3_u:3322: evaṃ smṛtvā śrīnivāsasya devī kṛtvā śaucaṃ jaigiṣavyeṇa sākam /
GP12garup3_u:3323: snātuṃ yayau puṣkariṇīṃ hareśca snānaṃ samyak tatra cakāra deśe /
GP12garup3_u:3324: samyag japtvā vyaṅkaṭeśasya mantramuvāca sā jaigiṣavyaṃ guruṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:3325: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe devī kṛtaveṅkaṭeśadarśanatatstutyādivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:3328: śrīnivāsaḥ kimarthaṃ vai āgatotra vadasva me /
GP12garup3_u:3330: svāmipuṣkariṇī cātra kimarthaṃ hyagatā vada // GarP_3,26.1 //
GP12garup3_u:3331: jaigīṣavya uvāca śṛṇu bhadre mahābhāge vyaṅkaṭeśasya cāgamam /
GP12garup3_u:3332: āvayordevi pāpāni viṣamaṃ yānti bhāmini // GarP_3,26.2 //
GP12garup3_u:3335: babhūva daityayonau ca devānāṃ kaṇṭako balī /
GP12garup3_u:3336: saṃjīvo vijayaḥ prokto haribhakto mahāprabhuḥ // GarP_3,26.4 //
GP12garup3_u:3342: tvaṃ mā dadasva duḥ khaṃ me pālayiṣyati kovidaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3343: kṣaṇamātraṃ na jīvāmi tvāṃ vinā jīvanaṃ na hi // GarP_3,26.7 //
GP12garup3_u:3344: mā tapa tvaṃ mahābhāga mama jīvanahetave /
GP12garup3_u:3346: hiraṇyākṣo mātaraṃ prāha jālaṃ hitvā viṣṇorbhajane 'laṃ kuruṣva /
GP12garup3_u:3347: mayisnehaṃ putrahetorvirūḍhaṃ sukhaduḥ khe ceha loke paratra //
GP12garup3_u:3348: yāvatsnehaṃ mayi mātaḥ karoṣi tāvatkleśaṃ śāśvataṃ yāsyasi tvam /
GP12garup3_u:3350: tāte pūjye pitṛbuddhirmamāsti tasmiṃstute bhartṛbuddhirhi mithyā /
GP12garup3_u:3351: nirmāti yasmāddharireva sarvaṃ samyak pātā niyato 'sau murāriḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3352: ato hi mātā harireva sarvadā tvanyāsāṃ vai mātṛtā copacārāt /
GP12garup3_u:3353: nirmātṛtvaṃ yadi mukhyaṃ tvayi syāddroṇādīnāṃ jananī kā vadasva //
GP12garup3_u:3354: mātṛtvaṃ vai yadi mukhyaṃ tvayi syāddhātrādīnāṃ jananī kā vadasva /
GP12garup3_u:3355: yataḥ sadā yāti jagattatto hariḥ sadā pitā viṣṇurajaḥ purāṇaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3356: sadā pitā mukhyapitā yadi syādgarbhasthabāle pālakaḥ ko vadasva /
GP12garup3_u:3357: mātāpitroḥ pālakatvaṃ yadi syātkūrmādīnāṃ pālakau kau vadasva //
GP12garup3_u:3358: mātāpitroḥ pālakatvaṃ yadi syātkṛpādīnāṃ rakṣakau kau vadasva /
GP12garup3_u:3360: na tārakohaṃ narakācca subhrūrna vai bhartā nāpi pitrādayaśca /
GP12garup3_u:3361: na vai mātā nānujādiśca sarvaḥ sarvatrātā viṣṇurato na cānyaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3362: māyāṃ madīyāṃ jñānaśastreṇa cchitvā bhaktyā hareḥ smaraṇaṃ tvaṃ kuruṣva /
GP12garup3_u:3363: yadbhaktirūpūrvaṃ smaraṇaṃ nāma viṣṇostatsarvathā pāpaharaṃ ca mātaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3364: yo vā bhaktyā smaraṇaṃ nāma viṣṇoḥ karotyasau pāpaharo bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup3_u:3365: ayaṃ deho durllabhaḥ karmabhūmau tatrāpi madhye bhajanaṃ viṣṇumūrteḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3366: āyurgataṃ vyarthameva tvadīyaṃ śīghraṃ bhajeḥ śrīnivāsasya pādam /
GP12garup3_u:3368: caturmukhaṃ prīṇayitvaiva bhaktyā hyavadhyatvaṃ prāpa tasmānmahātmā /
GP12garup3_u:3369: tato bhūmiṃ karavadveṣṭayitvā ninye tadā daityavaryo mahātmā //
GP12garup3_u:3371: bhittvācābdhiṃ viviśe taṃ mahātmā rasātale saṃsthitaṃ bhūtalaṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:3373: taṃ karṇamūle tāḍayitvā jaghāna prasādayāmāsa ca pūrvavadbhuvam //
GP12garup3_u:3374: sudiggajānsthāpayitvā ca viṣṇuḥ śrīmuṣṭe vai saṃsthitaḥ śrīvarāhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3375: tadā hariścintayāmāsa viṣṇurbhaktyā madīyaṃ mānuṣaṃ dehamadya //
GP12garup3_u:3376: ārādhayiṣyanti ca māṃ kva ete teṣāṃ dayāṃ kutra vāhaṃ kariṣye /
GP12garup3_u:3377: evaṃ hariścintayitvā sukanye vaikuṇṭhalokādacalaṃ śeṣa saṃjñam /
GP12garup3_u:3378: vīndraskandhe sthāpayitvā svayaṃ ca samāgatobhūdbhūtalaṃ bhūtaleśaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3380: śrīkṛṣṇaveṇīparyantaṃ sthāpayā māsa taṃ girim // GarP_3,26.25 //
GP12garup3_u:3381: gireḥ pucche tu śrīśailaṃ madhyame 'hobalaṃ smṛtam /
GP12garup3_u:3382: mukhaṃ ca śrīnivāsasya kṣetraṃ ca samudāhṛtam // GarP_3,26.26 //
GP12garup3_u:3384: gaṅgādisarvatīrthāni puṇyāni hyatra saṃti vai // GarP_3,26.27 //
GP12garup3_u:3387: putrārthī putramāpnoti nṛpo rājyaṃ ca vindati /
GP12garup3_u:3395: vyaṅkaṭeśasya śailasya māhātmyaṃ yāvadasti hi // GarP_3,26.32 //
GP12garup3_u:3397: vyaṅkaṭādrau parāṃ bhaktiṃ ye kurvanti dinedine /
GP12garup3_u:3399: mūko vāgmī bhavedeva badhiraḥ śrāvako bhavet /
GP12garup3_u:3400: vandhyā syādbahuputrā ca nirdhanaḥ sadhano bhavet // GarP_3,26.34 //
GP12garup3_u:3402: tattvato vyaṅkaṭādrestu svarūpaṃ vetti ko bhuvi // GarP_3,26.35 //
GP12garup3_u:3403: yasmādasya gireḥ puṇyaṃ māhātmyaṃ vetti yaḥ pumān /
GP12garup3_u:3410: snānaṃ kurvanti ye tatra teṣāṃ muktiḥ kare sthitā /
GP12garup3_u:3412: tāni sarvāṇi tatraiva saṃti tīrthe hareḥ sadā // GarP_3,26.39 //
GP12garup3_u:3419: tīrthānāṃ snānamātreṇa mokṣaṃ yāntīti ye viduḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3420: te sarve asurā jñeyāste yānti hyadhamāṃ gatim // GarP_3,26.43 //
GP12garup3_u:3422: āste vāyuḥ sadā viṣṇoḥ pūjāṃ kartumanuttamām // GarP_3,26.44 //
GP12garup3_u:3426: ye veṣṇavā vaiṣṇavadāsavaryāḥ snānaṃ suryustatra pūrvaṃ sukanye /
GP12garup3_u:3427: madhvāntasthāḥ śrīnivāsastu nityamatra snānātprīyatāṃ me dayāluḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3428: ye madhvatīrthe snātumicchanti devi rudrādayo vāyubhaktā mahāntaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3429: sadā snānaṃ tatra kurvanti devi prātaḥ kāle codayātpūrvameva //
GP12garup3_u:3430: ye vāyutīrthe visṛjanti dehajaṃ malaṃ mūtraṃ vamanaṃ śleṣmakaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3431: ye 'pānaśuddhiṃ liṅgaśuddhiṃ ca kanye kurvanti te hyasurā rākṣasāśca //
GP12garup3_u:3432: śṛṇvanti ye bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ kiṃ varṇaye tasya puṇyaṃ tu devi /
GP12garup3_u:3433: ye kṛṣṇamantraṃ tu japanti devi hyaṣṭā kṣaraṃ mantravaraṃ sugopyam //
GP12garup3_u:3434: teṣāṃ hariḥ prīyate keśavolaṃ madhvāntastho nātra vicāryamasti /
GP12garup3_u:3435: evaṃ dānaṃ tatra kurvanti ye vai dvijāgryāṇāṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ vidāṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:3436: teṣāṃ puṇyaṃ naiva jānanti devā jānātyevaṃ śrīnivāso haristu /
GP12garup3_u:3437: śālagrāmaṃ vāyutīrthe dadante teṣāṃ puṇyaṃ vetti sa vyaṅkaṭeśaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3438: sudurlabho vāyutīrthe 'bhiṣeko niṣkāmabuddhyā vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca devi /
GP12garup3_u:3439: tatrāpi tīrthe labhyate bhāgyayogādbhāgavatasya śravaṇaṃ viṣṇudāsaiḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3440: tathaiva tīrthe durlabhaṃ tatra devi śālagrāmasya dvijavarye ca dānam /
GP12garup3_u:3443: jānārdanīṃ mūrtimāhurmahānto dānaṃ tasyā durlabhaṃ tatra tīrthe //
GP12garup3_u:3444: atyuttamaṃ mūrtidānaṃ tu bhadre sudurllabhaṃ paramaṃ nātra lobhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3446: atyuttamaṃ dravyadānaṃ ca devi svāpekṣitaṃ dānamāhurmahāntaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3447: svasyānapekṣaṃ phaladānaṃ ca vastrādānaṃ tasya vyarthamāhurmahāntaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3448: atyuttamaṃ gṛṣṭidānaṃ ca puṇyaṃ naivāpyate dugdhadohāśca gāvaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3449: atyuttame vastradāne subuddhiḥ sudurghaṭā paramā vai janānām //
GP12garup3_u:3450: atyuttamaṃ bhāgavatasya pustakaṃ sudurghaṭaṃ vāyutīrthaṃ ca kanye /
GP12garup3_u:3451: atyuttamaṃ dravyadānaṃ ca devi sudurghaṭaṃ vāyutīrthaṃ nṛṇāṃ hi /
GP12garup3_u:3454: candratīrtha miti proktaṃ tatrāste candramāḥ sadā // GarP_3,26.59 //
GP12garup3_u:3455: śrīnivāsasya pūjāṃ ca tatra sthitvā karotyayam /
GP12garup3_u:3456: tatra snānaṃ prakurvanti puṇyadeśe ca kanyake // GarP_3,26.60 //
GP12garup3_u:3458: tatra snātvā pūrvabhāge śālagrāmaṃ dadāti yaḥ // GarP_3,26.61 //
GP12garup3_u:3462: prasannavadanaṃ sūkṣmaṃ susnigdhaṃ kanyake śubhe // GarP_3,26.63 //
GP12garup3_u:3469: lakṣmīnārāyaṇasamāṃ tāṃ mūrtiṃ viddhi bhāmini // GarP_3,26.66 //
GP12garup3_u:3470: sudurlabhaṃ tasya mūrteśca dānaṃ taccandratīrthe śravaṇaṃ durghaṭaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3471: samyak svarūpaṃ dadhivāmanasya sudurghaṭaṃ śravaṇaṃ vaiṣṇavācca //
GP12garup3_u:3472: tatra snātvā vāmanasya svarūpaśravaṇādvidurdānaphalaṃ samaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3474: madhyāhne durlabhaṃ snānaṃ nṛṇāṃ tatra sumaṅgale /
GP12garup3_u:3475: tatra sthitvā dhanyanaraḥ sadā bhajati vai harim // GarP_3,26.69 //
GP12garup3_u:3479: devasya vāmabhāge ca madhyadeśaṃ vihāya ca // GarP_3,26.71 //
GP12garup3_u:3482: pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhūvarāhasya marterdānaṃ dattvā śravaṇaṃ cāpi kṛtvā /
GP12garup3_u:3483: tatra sthitaṃ bhūvarāhaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sa vai naraḥ kṛtakṛtyo hi loke //
GP12garup3_u:3484: tatra snātvā bhūvarāhasya marteḥ śṛṇoti yo lakṣaṇaṃ samyageva /
GP12garup3_u:3485: sa tena puṇyaṃ samupaiti devi sa muktibhāṅ nātra vicāryamasti //
GP12garup3_u:3486: īśānakoṇe śrīnivāsasya devi raudraṃ tīrthaṃ paramaṃ pāvanaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3487: tatra sthitvā rudradevo mahātmā pūjāṃ karoti śrīnivāsasya nityam //
GP12garup3_u:3488: hastāṣṭakaṃ tatpramāṇaṃ vadanti tatra snānaṃ vaiṣṇavaiḥ kāryameva /
GP12garup3_u:3489: tatra snātvā prayato vai murāreḥ kathāṃ divyāṃ śṛṇuyādādareṇa /
GP12garup3_u:3490: snānaṃ pānaṃ tatra dānaṃ ca kuryāllakṣmīnṛsiṃhaprīyate devi nityam3,26.76
GP12garup3_u:3496: etā dṛśaṃ gaṇḍikāyāḥ śilāyā mūrterdānaṃ durghaṭaṃ viddhi vīndra /
GP12garup3_u:3500: durlabhaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ tu snānaṃ sarvārthasādhakam // GarP_3,26.82 //
GP12garup3_u:3501: śālagrāmasya dānaṃ tu durlabhaṃ tatra vai nṛṇām /
GP12garup3_u:3504: chattrākāraṃ vartulaṃ ca prasannavadanaṃ śubham // GarP_3,26.84 //
GP12garup3_u:3506: savye dakṣiṇapārśve ca samayoḥ puṣkalānvitam // GarP_3,26.85 //
GP12garup3_u:3511: kalau nṛṇāṃ tasya lābho durlabhaḥ saṃsmṛto bhuvi /
GP12garup3_u:3512: dānaṃ ca sutarāṃ devi darlabhaṃ kiṃ vadāmi te // GarP_3,26.88 //
GP12garup3_u:3513: brahmatīrthe ca saṃsnāya śrotavyā vai hareḥ kathā /
GP12garup3_u:3515: lakṣaṇaṃ yo vijānāti tadā tatsadṛśaṃ phalam /
GP12garup3_u:3516: prāpnotyeva na saṃdeho nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,26.90 //
GP12garup3_u:3518: śrīnivāsasya pūjāṃ tu kartumāste śacīpatiḥ // GarP_3,26.91 //
GP12garup3_u:3522: dadāti bhūtale bhadre bhūpateḥ sadṛśo bhavet // GarP_3,26.93 //
GP12garup3_u:3530: etādṛśaṃ tu vai bhadre sītārāmābhidhaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,26.97 //
GP12garup3_u:3532: durlabhaṃ tu kalau nṝṇāṃ svasāmrājyapradaṃ śubham // GarP_3,26.98 //
GP12garup3_u:3534: yā taddānaṃ durlabhaṃ tannālpasya tapasaḥ phalam // GarP_3,26.99 //
GP12garup3_u:3535: dānasya śaktyabhāve tu śrotavyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ hareḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3537: āgneyakoṇe śrīnivāsasya devi tīrthaṃ tvāste vahnisaṃjñaṃ suśastam /
GP12garup3_u:3538: sa vahnidevaḥ śrīnivāsasya pūjāṃ kartuṃ hyāste sarvadā tīrthamadhye //
GP12garup3_u:3539: yo vā tīrthe vahnisaṃjñe ca devi bhaktyā snānaṃ kurute 'jaṃ smaranhi /
GP12garup3_u:3540: jñānadvārā mokṣamāpnoti devi tatra snānaṃ durllabhaṃ vai nṛṇāṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:3541: jñātvā snānaṃ duṣkaraṃ tīrtharāje bhaktistasmindurllabhā caiva devi /
GP12garup3_u:3543: hrasvaṃ tathā vartulaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ sūkṣmaṃ mukhaṃ mukhacakraṃ suśuddham /
GP12garup3_u:3544: suveṇuyuktaṃ vāsudevābhidheyaṃ dānaṃ kalau durlabhaṃ tasya bhadre //
GP12garup3_u:3545: dāne tasyāḥ śaktya bhāve ca devi snātvā tīrthe vāsudevābhidhasya /
GP12garup3_u:3546: samyak śrāvyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vai śilāyāstayostulyaṃ phalamāhurmahāntaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3548: tatrāste yamarājastu pūjāṃ kartuṃ hareḥ sadā // GarP_3,26.106 //
GP12garup3_u:3549: tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ cāpyakṣayaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam /
GP12garup3_u:3556: paṭṭavardhanarāmaṃ tu yo dadāti ca tatra vai /
GP12garup3_u:3557: paṭṭābhiṣikto bhavati nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,26.110 //
GP12garup3_u:3559: āste hi nirṛtistatra pūjāṃ kurtuṃ ca sarvadā // GarP_3,26.111 //
GP12garup3_u:3560: tatra snānaṃ prakartavyaṃ punarjanma na vidyate /
GP12garup3_u:3562: mūrtiṃ dadāti yo martyaḥ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup3_u:3566: tanmūrtidānaṃ durlabhaṃ tatra devaḥ prīṇāti yasmācchrīnivāso mahātmā /
GP12garup3_u:3567: yadā dānaṃ durghaṭaṃ syācca devi tadā śrotavyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tasya mūrteḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3569: tatra snātvā śeṣamūrtiṃ pradadāti dvijātaye // GarP_3,26.116 //
GP12garup3_u:3578: iha loke paratrāpi mokṣadā nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3579: navacakrādupakramya viṃśatyantaṃ ca yatra saḥ // GarP_3,26.121 //
GP12garup3_u:3581: viśvaṃbharaḥ sa vijñeyo viṃśatyūrdhvaṃ varānane // GarP_3,26.122 //
GP12garup3_u:3583: kalau tu durlabhaṃ naṇāṃ taddānaṃ cātidurlabham // GarP_3,26.123 //
GP12garup3_u:3585: eteṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śrutvā prayāti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_3,26.124 //
GP12garup3_u:3587: tatrāste varuṇo devaḥ pūjāṃ kartuṃ hareḥ sadā // GarP_3,26.125 //
GP12garup3_u:3589: śiśumāraṃ ca matsyaṃ ca trivikramamathāpi vā /
GP12garup3_u:3592: cakratrayā ca vadane pucchopari sacakrakā // GarP_3,26.127 //
GP12garup3_u:3596: eteṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śrutvā vāruṇe tīrtha uttame // GarP_3,26.129 //
GP12garup3_u:3598: pūrvauktā mūrtayo yasmin gṛhe tiṣṭhanti bhāmini /
GP12garup3_u:3599: bhāgīrathī tīrthavarā saṃnidhatte na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,26.130 //
GP12garup3_u:3600: svāmi puṣkariṇīsnānaṃ durghaṭaṃ tu kalau nṛṇām /
GP12garup3_u:3601: tatra sthitānāṃ tīrthānāṃ snānaṃ cāpyatidurghaṭam // GarP_3,26.131 //
GP12garup3_u:3606: snānaṃ kuru yathānyā yaṃ śayyādānaṃ tathā kuru /
GP12garup3_u:3607: jaigīṣavyena muninā tvevamuktā ca kanyakā // GarP_3,26.134 //
GP12garup3_u:3609: tīrtheṣveteṣu susnātā dānaṃ cakre subhāminī // GarP_3,26.135 //
GP12garup3_u:3610: uvāsa tatra sā davī triḥ saptakandināni ca /
GP12garup3_u:3612: sa yāti paramāṃ bhaktiṃ śrīnivāse jaganmaye // GarP_3,26.136 //
GP12garup3_u:3613: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe vyaṅkaṭagirimāhātmye svāmipuṣkariṇyāditīrthatatratyadevatadīyaśālagrāmalakṣaṇa taddānādivarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:3617: papraccha taṃ guruṃ vipraṃ vinayāvanatā sudhīḥ // GarP_3,27.1 //
GP12garup3_u:3618: kinnāmeyaṃ nadī vipra kiṃ kāryaṃ cātra me vada /
GP12garup3_u:3622: iyaṃ nadī mahābhāge sadā pāpavināśinī // GarP_3,27.3 //
GP12garup3_u:3624: pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate hyatra snānaṃ kartuṃ samudyataiḥ // GarP_3,27.4 //
GP12garup3_u:3626: yāvacchubhrodakaṃ devi tāvatsanānaṃ ca kārayet // GarP_3,27.5 //
GP12garup3_u:3628: śuddhodake samāyāte pāpaṃ naṣṭamiti dhruvam // GarP_3,27.6 //
GP12garup3_u:3630: atra snānaṃ prakartavyaṃ dātavyaṃ dāna muttamam /
GP12garup3_u:3631: tataśca jñānamāsādya viviṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_3,27.7 //
GP12garup3_u:3635: sūtasya hananādrāmo nirmukto hyatra bhāmini // GarP_3,27.9 //
GP12garup3_u:3636: nānena sadṛśaṃ tīrthaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup3_u:3637: snānaṃ kuru mahābhāge tena siddhiṃ hyavāpsyasi // GarP_3,27.10 //
GP12garup3_u:3638: jaigīṣavyeṇa muninā pitrā saha ca kanyakā /
GP12garup3_u:3640: yāvacca pauruṣaṃ sūktaṃ tāvatkālaṃ hi tiṣṭhati /
GP12garup3_u:3644: kumārīmahimānaṃ ca śrutvā snānaṃ cakāra sā /
GP12garup3_u:3645: punarāvṛtya sā devī hyantarā virajānadīm // GarP_3,27.14 //
GP12garup3_u:3646: dṛṣṭvā papraccha sā devī jaigīṣavyaṃ guruṃ prabhum /
GP12garup3_u:3647: kiṃ saṃjñikeyaṃ viprendra kiṃ kāryaṃ hyatra me vada // GarP_3,27.15 //
GP12garup3_u:3649: iyaṃ bhāgīrathī kanye āyāti hyantareṇa tu // GarP_3,27.16 //
GP12garup3_u:3651: kanye tvasyāstu salilaṃ śrīninivāsapriyaṃ sadā // GarP_3,27.17 //
GP12garup3_u:3652: atra snānaṃ yaḥ karoti sa yāti paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup3_u:3653: snānaṃ cakāra sā kanyā jale paramapāvane // GarP_3,27.18 //
GP12garup3_u:3654: dānādikaṃ tathā jñātvā jajāpa paramaṃ manum /
GP12garup3_u:3659: snānaṃ kṛtvā mahābhāgā yayau tuṃburusaṃjñikām // GarP_3,27.21 //
GP12garup3_u:3660: papraccha taṃ guruṃ devī nāthaṃ kinnāmikā tvayam /
GP12garup3_u:3662: iyaṃ tuṃbarukābhijñā nārī vai varavarṇinī // GarP_3,27.22 //
GP12garup3_u:3663: purā tuṃ buruṇā sākaṃ nāradastapasi sthitaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3665: snānaṃ yaḥ kurute hyatra sa yāti paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup3_u:3666: atra snānaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ durlabhaṃ kalau // GarP_3,27.24 //
GP12garup3_u:3667: atra snānaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ nālpasya tapasaḥ phalam /
GP12garup3_u:3668: tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca dattvā dānānyakeśaḥ // GarP_3,27.25 //
GP12garup3_u:3669: punarāgatya sā devī śrīnivāsaṃ nanāma ha /
GP12garup3_u:3675: kapilākhyordhvadeśe tu tattīrthaṃ pāvanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_3,27.28 //
GP12garup3_u:3678: tata ūrdhvaṃ mahābhāgā yayau tatra dadarśa sā /
GP12garup3_u:3679: pañcāyudhānāṃ tīrthāni teṣu snānaṃ cakāra sā // GarP_3,27.30 //
GP12garup3_u:3682: saptarṣīṇāṃ tadūrdhvaṃ tu puṇyatīrthaṃ ca satphalam /
GP12garup3_u:3684: eteṣāṃ caiva māhātmyaṃ ko vā vaktumihārhati /
GP12garup3_u:3685: ṛṣitīrtheṣu sā kanyā cacāra tapa uttamam // GarP_3,27.33 //
GP12garup3_u:3687: yogadhāraṇa yā dehaṃ tyaktvā jāṃbavato gṛhe // GarP_3,27.34 //
GP12garup3_u:3688: jātā jāṃbavatī nāma vavṛdhe tasya veśmani /
GP12garup3_u:3690: rukmyā anaṃ tarā saiṣā mama bhāryā khageśvara // GarP_3,27.35 //
GP12garup3_u:3692: ko vā varṇayituṃ śakto madanyaḥ puruṣo bhuvi // GarP_3,27.36 //
GP12garup3_u:3693: veṅkaṭeśasya naivedyaṃ sadā lakṣmīḥ karoti vai /
GP12garup3_u:3694: brahmā pūjayate nityamevaṃ śāstrasya nirṇayaḥ // GarP_3,27.37 //
GP12garup3_u:3697: grāhyameva na saṃdeho anyathā nārakī bhavet // GarP_3,27.38 //
