GP12garup3_u:3698: śrīnivāsātparo devo na bhūto na bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup3_u:3701: idaṃ tu paramaṃ gopyaṃ tavoktaṃ ca khageśvara /
GP12garup3_u:3703: itaḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi tāratamyaṃ śṛṇu prabho // GarP_3,27.40 //
GP12garup3_u:3704: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe utta dṛ tṛ dṛ brahma dṛ kanyākṛtanānātīrthayātrādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:3706: yā pūrvasarge dakṣaputrī satī tu rudrasya patnī dakṣayajñe svadeham /
GP12garup3_u:3707: visṛjya sā menakāyāṃ ca jajñe dharādharāddhemavato vai sakāśāt //
GP12garup3_u:3708: sā pārvatā rudrapatnī khagendra yā śeṣapatnī vāruṇī nāma pūrvā /
GP12garup3_u:3709: saivāgatā balabhadreṇa rantuṃ dvirūpamāsthāya mahāpativratā // GarP_3,28.2
GP12garup3_u:3710: śrīrityākhyā indirāveśayuktā tasyā dvitīyā pratimā megharūpā /
GP12garup3_u:3711: śeṣaṇa rūpeṇa yadā hi vīndra tapaścacāra viṣṇunā sārdhameva // GarP_3,28.3
GP12garup3_u:3712: tadaiva devī vāruṇī śeṣapatnī tapaśca kre indirāprītaye ca /
GP12garup3_u:3713: tadā prītā indirā suprasannā uvāca tāṃ vāruṇīṃ śeṣapatnīm // GarP_3,28.4
GP12garup3_u:3714: yadā rāmo vaiṣṇavāṃśena yuktaḥ saṃpatsyate bhūtale rauhiṇeyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3715: mayyāveśātsaṃyutā tvaṃ tu bhadre śrīrityākhyā valabhadrasya rantum //
GP12garup3_u:3716: saṃpatsyase nātra vicāryamastītyuktvā sā vai prayayau viṣṇuloke /
GP12garup3_u:3717: śrīlakṣmyaṃśācchrīritīḍyāṃ samākhyāṃ labdhvā loke śeṣapatnī babhūva //
GP12garup3_u:3718: yadāhīśo vipulāmuddharecca tadā rāmaḥ śrībhidāsaṃgame ca /
GP12garup3_u:3720: yā revatī raivatasyaiva putrī sā vāruṇī balabhadrasya patnī /
GP12garup3_u:3721: sauparṇanāmnī balapatnī khagendra yāstāstisraḥ ṣaḍviṣṇośca strībhyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3722: dviguṇādhamā rudraśeṣādikebhyo daśādhamā tvaṃ vijānīhi pautra //
GP12garup3_u:3724: rāmeṇa rantuṃ sarvadā vāruṇī tu putrītvamāpe revatasyaiva subhrūḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3725: evaṃ trirūpā vāruṇī śeṣapatnī dvirūpabhūtā pārvatī rudrapatnī //
GP12garup3_u:3727: śrūyate ca mayā kṛṣṇa nimittaṃ brūhi me prabho // GarP_3,28.10 //
GP12garup3_u:3729: evaṃ tvayoktaṃ bhagavanniścayārthaṃ mama prabho // GarP_3,28.11 //
GP12garup3_u:3730: revatī śrīyutā śrīśca śeṣarūpā ca vāruṇī /
GP12garup3_u:3731: sauparṇi pārvatī caiva tisraḥ śeṣāśato varāḥ // GarP_3,28.12 //
GP12garup3_u:3733: nimittaṃ brūhi me kṛṣṇa tavaśiṣyāya suvrata // GarP_3,28.13 //
GP12garup3_u:3736: uttamānāṃ ca sāmyaṃ tu uttamāveśato bhavet // GarP_3,28.14 //
GP12garup3_u:3739: yathā mayocyate vīndra tathā jānīhi nānyathā /
GP12garup3_u:3742: vṛtrādīnāṃ śarīraṃ tu puramityucyate budhaiḥ // GarP_3,28.17 //
GP12garup3_u:3746: mantradyumnastato loke ubhāvapyeka eva tu // GarP_3,28.19 //
GP12garup3_u:3750: caturthepi ca vāyośca viśeṣosti sadārjuna // GarP_3,28.21 //
GP12garup3_u:3754: vedoktamantrā gāḥ proktā dhiyā saṃdhārayedyataḥ // GarP_3,28.23 //
GP12garup3_u:3758: viśeṣeṇa hariṃ kukṣau vijñānācca hariḥ sadā // GarP_3,28.25 //
GP12garup3_u:3760: rāmaputraḥ kuśaḥ prokta indra eva prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,28.26 //
GP12garup3_u:3762: ataḥ kuśa iti prokto jānakīnandanaḥ prabhuḥ // GarP_3,28.27 //
GP12garup3_u:3764: vikukṣiḥ kuśa evaite sapta cendrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_3,28.28 //
GP12garup3_u:3765: yaḥ kṛṣṇaputtraḥ pradyumnaḥ kāma eva prakīrtitaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3772: yo rudraputraḥ skandastu kāma eva prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,28.32 //
GP12garup3_u:3773: ripūnāskaṃ date nityamataḥ skanda iti smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3775: kāmāvatāro vijñeyo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_3,28.33 //
GP12garup3_u:3776: sudarśanaśca paramaḥ pradyumnaḥ sāṃba eva ca /
GP12garup3_u:3779: tayormadhye tu garuḍa kāma indrādhamaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_3,28.35 //
GP12garup3_u:3785: sa evābhūddhareḥ sevāṃ kartuṃ rāmānujo bhuvi // GarP_3,28.38 //
GP12garup3_u:3789: evaṃ dvirūpo vijñeyo hyaniruddho mahāmatiḥ // GarP_3,28.40 //
GP12garup3_u:3793: duryodhanasya yā putrī lakṣaṇā sā ratiḥ smṛtā // GarP_3,28.42 //
GP12garup3_u:3794: kāṣṭhā sāṃbasya bhāryā sā lakṣaṇaṃ saṃyunaktyataḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3796: evaṃ dvirūpā vijñeyā kāmabhāryā ratiḥ smṛtā /
GP12garup3_u:3798: rājadharmeṇa viṣṇośca jātaḥ prīṇayituṃ hareḥ // GarP_3,28.44 //
GP12garup3_u:3802: ato hyasau nāranāmā babhūva hyaṅgatvamāptuṃ rāmadevasya bhūmyām //
GP12garup3_u:3805: bhūbhārabhūtādyuddhṛtau hyaṅgabhūto viṣṇoḥ sevāṃ kartumevāsa bhūmau /
GP12garup3_u:3807: yasmādutkṛṣṭo hariratra samyagato hyasau budhavannāma cāpa /
GP12garup3_u:3808: sakhā hyabhūtkṛṣṇadevasya nityaṃ mahāmatiḥ sarvalokeṣu pujvaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3810: kanyāṃ sṛṣṭvā hareḥ prīṇannāsa bhūmā prajāpatiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3812: śacīṃ bharyāṃ devarājasya viddhi tasyā hyavatāraṃ śṛṇu samyak khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:3813: rāmāvatāre nāma tārā babhūva sā vālipatnī śacīsajakā ca // GarP_3,28.51 //
GP12garup3_u:3814: rāmānmṛte vālisaṃjñe patau hi sugrīvasaṃgaṃ sā cakārātha tārā /
GP12garup3_u:3815: ato nāgātsvargalokaṃ ca tārā kva vā yāyādantarikṣe na pāpā // GarP_3,28.52
GP12garup3_u:3816: kṛṣṇāvatāre saiva tārā ca vīndra babhūva bhūmau vijayasya patnī /
GP12garup3_u:3817: piśaṅgadeti hyabhidhā syācca tasyāḥ sāmīpyamasyāstvajuṃnaveva cāsīt //
GP12garup3_u:3818: utpādayitvā babhruvāhaṃ ca putraṃ tasyāṃ tyaktvā hyarjuno vai mahātmā /
GP12garup3_u:3819: ataścobhe vāracitrāṅgade ca śacīrūpe nātra vivāryamasti // GarP_3,28.54 //
GP12garup3_u:3820: pulomajā mantradyumnasya bhāryā yā kāśikā gādhirājasya bhāryā /
GP12garup3_u:3821: vikukṣibhāryā sumatiśceti saṃjñā kuśasya patnī kāntimatīti saṃjñā //
GP12garup3_u:3822: etā hi sapta hyavarāśca śacyā jānīhi vai nāsti vicāraṇātra /
GP12garup3_u:3825: atha yaḥ pravaho vāyurmukhyavāyoḥ suto balī /
GP12garup3_u:3826: sa vāyuṣu mahānadya sa vai koṇādhipastathā // GarP_3,28.57 //
GP12garup3_u:3827: nāsikāsu sa evokto bhautikastulya eva ca /
GP12garup3_u:3828: ativāhaḥ sa evoktaḥ yato gamyo mumukṣubhiḥ // GarP_3,28.58 //
GP12garup3_u:3831: pravahaśceti saṃjñāṃ sa kimarthaṃ prāpa tadvada // GarP_3,28.59 //
GP12garup3_u:3832: arthaḥ kaścāsti tannāmnaḥ pratītastaṃ vadasva me /
GP12garup3_u:3834: uvāca paramaprītaḥ saṃstūya garuḍaṃ hariḥ // GarP_3,28.60 //
GP12garup3_u:3839: mayoktametattu satyaṃ na mithyā gṛhṇāmi hastenoragaṃ kopayuktam //
GP12garup3_u:3840: sarvaṃ nu satyaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau māṃ daśatuhyahīndraḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3842: etasya saṃdhāraṇādeva vīndra sa vāyuputraḥ pravahetyāpa saṃjñām /
GP12garup3_u:3843: yo vā loke viṣṇumūrtiṃ vihāya daityasvarūpā reṇukādyāḥ kudevāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3844: teṣāṃ tathā matpitṝṇāṃ ca pūjā vyarthā satyaṃ satyametadbravīmi /
GP12garup3_u:3845: etatsarvaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau māṃ daśatu hyahīndraḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3846: pitryaṃ nayāmi pravihāyaiva ye tu pitruddeśātkevalaṃ yaḥ karoti /
GP12garup3_u:3848: na śrīḥ svatantrā nāpi vidhiḥ svatantro na vāyudevo nāpi śivaḥ svatantraḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3849: tadanye no gauripuloma jādyāḥ kiṃ vaktavyaṃ nātra loke svatantraḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3850: bravīmi satyaṃ puruṣo viṣṇureva satyaṃ satya bhujamuddhṛtya satyam /
GP12garup3_u:3851: etatsarvaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau māṃ daśatu hyahīndra //
GP12garup3_u:3852: jīvaśca satyaḥ paramātmā ca satyastayorbhedaḥ satye e tatsadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:3853: jaḍaścasatyo jīvajaḍayośca bhedo bhedaḥ satyaḥ kiṃ ca jaḍaiśayorbhidā //
GP12garup3_u:3854: bhedaḥ satyaḥ sarvajīveṣu nityaṃ satyā jaḍānāṃ ca bhedā sadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:3855: etatsarvaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau daśatu māṃ hyahīndraḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3857: etasya saṃdhāraṇādevavīdre sā vāyuputraḥ pravahetyāpa saṃjñām //
GP12garup3_u:3858: dvayaṃ svarūpaṃ praviditvaiva pūrvaṃ tvaṃ svīkuruṣva dvayameva nityam /
GP12garup3_u:3859: snānādikaṃ ca prakaroti nityaṃ pāpī sa ātmā naiva mokṣaṃ prayāti //
GP12garup3_u:3860: tasmāddvayaṃ pravicāryaiva nityaṃ sukhī bhavennātra vicāryamasti /
GP12garup3_u:3861: etatsarvaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau māṃ daśatu hyahīndraḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3863: kiṃ taddvayaṃ devadeveśa kiṃ vā tatkāraṇaṃ kīdṛśaṃ me vadasva /
GP12garup3_u:3864: dvayostyāgaṃ kīdṛśaṃ me vadasva tyāgātsukhaṃ kīdṛśaṃ me vadasva //
GP12garup3_u:3866: dvayaṃ cāhustvindriye dve baliṣṭhe dehe hyasmiñ śrotranetre susṛṣṭe /
GP12garup3_u:3867: avāntare śrotranetre khagendra dvayaṃ cāhustatsvarūpaṃ ca vakṣye //
GP12garup3_u:3868: śrotrasvabhāvo loka vārtāśrutau ca hyatīva modastvādarāsvādanena /
GP12garup3_u:3869: harervārtāśravaṇe duḥ khajālaṃ śrotrasvabhāvo jaḍatā damaśca //
GP12garup3_u:3870: netrasvabhāvo darśane strīnarāṇāṃ hyatyādarānnāsti nidrādikaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:3871: harerbhaktānāṃ darśane duḥ kharūpo viṣṇoḥ pūjādarśane duḥ khajālam //
GP12garup3_u:3872: tayoḥ svarūpaṃ praviditvaiva pūrvaṃ punaḥ punaḥ svīkarotyeva mūḍhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3873: śiśraṃ maurkhyāccaiva kutrāpi yonau praveśayetsarvadā hyādareṇa //
GP12garup3_u:3874: bhayaṃ ca lajjā naiva cāste vadhūnāṃ tathā nṛṇāṃ vanitānāṃ yatīnām /
GP12garup3_u:3875: svasāraṃ te hyaviditvā dinepi suvāma yajñena svābhāvaśca vīndra //
GP12garup3_u:3877: tatho pahārasya ca tatsvabhāvaḥ abhakṣyāṇāṃ bhakṣaṇe tatsvabhāvaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3878: alehyalehasya ca tatsvabhāvaḥ pātuṃ tvapeyasya ca tatsvabhāvaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3879: dvayoḥ svarūpaṃ ca vihāya mūḍhaḥ punaḥ punaḥ svīkarotyeva nityam //
GP12garup3_u:3880: tasya snānaṃ vyarthamāhuśca yasmāttasmāttyājyaṃ na dvayoḥ kāryameva /
GP12garup3_u:3881: abhiprāyaṃ hyetamevaṃ khagendra jānīhi tvaṃ prahasyaiva nityam //
GP12garup3_u:3882: bhāryādvayaṃ hyaviditvā svarūpaṃ svīkṛtya caikāṃ pravihāyaiva caikām /
GP12garup3_u:3883: snānādikaṃ kurute mūḍhabūddhiḥ vyarthaṃ cāhurmokṣabhogau ca naiva /
GP12garup3_u:3884: etatsarvaṃ yadi mithyā bhavettu tadā tvasau māṃ daśatu hyahīndraḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3886: bhāryādvayaṃ kiṃ vada tvaṃ mamāpi tayoḥ svarūpaṃ kiṃ vada tvaṃ murāre /
GP12garup3_u:3887: tayormadhye grāhyabhāryāṃ vada tvamagrāhyabhāryāṃ cāpi samyagvada tvam //
GP12garup3_u:3889: buddhiḥ patnī sā dvirūpā khagendra duṣṭā caikā tvaparā suṣṭhurūpā /
GP12garup3_u:3890: tayormadhye duṣṭarūpā kaniṣṭhā jyeṣṭhā tu yā suṣṭhubuddhisvarūpā //
GP12garup3_u:3891: kaniṣṭhayā naṣṭatāṃ yāti jīvaḥ sutiṣṭhantyā yāti yogyāṃ pratiṣṭhām /
GP12garup3_u:3892: kaniṣṭhāyāḥ śṛṇu vakṣye svarūpaṃ śrutvā tasyāstyāgabuddhiṃ kuruṣva //
GP12garup3_u:3893: jīvaṃ yaṃ vai prerayantī kaniṣṭhā kāmyaṃ dharmaṃ kurute sarvadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:3894: kva brāhmaṇāḥ kva ca viṣṇurmahātmā kva vai kathā kva ca yajñāḥ kvagāvaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3895: kva cāśvatthaḥ kva ca snānaṃ kva śaucametatsarvaṃ nāma nāśaṃ karoti /
GP12garup3_u:3896: mūḍhaṃ patiṃ reṇukāṃ pūjayasva māyādevyā dīpadānaṃ kuruṣva // GarP_3,28.88
GP12garup3_u:3897: subhairavādīn bhaja mūḍha tvamandha hāridracūrṇandhārayeḥ sarvadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:3898: jyeṣṭhāṣṭamyāṃ jyeṣṭhadevīṃ bhajasva bhaktyā sūtraṃ galabandhaṃ kuruṣva //
GP12garup3_u:3899: marigandhāṣṭamyāṃ marigandhaṃ bhajasva tathā sūtraṃ svagale dhārayasva /
GP12garup3_u:3900: dīpastaṃbhaṃ sudine pūjayasva tatsūtrameva svagale dhārayasva //
GP12garup3_u:3901: mahālakṣmīṃ cādyalakṣmīṃ ca samyak pūjāṃ kuru tvaṃ hi bhaktyātha jīva /
GP12garup3_u:3904: suvāsinīḥ pūjayasvāśu bhaktyā gandhaiḥ puṣpairdhūpadīpaiḥ pratoṣya //
GP12garup3_u:3906: picumandapatrāṇi vitatya bhūmau namasva tvaṃ kṣamyatāṃ ceti coktvā //
GP12garup3_u:3907: mahādevīṃ pūjayasvādya bhaktyā sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ mā dadasvāpyathānnam /
GP12garup3_u:3908: sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ yadi vānnaṃ dadāsi bhāgyaṃ ca te paśyato nāśameti //
GP12garup3_u:3909: svavāmahaste veṇupātre nidhāya dīpaṃ dhṛtvā savyahaste pate tvam /
GP12garup3_u:3910: uttiṣṭha bhoḥ pañcagṛheṣu bhikṣāṃ kuruṣva samyak pravihāyaiva lajjām //
GP12garup3_u:3911: ādau gṛhe ṣaḍrasānnaṃ ca kutvā jagadgopyaṃ bhojanaṃ tvaṃ kuruṣva /
GP12garup3_u:3912: taccheṣānnaṃ bhojayitvā pate tvaṃ tāsāṃ ca re śaraṇaṃ tvaṃ kuruṣva //
GP12garup3_u:3913: tāsaṃ hastaṃ pustake stāpayitvā trāhityevaṃ tanmukhairvācayasva /
GP12garup3_u:3915: taiḥ sārdhaṃ tvaṃ śvānaśabdaṃ kuruṣva haridrācūrṇaṃsarvadā tvaṃ dadhasva /
GP12garup3_u:3916: kuruṣva tvaṃ bhīmasenasya pūjāṃ pañcāmṛtaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiścopacāraiḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3917: tatkaupīnaṃ raupyajaṃ kārayitvā samarpayitvā dīpamālāṃ kuruṣva /
GP12garup3_u:3918: taddāsavaryān bhojayasvādya bhaktyā garjasva tvaṃ bhīmabhīmeti suṣṭhu //
GP12garup3_u:3922: śākaṃbharīṃ vivisaḥ sarvaśākānsupācayitvā ca gṛhe gṛhe ca // GarP_3,28.101
GP12garup3_u:3924: kulādevaṃ pūjayasvādya bhaktyā tvaṃ dṛgbhyāṃ vai taddine śaṃbhubuddhyā //
GP12garup3_u:3925: tadbhaktavaryānpūjayasvādya samyak tatpādamūle vandanaṃ tvaṃ kuruṣva /
GP12garup3_u:3926: supañcamyāṃ mṛnmayīṃ śeṣamūrtiṃ pūjāṃ kuruṣva kṣīralājādikaiśca //
GP12garup3_u:3927: sunāgapāśaṃ hi gale ca baddhvā taccheṣānnaṃ bhojayerbhoḥ punastvam /
GP12garup3_u:3928: dine caturthe bhoja yasvādya bhaktyā naivedyānnaṃ bhojayasvādya suṣṭhu //
GP12garup3_u:3929: ityādikaṃ prerayitvā patiṃ sā jīvena naṣṭaṃ prikarotyeva nityam /
GP12garup3_u:3931: tasyāḥ saṃgaṃ suvidūraṃ visṛjyaceṣṭvā samagraṃ kuru sarvadā tvam /
GP12garup3_u:3932: subuddhirūpā tvīrayantī jagāda bhajasva viṣṇuṃ paramādareṇa //
GP12garup3_u:3933: hariṃ vinānyaṃ na bhajasva nityaṃ sā reṇukā tvāṃ tu na pālayiṣyati /
GP12garup3_u:3934: adṛṣṭanāmā haririve hi nityaṃ phalaprado yadi na syātkhagendra //
GP12garup3_u:3935: jugupsitāṃ śrutyanuktāṃ ca devīṃ patidruhāṃ sarvadā sevayitvā /
GP12garup3_u:3936: tasyāḥ prasādātkuṣṭhabhagandarādyairbhuktvā duḥ khaṃ saṃyaminīṃ prayāhi //
GP12garup3_u:3937: tadā kudavī kutra gatā vadasvame hyataḥ pate tvaṃ na bhajasva devīm /
GP12garup3_u:3938: pate bhaja tvaṃ brāhmaṇānvaiṣṇavāṃśca saṃsāraduḥ khāttāransuṣṭhurūpān //
GP12garup3_u:3939: sevādikaṃ pravīhāyaiva svacchaṃ māyādevyā bhajanātkiṃ vadasva /
GP12garup3_u:3940: jyeṣṭhāṣṭamyāṃ jyeṣṭhadevīṃ hyalakṣmīṃ lakṣmīti buddhyā pūjayitvā ca samyak // GarP_3,28.110
GP12garup3_u:3941: tasyāḥ sūtraṃ galabaddhaṃ ca kṛtvā nānāduḥ khaṃ hyanubhūyāḥ pate tvam /
GP12garup3_u:3942: yadā pate yamādūtaiśca pāśairbaddhvā ca samyak tāḍyamānaiḥ kaśābhiḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3943: tadā hyalakṣmīḥ kutra palāyate 'sāvato mūlaṃ viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva /
GP12garup3_u:3944: pate bhaja tvaṃ sarvadā vāyutattvaṃ na cāśrayestvaṃ sūkṣmaskandaṃ ca mūḍha
GP12garup3_u:3945: tadvattaṃ tvaṃ navanītaṃ ca bhaktyā taducchiṣṭaṃ bhakṣayitvā pate hi /
GP12garup3_u:3946: tasyāśca sūtraṃ galabaddhaṃ ca kṛtvā ihaiva duḥ khānyanubhūyāḥ pate tvam
GP12garup3_u:3947: yadā pate yamadūtaiśca pāśairbaddhvā ca samyak tāḍyamānaḥ kaśābhiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3948: tadā skandaḥ kutra palāyate 'sāvato mūlaṃ viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva //
GP12garup3_u:3949: dīpastaṃbhaṃ dāpayitvā pate tvaṃ sūtraṃ ca baddhvā svagale ca bhaktyā /
GP12garup3_u:3951: dīpastaṃbhaḥ kutra palāyitobhūdato mūlaṃ viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva /
GP12garup3_u:3952: lakṣmīdine pūjayitvā ca lakṣmīṃ sūtraṃ tasyāḥ svagale dhāraya tvam //
GP12garup3_u:3953: yadā pate yamadūtaiśca pāśairbadhvā samyak tāḍyamānaḥ kaśābhiḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3954: tadā lakṣmīḥ kutra palāyate 'sāvato mūlaṃ viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva //
GP12garup3_u:3956: varārārtikaṃ kāṃsyapātre nidhāya kṛtvārtikyaṃ udaudaiti śabdam //
GP12garup3_u:3957: tathaiva daṣṭvā picumandasya patraṃ sunartayitvā paramādareṇa /
GP12garup3_u:3958: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca pāśairbaddhvābaddhvā tāḍyamānaśca samyak //
GP12garup3_u:3959: tava svāminkuladevo mahātmanpalāyitaḥ kutra me tadvadasva /
GP12garup3_u:3960: svadehānāṃ pūjayitvā ca samyakkaṇṭhābharaṇairvidhurāṇāṃ ca keśaiḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3962: yadā tadā kutra palāyitā sā keśairvihīnā laṃbakarṇaṃ ca kṛtvā //
GP12garup3_u:3963: svavāmahaste veṇupātraṃ nidhāya dīpaṃ dhṛtvā savyahaste ca mūḍhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3964: gṛhegṛhe bhaikṣacaryāṃ ca kṛtvā saṃtiṣṭhamāne svagṛhaṃ caiva devī //
GP12garup3_u:3965: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca mūḍha dīpaiḥ sahasrairdahyamānaśca samyak /
GP12garup3_u:3966: nirnāsikā reṇukā mūḍhabuddhe palāyitā kutra sā me vadasva // GarP_3,28.123
GP12garup3_u:3967: sadā mūḍhaṃ khaḍgadevaṃ ca bhaktyā taṃ bhaktavatpūjayitvā ca samyak /
GP12garup3_u:3968: taiḥ sārdhaṃ tvaṃ śvānavadgarjayitvā saṃtiṣṭhamāne svagṛhe caiva nityam //
GP12garup3_u:3969: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca samyak saṃtāḍyamānastatra śabdaṃ prakurvan /
GP12garup3_u:3970: saṃtiṣṭhamāne bhaktavaryaṃ vihāya tadā devaḥ kutra palāyitobhūt //
GP12garup3_u:3971: sa pārthakyādbhīmasenapratīkaṃ pañcāmṛtaiḥ pūjayitvā ca samyak /
GP12garup3_u:3973: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca samyak saṃtāḍyamāne yamamārge ca mūḍhaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:3974: bhīmaḥ sa vai kutra palāyitobhūto mūlaṃ viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva //
GP12garup3_u:3975: mahādevaṃ pūjayitvā ca samyak haretyuktvā svagṛhe vidyamāne /
GP12garup3_u:3976: yadā gṛhaṃ dahyate vahninā tu tadā haraḥ kutra palāyitobhūt //
GP12garup3_u:3977: śākaṃ bharīdivase sarvameva śākaṃbharī sā ca devī mahātman /
GP12garup3_u:3978: palāyitā kutra me tvaṃ vadasva kulāladevaṃ pūjayitvā ca bhaktyā //
GP12garup3_u:3979: kārpāsaṃ vai tena dattaṃ gṛhītvā saṃtiṣṭhamāne yamadūtaiśca samyak /
GP12garup3_u:3981: vihāya vai kutra palāyitobhūnna jñāyate 'nveṣaṇāccāpi kena //
GP12garup3_u:3982: yadā pañcamyāṃ mṛnmayīṃ śeṣamūrtiṃ saṃpūjya bhaktyā vidyamāne svagehe /
GP12garup3_u:3983: tadā baddhvā yamadūtāśca samyak saṃnahyamāne nāgapāśaiścabaddhvā //
GP12garup3_u:3984: svabhaktavaryaṃ pravihāya nāgaḥ palāyitaḥ kutra vai saṃvada tvam /
GP12garup3_u:3986: saṃtiṣṭhaṃmāne yamadūtaiśca samyak saṃtāḍyamāne taptadaṇḍaiśca mūḍha /
GP12garup3_u:3987: dantaṃ vihāyaiva ca vighnarājaḥ palāyitaḥ kutra me taṃ vadatvam //
GP12garup3_u:3988: vivāhakāle piṣṭadevīṃ subhaktyā saṃpūjayitvā vidyamāno gṛhe sve /
GP12garup3_u:3989: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca baddhvā saṃpīḍyamāno yamamārge sa mūḍhaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3990: viṣṭhādevī pīḍyamānaṃ ca bhaktaṃ vihāya sā kutra palāyitābhūt /
GP12garup3_u:3991: vivāhakāle rajakasya gehaṃ gatvā samyak prārthayitvā ca mūḍhaḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3992: yastaṃbhasūtraṃ kalaśe parītya pūjāṃ kṛtvā vidyamāno gṛhe sve /
GP12garup3_u:3993: yadā tadā yamadūtaśca samyak taṃ staṃbhasūtraṃ tasya mukhe nidhāya //
GP12garup3_u:3994: saṃtāḍyamāne saṃtabhasūtrasthadevī palāyitā kutra me saṃvadasva /
GP12garup3_u:3995: vivāhakāle pūjayitvā ca samyak caṇḍāladevīṃ bhaktavaśyāṃ ca tasyāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3996: tadbhaktavaryaiḥ śūrpamadhye ca tīre saṃsevayitvā vidyamāno gṛhesve /
GP12garup3_u:3997: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca baddhvā saṃtāḍyamāno yamamārge mahadbhiḥ //
GP12garup3_u:3999: jvarādibhiḥ pīḍyamāne svaputre gṛhe sthitaṃ brahmadevaṃ ca samyak //
GP12garup3_u:4000: dhūrpairdīpairbhakṣyabhojyaiśca puṣpaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā vidyamānaśca gehe /
GP12garup3_u:4001: yadā tadā yamadūtaiśca baddhvā saṃtāḍyamāne veṇupāśādibhiśca //
GP12garup3_u:4002: sa brahmadevaḥ kva palāyitobhūtsumūḍhabuddhe viṣṇupādaṃ bhajasva /
GP12garup3_u:4003: santānārthaṃ bṛhatīṃ pūjayitvā galena baddhvā bṛhatīṃ vai phalaṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:4005: tadā devī bṛhatī mūḍhabuddhe palāyitā kutra me tadvada tvam //
GP12garup3_u:4006: bhajasva mūḍha paradaivataṃ ca nārāyaṇaṃ tārakaṃ sarvaduḥ khāt /
GP12garup3_u:4007: sukṣudradeveṣu matiṃ ca mā kuru na ca śṛṇu tvaṃ phalguvākyaṃ tathaiva //
GP12garup3_u:4008: sukṣudradevān bhindipāle nidhāya visarjayitvā dūradeśe mahātman /
GP12garup3_u:4009: saṃdhārya tvaṃ svakulācāradharmaṃ saṃpātane narakaṃ hetubhūtam //
GP12garup3_u:4010: punīhi gātraṃ sarvadā mūḍhabuddhe mantrāṣṭakairjanmatīrthe pavitre /
GP12garup3_u:4012: sadā mūḍho harivārtāṃ bhajasva hyāyurgataṃ vyarthamevaṃ kubuddhyā /
GP12garup3_u:4013: sadvaiṣṇavānāṃ saṃgamo durlabhaśca kṣubdhaṃ jñānaṃ tāratamyasvarūpam //
GP12garup3_u:4014: hariṃ guruṃ hyanusṛtyaiva satyaṃ gatiṃ svakīyāṃ tena jānīhi mūḍha /
GP12garup3_u:4015: dagdhvā duṣṭāṃ buddhimevaṃ ca mūḍha subuddhirūpaṃ mā bhajasvaiva nityam //
GP12garup3_u:4016: mayā sārdhaṃ sadguruṃ prāpya samyagvairāgyapūrvaṃ tattvamātraṃ viditvā /
GP12garup3_u:4017: tenaiva mokṣaṃ prāpnumo nārjavairyattāryā viṣṇoḥ saṃprasādācca lakṣmyāḥ //
GP12garup3_u:4018: ityāśayaṃ manasā sannidhāya tathā coktaṃ bhaktavaryo madīyaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4019: ato bhaktaḥ pravahetyeva saṃjñāmavāpa vīndra prakṛtaṃ taṃ śṛṇu tvam //
GP12garup3_u:4020: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe tāratamyanirūpaṇadvārā viṣṇorevopāsyatvamityarthanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśatamodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup3_u:4023: yo dharmo brahmaṇaḥ putro hyādisṛṣṭau tvagudbhavaḥ // GarP_3,29.1 //
GP12garup3_u:4026: pāpināṃ śikṣakattvātsa yama ityucyate budhaiḥ // GarP_3,29.2 //
GP12garup3_u:4028: prahlādānantaraṃ gaṅgā bhāryā vai varuṇasya ca /
GP12garup3_u:4031: jñānasvarūpadaṃ viṣṇuṃ yamo jānāti sarvadā // GarP_3,29.4 //
GP12garup3_u:4032: ato gaṅgeti sā jñeyā sarvadā lokapāvanī /
GP12garup3_u:4033: bhaktyā viṣṇupadītyeva kīrtitā nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_3,29.5 //
GP12garup3_u:4034: yā pūrvakāle yajñaliṅgasya viṣṇoḥ sākṣāddharervikramataḥ khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:4038: śaśikaravaragaurāṃ mīnanetrāṃ supūjyāṃ smarati haripadotthāṃ mokṣameti krameṇa // GarP_3,29.7
GP12garup3_u:4039: indropi vāyukaramarditavāyukūṭabinduṃ ca prāśya śirasi hyasahiṣṇumānaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4041: bhaktyā ca khinnahṛdayaḥ paramādareṇa dhṛtvā svamūrdhni paramo hyaśivaḥ śivo 'bhūt // GarP_3,29.8
GP12garup3_u:4044: dvitīyenaiva rūpeṇa gaṅgā bhāryā ca śantanoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4045: suṣeṇā vai suṣeṇasya bhāryā sā vānarī smṛtā // GarP_3,29.10 //
GP12garup3_u:4046: maṇḍūkabhāryā gaṅgā tu saiva maṇḍūkinī smṛtā /
GP12garup3_u:4047: evaṃ catvārī rūpāṇi gaṅgāyā iti kirtitamam // GarP_3,29.11 //
GP12garup3_u:4050: śaraṃvarāya pañcajanyācca pañca hitvā jagdhvā garvakaṃ ṣaṭkrameṇa /
GP12garup3_u:4051: svabāṇasya svahṛdi saṃsthitasya bhajetsadā naiva bhaktiṃ viṣaṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:4052: liṅgaṃ puṣṭaṃ naiva kāryaṃ sadaiva liṅgaṃ puṣṭaṃ kāryamevaṃ sadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:4053: yonau saktirnaiva kāryā sadāpi yonau mukte 'saṃgato yāti muktim //
GP12garup3_u:4055: etāvatā śarabhākhyo mahātmā sa cāntaro sa tu parjanya eva // GarP_3,29.15
GP12garup3_u:4056: śaśvatkeśā yasya gātre khagendra prabhāsyante śarabhākhyo payotaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4057: yamasya bhāryā śyāmalā yā khagendra yasmātsadā kalibhāryāpiyā ca //
GP12garup3_u:4058: matvā samyak mānasaṃ yā karoti hyataśca sā śyāmalāsaṃjñakābhūt /
GP12garup3_u:4059: malaṃ vakṣye haribhaktervirodhī sulohapātre sannidhānaṃ ca tasya //
GP12garup3_u:4060: tadvaiṣṇavaistyājyamevaṃ sadaiva vastraṃ dagdhaṃ sandhijaṃ caiva janyam //
GP12garup3_u:4061: cikitsitaṃ paraduḥ khaṃ khagendra darerbhaktaistyājyamevaṃ sadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:4062: noccāśca te haribhaktervihīnāsteṣāṃ saṃgo naiva kāryaḥ sadāpi /
GP12garup3_u:4063: purāṇasaṃparkavisarjinaṃ ca purāṇatālaṃ ca purāṇavastram // GarP_3,29.19
GP12garup3_u:4064: sujīrṇakanthājinamekhalaṃ ca yajñopavītaṃ ca kalipriyaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:4065: priyaṃ gṛhaṃ corṇavitā nakaṃ ca samitkuśaiḥ pūritaṃ kutsitaṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:4066: sarvaṃ cetkalibhāryāpriyaṃ ca naiva priyaṃ śārṅgapāṇeḥ kadācit /
GP12garup3_u:4067: kāṃsye supakvaṃ yāvanālasya cānnaṃ tuṣaḥ piṇyākaṃ tumbabilve palāṇḍuḥ //
GP12garup3_u:4068: dīrghaṃ takraṃ svāduhīnaṃ kaḍūṣṭaṇamete sarve kalibhāryāpriyāśca /
GP12garup3_u:4072: ityādi sarvaṃ kalibhāryāpriyañca sunirmalaṃ prikarotyeva sarvam /
GP12garup3_u:4073: ataśca sā śyāmaleti svasaṃjñāmavāpa sā devakī saṃbabhūva // GarP_3,29.24
GP12garup3_u:4074: yudhiṣṭhirasyaiva babhūva patnīsaṃbhāvitā tatra ca devakī sā /
GP12garup3_u:4075: candrasya bhāryā rohiṇī vai tadeyamaśvinyādibhyo 'hyadhikā sarvadaiva //
GP12garup3_u:4076: roṇīṃ dhṛtvā rohati yogyasthānaṃ tasmācca sā rohiṇīti prasiddhā /
GP12garup3_u:4077: ādityabhāryā nāma saṃjñā khagendra jñeyā sā nārāyaṇasya svarūpā //
GP12garup3_u:4078: saṃjānātītyeva saṃjñāmavāpa saṃjñeti loke sūrya bhāryā khagendra /
GP12garup3_u:4079: brahmaṇḍasya hyabhimānī tu devo virāḍiti hyabhidhāmāpa tena //
GP12garup3_u:4080: gaṅgādiṣaṭkaṃ samameva nityaṃ parasparaṃ nottamaṃ nādhamaṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:4081: pradhānāgneḥ pāvikānyaiva gaṅgā sadā śubhā nātra vicāryamasti //
GP12garup3_u:4082: āsāṃ jñānatpuṇyamāpnoti nityaṃ sadā hariḥ prīyate keśavolam /
GP12garup3_u:4084: svāhākāro mantrarūpābhimānī svāheti saṃjñāmāpa sadaiva vīndra /
GP12garup3_u:4085: agnerbhāryāto buddhimān saṃbabhūva brahmābhimānī candraputro budhaśca //
GP12garup3_u:4086: buddhyāharadvai rāṣṭrajātaṃ ca sarvaṃ dhṛtaṃ tvato budhasaṃjñāmavāpa /
GP12garup3_u:4088: kṛṣṇasya candrasya yamasya cāṃśaiḥ sa saṃyutastvaśvinorvai harasya /
GP12garup3_u:4091: budhādhamā sā vijñeyā svāhā daśaguṇādhamā // GarP_3,29.33 //
GP12garup3_u:4092: nakulasya bhāryā māgadhasyaiva putrī śalyātmajā sahadevasya bhāryā /
GP12garup3_u:4093: ubhe hyete aśvibhāryā hyuṣāpi upāsate ṣaḍguṇaṃ viṣṇumādyam /
GP12garup3_u:4094: ato 'pyuṣāsaṃjñakā sā khagendra anantarāñchṛṇu vakṣye mahātman //
GP12garup3_u:4096: ataḥ śanaiścaro nāma uṣāyāśca daśādhamāḥ // GarP_3,29.35 //
GP12garup3_u:4097: karmātmā puṣkaro jñeyaḥ śanaratha yamo mataḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4100: atastu puṣkalo nāma loke sa parikīrtitaḥ // GarP_3,29.37 //
GP12garup3_u:4102: prātaḥ kāle samutthāya smarennārāyaṇaṃ harim // GarP_3,29.38 //
GP12garup3_u:4108: gavāṃ kaṇḍūyane caiva smaredgovardhanaṃ harim // GarP_3,29.41 //
GP12garup3_u:4111: sparśe gavāṃ caiva sadā nṛṇāṃ vai bhavatyato nātra vicāryamasti /
GP12garup3_u:4112: yasmin gṛhe nāsti sadottamā ca gauryaṅgaṇe śrītulasī ca nāsti //
GP12garup3_u:4113: yasmin gṛhe devamahotsavaśca yasmin gṛhe śravaṇaṃ nāsti viṣṇoḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4114: tatsaṃsargādyāti duḥ khādikaṃ ca tasya sparśo naiva kāryaḥ kadāpi //
GP12garup3_u:4119: vatsyasya stanapāne ca bālakṛṣṇaṃ tu saṃsmaret /
GP12garup3_u:4122: puṇḍrāṇāṃ dhāraṇe caiva keśavādīṃśca dvādaśa // GarP_3,29.48 //
GP12garup3_u:4124: padmaṃ nārāyaṇīṃ mudrāṃ kruddholkādīṃśca saṃsmaret // GarP_3,29.49 //
GP12garup3_u:4128: annādyarpaṇakāle tu vāsudevaṃ ca saṃsmaret // GarP_3,29.51 //
GP12garup3_u:4131: yajñopavītasya ca dhāraṇe tu nārāyaṇaṃ vāmanākhyaṃ smarettu /
GP12garup3_u:4132: ārtikyakāle ca tathaiva viṣṇoḥ samyak smaretparśurāmākhyaviṣṇum //
GP12garup3_u:4135: trivāratīrthagrahaṇasya kāle kṛṣṇaṃ rāmaṃ vyāsadevaṃ krameṇa /
GP12garup3_u:4137: grāsegrāse smaraṇaṃ caiva kāryaṃ govindasaṃjñasya viśuddhamannam /
GP12garup3_u:4138: ekaikabhakṣyagrahaṇasya kāle samyak smaredacyutaṃ vai khagendra //
GP12garup3_u:4139: śākādīnāṃ bhakṣaṇe caiva kāle dhanvantariṃ smareccaiva nityam /
GP12garup3_u:4140: tathā parānnasya ca bhogakāle smarecca samyak pāṇḍuraṅgaṃ ca viṣṇum //
GP12garup3_u:4141: haiyaṅgavīnasya ca bhakṣaṇe vai samyak smarettāṇḍavākhyaṃ ca kṛṣṇam /
GP12garup3_u:4142: dadhyannabhakṣe paramaṃ purāṇaṃ gopālakṛṣṇaṃ saṃsmareccaiva nityam //
GP12garup3_u:4143: dugdhānnabhoge ca tathaiva kāle samyak smarecchrīnivāsaṃ hariṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:4148: gaṅgāmṛtasyaiva ca pānakāle gaṅgātātaṃ saṃsmaredviṣṇumeva // GarP_3,29.61
GP12garup3_u:4150: putrādīnāṃ cuṃbane caiva kāle suveṇuhastaṃ saṃsmaretkṛṣṇameva //
GP12garup3_u:4151: sukhaṅgakāle svastriyaścaiva nityaṃ gopi kucadvandvavilāsinaṃ harim /
GP12garup3_u:4152: tāṃbūlakāle saṃsmaraiccaiva nityaṃ pradyumnākhyaṃ vāsudevaṃ hariṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:4153: śayyākāle saṃsmareccaiva nityaṃ saṃkarṣaṇākhyaṃ viṣṇurūpaṃ hariṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:4154: nidrākāle saṃsmaretpadmanāmaṃ kathākāle vyāsarūpaṃ hariṃ ca //
GP12garup3_u:4156: śrīmattulasyāśchedane caiva kāle śrīrāmarāmeti ca saṃsmarettu //
GP12garup3_u:4157: puṣpādīnāṃ chedane caiva kāle samyaka smaredetkapilākhyaṃ hariṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:4158: pradakṣiṇegāruḍāntargataṃ ca hariṃ smaretsarvadā vai khagendra //
GP12garup3_u:4159: praṇamakāle devadevasya viṣṇoḥ śeṣāntasthaṃ saṃsmareccaiva viṣṇum /
GP12garup3_u:4161: pūrtiryadā kriyate karmaṇāṃ ca samyak smaredvāsudevaṃ hariṃ ca /
GP12garup3_u:4162: evaṃ kṛtāni karmāṇi hariprītikarāṇi ca // GarP_3,29.68 //
GP12garup3_u:4164: etasmādeva pakṣīśa karma yatsamudāhṛtam puṣkarākhyānamatulaṃ śṛṇoti śraddhayānvitaḥ /
GP12garup3_u:4166: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe kṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde tattvarahasyaṃ nāmaikonatriṃśodhyāyaḥ samāptamidaṃ garuḍamahāpurāṇam /
